title: The Influence of Coral Reef Benthic Conditions on Associated Fish Assemblages Around Puruf Island Water, Cenderawasih Bay, Papua, Indonesia
affiliations: Universitas Papua, Papua University, Manokwari, Papua University, Manokwari and Papua University, Manokwari

detail.title: The Influence of Coral Reef Benthic Conditions on Associated Fish Assemblages Around Puruf Island Water, Cenderawasih Bay, Papua, Indonesia

publicationDetails.detailsText: Asian Journal of Environment & Ecology, volume 23, issue 11, 2024[10.9734/ajee/2024/v23i11618 ]

detail.abstract: Coral substrate in lifeforms is an environmental aspect significantly affecting fish in the ecosystem. The conditions of these coral lifeforms greatly determine fish associations and distribution. Therefore, this study aimed to explore the effect of coral reef benthic conditions on associated with fish assemblages. This research used monitoring data in 2018. Coral data was taken using transect intercept points for corals, visual census data for coral fish, which were classified into functional fish (herbivores) and key fish species for coral fisheries (carnivores). The data had been analyzed by using principal component analysis and hierarchical classification. The results showed that there was a strong interaction between fish and coral lifeforms. The interactions occurring were more varied in space and time, which affected the composition of fish community, and the spatial pattern in coral reef ecosystem. Changes in coral lifeforms and live cover had the potential to limit reef fish populations. Furthermore, the presence of herbivore and carnivore fish was proportional in coral reef ecosystem. The future research challenge is to formulate the policies needed to maintain the condition of coral reefs as a whole.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了珊瑚礁底栖条件对鱼类群落的影响，发现珊瑚形态与鱼类之间存在强相互作用，且珊瑚变化可能限制鱼类种群。
AI.research_question: 珊瑚礁底栖条件如何影响鱼类群落的组成和分布？
AI.motivation: 珊瑚形态是影响生态系统中鱼类的重要环境因素，研究其与鱼类的关系有助于理解生态系统的动态。
AI.theoretical_framework: 珊瑚形态与鱼类群落的相互作用理论。
AI.method: 使用2018年监测数据，包括珊瑚横断面截点数据和珊瑚鱼类视觉普查数据，采用主成分分析和层次分类法。
AI.findings: 珊瑚形态与鱼类存在强相互作用，且珊瑚变化可能限制鱼类种群；草食性和肉食性鱼类比例均衡。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了珊瑚形态与鱼类群落的动态关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为制定珊瑚礁保护政策提供了科学依据。

title: SLM: A Sustainable Life Management System for Task Prioritization and Resource Allocation
affiliations: University of Alabama - Department of Information Systems, Statistics, and Management Science

detail.title: SLM: A Sustainable Life Management System for Task Prioritization and Resource Allocation
detail.abstract: Modern life presents individuals with an overwhelming array of tasks, duties, and responsibilities, creating significant challenges in decision-making regarding prioritization and resource allocation. This paper introduces the Sustainable Life Management (SLM) system, a novel machine learning framework that quantifies task complexity (demand) and available capacity (supply) to optimize personal productivity. The system employs sentence transformers to analyze task descriptions and predict energy demands, while leveraging historical completion patterns through reinforcement learning to estimate daily supply capacity. We formalize the problem as a constrained optimization task and prove the convergence of our allocation algorithm. Preliminary results from real-world task data demonstrate that SLM achieves a 23% improvement in task completion rates and a 31% reduction in deadline violations compared to traditional urgencybased prioritization. The framework provides both numerical metrics and thematic insights, enabling users to make informed decisions in navigating life's uncertainties while maintaining sustainable productivity levels.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为可持续生活管理（SLM）的机器学习框架，通过量化任务复杂性和个人能力来优化个人生产力，相比传统方法显著提高了任务完成率并减少了截止日期违规。
AI.research_question: 如何通过量化任务需求和能力供给来优化个人生产力？
AI.motivation: 现代生活中任务和责任繁多，决策优先级和资源分配面临挑战，需要一种科学方法来优化生产力。
AI.theoretical_framework: 任务复杂性（需求）与个人能力（供给）的量化模型，强化学习用于能力估计，句子转换器用于任务分析。
AI.method: 使用句子转换器分析任务描述并预测能量需求，通过强化学习估计每日供给能力，将问题形式化为约束优化任务。
AI.findings: SLM系统相比传统方法，任务完成率提高了23%，截止日期违规减少了31%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了任务需求与能力供给的量化模型，并证明了分配算法的收敛性。
AI.practical_contributions: 提供了数值指标和主题洞察，帮助用户在不确定性中做出明智决策，维持可持续生产力。

detail.title:
Enterprise Resource Planning and Customer Relationship

Management Integration: A Systematic Review of Adoption

Models And Organizational Impact
detail.abstract:
In the era of big data, the integration of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and
Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems has emerged as a strategic
necessity for organizations seeking to enhance operational efficiency, drive
intelligent decision-making, and deliver personalized, customer-centric service
experiences. As enterprises increasingly prioritize real-time responsiveness and crossfunctional
coordination, integrated ERP-CRM platforms serve as foundational tools
that unify internal operations with external engagement. This systematic review
investigates the current landscape of ERP-CRM integration by examining existing
adoption frameworks and assessing their impact on organizational performance
and strategic agility. Using PRISMA guidelines, a total of 94 peer-reviewed journal
articles published between 2013 and 2022 were systematically selected from
databases including Scopus, Web of Science, and IEEE Xplore. The literature is
categorized into three primary thematic domains: (1) technological,
organizational, and environmental (TOE) drivers influencing ERP-CRM integration;
(2) implementation frameworks including agile, hybrid, cloud-based, and opensource
models tailored to varying enterprise contexts; and (3) organizational
outcomes such as productivity improvements, enhanced customer retention, datadriven
culture, and value chain synchronization. The findings reveal that integration
success is heavily influenced by factors such as digital infrastructure readiness,
executive leadership involvement, user training, and cross-departmental
collaboration. Big data analytics emerges as a transformative enabler, allowing
organizations to leverage real-time dashboards, predictive algorithms, and AIenhanced
insights for strategic decisions and customer engagement. However,
significant challenges persist, including fragmented data architectures,
interoperability constraints, high implementation and maintenance costs, and
limited adoption in resource-constrained small and medium-sized enterprises
(SMEs). This review contributes to both academic discourse and managerial
practice by synthesizing fragmented research into a unified framework and
proposing a conceptual model for scalable and ethically sound ERP-CRM
integration. The study also identifies key research gaps involving long-term value
realization, SME-specific adaptation models, data governance, and the integration
of explainable artificial intelligence into enterprise platforms.

AI.tldr: 本文通过系统综述研究了ERP与CRM系统整合的现状，分析了其驱动因素、实施框架和组织成果，并提出了一个可扩展的概念模型。
AI.research_question: ERP与CRM系统整合如何影响组织绩效和战略敏捷性？
AI.motivation: 在大数据时代，企业需要整合ERP和CRM系统以提高运营效率和客户服务体验。
AI.theoretical_framework: 技术-组织-环境（TOE）框架用于分析ERP-CRM整合的驱动因素。
AI.method: 采用PRISMA指南，系统筛选了2013-2022年间的94篇同行评审期刊文章。
AI.findings: 整合成功受数字基础设施准备、领导参与、用户培训和跨部门协作等因素影响；大数据分析是关键推动力。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个统一的ERP-CRM整合框架，填补了学术研究的碎片化。
AI.practical_contributions: 为管理者提供了可扩展且符合伦理的整合模型，并指出了中小企业适应性和数据治理等实践挑战。

title: From Roots to Revenue: The Effect of Hometown Ties on Sales Performance
affiliations: Peking University - Guanghua School of Management, Peking University - Guanghua School of Management, Peking University and Peking University, Students

detail.title: From Roots to Revenue: The Effect of Hometown Ties on Sales Performance
detail.abstract: Technological advancements have transformed how salespeople engage with individual consumers, enabling efficient non-face-to-face interactions and transactions. In collaboration with an online education platform, this study examines the impact of hometown ties on sales performance. Using a randomized assignment of salespeople to customers via WeChat, an instant messaging app, we find that shared hometown ties between the two parties significantly improve sales performance, even in the absence of physical interaction. Customer-salesperson pairs from the same hometown achieve a conversion rate 21% higher compared to non-hometown pairs. Further analysis shows that salespeople, when communicating with customers from the same hometown, are more likely to strategically use dialects to foster stronger relational bonds and enhance persuasion. This kind of hometown effect is amplified for customers with more pronounced cultural identities and when hometown ties are more coincidental, highlighting the nuanced interplay of cultural and incidental similarities. Our findings offer valuable managerial insights for optimizing salesforce strategies in digital B2C environments.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了老乡关系对销售绩效的影响，发现老乡关系显著提升销售转化率，尤其在数字化B2C环境中。
AI.research_question: 老乡关系如何影响销售绩效？
AI.motivation: 技术进步改变了销售人员与消费者的互动方式，但非面对面互动中文化因素的作用尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 文化认同理论、关系营销理论。
AI.method: 通过微信随机分配销售人员与客户，比较老乡与非老乡对的销售表现。
AI.findings: 老乡对的销售转化率比非老乡对高21%，销售人员更倾向于使用方言加强关系。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了文化认同和偶然相似性在数字化销售中的交互作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为数字化B2C环境中的销售团队优化策略提供了实用建议。

title: OPTIMIZING GARNISHEE PROCEEDINGS IN NIGERIA: LEVERAGING NIBSS AND BVN TO PREVENT UNWARRANTED BANK INVOLVEMENT
affiliations: Ebonyi State university Abakaliki

detail.title: OPTIMIZING GARNISHEE PROCEEDINGS IN NIGERIA: LEVERAGING NIBSS AND BVN TO PREVENT UNWARRANTED BANK INVOLVEMENT
detail.abstract: Garnishee proceedings are a critical tool for enforcing monetary judgments in Nigeria. However, their misuse has increasingly led to systemic inefficiencies and undue hardship, particularly for banks wrongly joined in proceedings without evidence that they hold the debtor's funds. Creditors frequently list multiple banks arbitrarily, leading to wasted judicial time, inflated legal costs, and disruption of banking operations. This practice contradicts settled legal principles and has raised concerns among courts and stakeholders. With the nationwide adoption of the Bank Verification Number (BVN) and the operational capabilities of the Nigeria Inter-Bank Settlement System (NIBSS), it is now possible to verify the existence of a judgment debtor's account in a specific bank before initiating garnishee proceedings. Yet, this technology remains underutilized in the legal process. This article examines the legal framework governing garnishee proceedings in Nigeria, the burdens placed on financial institutions under current practices, and relevant case law emphasizing that garnishees must not be joined without a factual basis. It further explores the potential of BVN-linked account tracing as a prelitigation verification tool. By assessing the roles of the courts, Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), and NIBSS, the article proposes a reform framework that balances judgment enforcement with financial system integrity.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了尼日利亚扣款程序的滥用问题及其对银行和司法系统的负面影响，提出利用银行验证号码（BVN）和尼日利亚银行间结算系统（NIBSS）技术改进扣款程序的改革框架。
AI.research_question: 如何通过技术手段（如BVN和NIBSS）优化尼日利亚的扣款程序，减少滥用并提高司法效率？
AI.motivation: 扣款程序的滥用导致司法资源浪费、银行运营受阻和法律成本增加，亟需改革。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于尼日利亚扣款程序的法律框架和相关判例法。
AI.method: 通过分析法律框架、判例法和技术潜力（BVN和NIBSS），提出改革建议。
AI.findings: 当前扣款程序存在滥用问题，BVN和NIBSS技术可作为预诉讼验证工具，减少不必要的银行加入。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合技术手段优化扣款程序的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为法院、央行和NIBSS提供了改革建议，以平衡判决执行与金融系统完整性。

title: Assessment of Vegetation Dynamics and Associated Trade-offs in Sub-alpine Grasslands of Bhutan.
affiliations: Jigme Singye Wangchuck National Park. Department of Forests and Park Services. Royal Government of Bhutan.

detail.title: Assessment of Vegetation Dynamics and Associated Trade-offs in Sub-alpine Grasslands of Bhutan.

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The author declares that there is no copeting interest regarding the publication of this work.
declarations.funderStatement: The data collection for this work was made possible with funding support from Bhutan for Life (BFL) project.

detail.abstract: Sub-alpine grasslands in Bhutan play a critical role in sustaining both alpine biodiversity and traditional yak herding livelihoods. However, these grasslands are increasingly threatened by the encroachment of woody species, particularly Juniperus recurva, which diminishes forage availability. This study assessed vegetation dynamics and evaluated the impact of a mechanical pruning intervention implemented in Jigme Singye Wangchuck National Park to restore grassland health and support herders' needs. Using a Before After Control Impact (BACI) design, key vegetation parameters such as species richness, percent cover, palatable biomass, and woody regeneration density were measured in treated and untreated plots. The results showed that pruning significantly reduced the dominance of Juniperus recurva and improved the availability of palatable herbaceous species. Species richness and forage cover increased notably in treated plots compared to controls. Interviews with herders confirmed declining pasture conditions and underscored the relevance of such interventions. The study highlights the effectiveness of targeted mechanical interventions in restoring grassland condition and suggests that integrating ecological research with local herder knowledge can guide sustainable pasture management. These findings contribute to evidence-based conservation planning and offer valuable insights for enhancing the resilience of Himalayan grazing systems under changing environmental conditions.

AI.tldr: 研究评估了机械修剪干预对不丹亚高山草地的植被动态影响，结果显示修剪显著减少了Juniperus recurva的入侵，提高了草地的可用性和牧草质量。

AI.method: 采用BACI设计，测量处理与未处理地块的植被参数（物种丰富度、覆盖率、可食用生物量等）。
AI.findings: 修剪显著减少了Juniperus recurva的入侵，提高了牧草可用性和物种丰富度。

title: Large Language Models for Supply Chain Decisions
affiliations: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) - School of Engineering, Microsoft Research, Microsoft Research and Microsoft Corporation

detail.title: Large Language Models for Supply Chain Decisions

contentType.other: Forthcoming chapter in AI in Supply Chains: Perspectives from Global Thought Leaders, edited by Maxime C. Cohen and Tinglong Dai, and part of the Springer Series in Supply Chain Management (edited by Prof. Chris Tang).

detail.abstract:
Supply Chain Management requires addressing a variety of complex decision-making challenges, from sourcing strategies to planning and execution. Over the last few decades, advances in computation and information technologies have enabled the transition from manual, intuition and experience-based decision-making, into more automated and data-driven decisions using a variety of tools that apply optimization techniques. These techniques use mathematical methods to improve decision-making.

Unfortunately, business planners and executives still need to spend considerable time and effort to (i) understand and explain the recommendations coming out of these technologies; (ii) analyze various scenarios and answer what-if questions; and (iii) update the mathematical models used in these tools to reflect current business environments. Addressing these challenges requires involving data science teams and/or the technology providers to explain results or make the necessary changes in the technology and hence significantly slows down decision making. 

Motivated by the recent advances in Large Language Models (LLMs), we report how this disruptive technology can democratize supply chain technology-namely, facilitate the understanding of tools' outcomes, as well as the interaction with supply chain tools without human-in-the-loop. Specifically, we report how we apply LLMs to address the three challenges described above, thus substantially reducing the time to decision from days and weeks to minutes and hours as well as dramatically increasing planners' and executives' productivity and impact.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了如何利用大型语言模型（LLMs）简化供应链管理中的决策过程，减少对数据科学团队的依赖，并显著提高决策效率。

AI.method: 应用LLMs技术，自动化解释工具结果、分析场景和更新模型。
AI.findings: LLMs能够显著减少决策时间（从天/周到分钟/小时），并提高规划者和高管的效率。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了LLMs在供应链管理中的新应用，扩展了自动化决策的理论边界。
AI.practical_contributions: 通过LLMs实现了供应链工具的民主化，减少了对外部专家的依赖，提升了决策速度和生产力。

title: Measuring the Value of Trademark Distinctiveness: Evidence from the Market for Bordeaux Wines
affiliations: Duke University School of Law, University of Chicago - Law School and The University of Hong Kong - Faculty of Law

detail.title: Measuring the Value of Trademark Distinctiveness: Evidence from the Market for Bordeaux Wines
detail.abstract: The market value of distinctive trademarks is a fundamental assumption of both trademark law and marketing theory. However, there is little empirical evidence underlying this assumption. We examine the relationship between brand dissimilarity and market prices in the context of the Bordeaux wine market. Using a unique dataset covering thousands of wines and their associated prices and professional ratings, we find that brand distinctiveness is related to higher wine prices. We further show that this relationship persists across the wine quality spectrum with both lower quality and higher quality wines benefiting from dissimilar marks. Finally, we show that while there is a dissimilarity price premium for lower quality wines, producers who invest in higher quality wines are rewarded with an even greater premium for dissimilar names in absolute dollar terms.

title: Compassionate Digital Innovation: A Pluralistic Perspective and Research Agenda
affiliations: University of Sydney, Georgia State University - Center for Process Innovation (CEPRIN), affiliation not provided to SSRN, FEIT, University of Melbourne, Swinburne University of Technology, Swinburne Law School, Students and McGill University - Desautels Faculty of Management

detail.title: Compassionate Digital Innovation: A Pluralistic Perspective and Research Agenda

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No competing interests.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Conceptual work.
declarations.funderStatement: Self-funded.

detail.abstract: Digital innovation offers significant societal, economic, and environmental benefits but is also a source of profound harms. Prior Information Systems (IS) research has often overlooked the ethical tensions involved, framing harms as "unintended consequences" rather than symptoms of deeper systemic problems. In response, this paper presents a problematization review that critiques and revises three widely held assumptions about digital innovations: 1) that they generate net benefits that outweigh the associated harm; 2) that their ethicality can be calculated through utility; and 3) that their harms can be mitigated through technological, corporate, or regulatory intervention. We argue that compassion provides a pluralistic ethical foundation that integrates the strengths of consequentialism, deontology, and virtue ethics. This framework prioritises serving all stakeholders, especially the most vulnerable, while avoiding harm. It sets a research agenda focused on addressing structural dysfunctions, amplifying marginalised voices, and fostering sustainable systems. By reimagining digital innovation as a force for the common good, this paper contributes to a more just and equitable digital future for all.

title: When Less Regulation Means More Complexity: The EU AI Liability Directive Withdrawal and its Impact on European Technological Competitiveness
affiliations: Universidade de Santiago de Compostela

detail.title: When Less Regulation Means More Complexity: The EU AI Liability Directive Withdrawal and its Impact on European Technological Competitiveness
detail.abstract: This paper examines the February 2025 withdrawal of the European Commission's AI Liability Directive (AILD) and its implications for European technological competitiveness. Through conceptual policy analysis of EU legislation, communications, and recent developments, we challenge the assumption that deregulation inherently fosters innovation. We demonstrate that eliminating harmonized liability rules creates a paradoxical outcome: increased regulatory complexity through fragmentation across 27 national regimes. This fragmentation disproportionately burdens European AI companies-particularly startups and SMEs-attempting to scale across the Single Market, while advantaging large non-EU tech companies with greater resources to navigate regulatory complexity. Drawing on empirical evidence across sectors, we argue that well-designed liability frameworks can actually catalyze innovation by establishing market certainty, building consumer trust, and creating positive incentives for safety. We propose integrating liability considerations into Europe's broader digital sovereignty strategy through targeted harmonization of specific liability aspects and innovation-enabling frameworks, including regulatory sandboxes and complianceby-design toolkits. This approach positions liability rules as enablers rather than impediments to sustainable technological advancement in the global AI landscape.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了2025年2月欧盟委员会撤回《人工智能责任指令》（AILD）对欧洲技术竞争力的影响，挑战了去监管必然促进创新的假设，并提出协调责任框架可推动创新。

AI.method: 通过概念性政策分析，研究欧盟立法、通信及最新发展。
AI.findings: 去监管导致27国制度碎片化，增加复杂性，对欧洲中小企业不利，而协调责任框架可促进市场确定性和创新。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战去监管促进创新的传统观点，提出责任框架对创新的积极作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议将责任框架纳入数字主权战略，提出协调责任规则和促进创新的工具（如监管沙盒）。

title: The 33 Tactics of Silent Rebellion: How Employees Disengage -And What Leaders Must Learn
affiliations: La Consolacion University Philippines

detail.title: The 33 Tactics of Silent Rebellion: How Employees Disengage -And What Leaders Must Learn
detail.abstract:
In today’s corporate world, a quiet revolution is unfolding — not in boardrooms, but in the hearts and minds of employees. Once loyal, ambitious, and eager to go the extra mile, many have grown disillusioned. They show up, they comply, they meet expectations — but nothing more. Beneath the surface of polished performance metrics, a silent rebellion brews.

This is quiet quitting.

The 33 Tactics of Silent Rebellion: How Employees Disengage — And What Leaders Must Learn by Dr. Christian Anthony R. Flores offers an unflinching look at this phenomenon. Written with the insight of an experienced organizational leader and the rigor of a business scholar, the book decodes the unspoken strategies employees use to withdraw their discretionary effort — and, more importantly, what leaders can do to address it.

Quiet quitting is not a fad. It is not laziness. It is a rational response to cultures of overwork, broken trust, and one-sided loyalty. Employees who quietly disengage are sending a message, and it is time for executives and managers to listen.

This book is not merely a diagnosis of the problem — it is a roadmap to solutions. In its pages, leaders will:

  • Discover the 33 subtle yet powerful tactics employees deploy as silent protests against imbalance and burnout.
  • Understand the psychological contract between employer and employee — and how its violation sparks disengagement.
  • Learn how to spot the early warning signs of quiet quitting and respond with clarity, empathy, and decisive leadership.
  • Reimagine their workplaces as environments where employees willingly bring their best selves, because the culture compels it.

Packed with keen observations, actionable insights, and a pragmatic framework for change, The 33 Tactics of Silent Rebellion is a must-read for executives, HR professionals, and anyone tasked with leading people in the modern workplace.

It challenges leaders to stop looking at disengagement as a personnel problem and start seeing it for what it truly is — a cultural, strategic, and leadership challenge.

Quiet quitting is not the end of engagement. It is the beginning of a deeper conversation about trust, fairness, and meaning at work.

title: The Future of Sustainable Aviation: Navigating the Sociotechnical Matters of Concern
affiliations: SUNY Polytechnic Institute, State University of New York (SUNY) - SUNY Polytechnic Institute, State University of New York (SUNY) - SUNY Polytechnic Institute, OREGON HEALTH & SCIENCE UNIVERSITY and State University of New York (SUNY) - SUNY Polytechnic Institute

detail.title: The Future of Sustainable Aviation: Navigating the Sociotechnical Matters of Concern

declarations.funderStatement: This research was generously supported by grant funding from the Sustainable Aerospace Energy Center at the State University of New York Polytechnic Institute and the College of Business, Center for Business and Applied Ethics.

detail.abstract: This study examines the sociotechnical transition to sustainable aviation by identifying four dominant Matters of Concern (MCs): Innovating, Operationalizing, Prognosticating, and Synchronizing. Using a dictionary-based text analysis across a curated corpus of 781 documents, the research uncovers how these MCs and their associated Points of Contention (PCs) co-occur and interrelate, forming a system of interdependent concerns that shape stakeholder debates. Two system-level predictors—Meta-Trajectories and Engagement—emerge as critical to navigating the sector’s shift from incremental to disruptive innovation. The former reflects the sector’s potential to pivot toward transformative technologies like hydrogen and electrification, while the latter captures the importance of public trust, funding alignment, and social legitimacy. A transition-centric Multi-Criteria Decision Analysis framework is proposed to evaluate trade-offs across technological, operational, regulatory, and sociocultural dimensions. The study also identifies Public-Private Enterprises as key organizing mechanisms to support innovation scaling, infrastructure readiness, and stakeholder coordination. Together, these insights offer a comprehensive model for guiding future research, policy development, and strategic planning in sustainable aviation.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过识别四种主导的‘关注事项’（MCs），探讨了可持续航空的社会技术转型，并揭示了这些MCs及其相关‘争议点’（PCs）如何共同作用，形成影响利益相关者辩论的相互依赖系统。研究提出了一个过渡为中心的多标准决策分析框架，并指出公私合营企业是支持创新扩展和基础设施准备的关键机制。
AI.research_question: 可持续航空的社会技术转型中，主导的‘关注事项’（MCs）及其争议点（PCs）如何共同作用？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在揭示可持续航空转型中的关键争议点和系统级预测因素，为未来研究和政策制定提供指导。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于社会技术转型理论和多标准决策分析框架。
AI.method: 采用基于词典的文本分析方法，分析了781份文档。
AI.findings: 识别了四种MCs及其PCs，提出了系统级预测因素（Meta-Trajectories和Engagement），并建议了公私合营企业作为关键机制。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了社会技术转型理论，提出了MCs和PCs的交互模型。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和企业提供了可持续航空转型的战略框架和决策工具。

title: A Path to Loving
affiliations: Northwestern University and Northwestern University

detail.title: A Path to Loving
detail.abstract: This work lays the foundations for a rigorous ontological characterization for love, addressing its philosophical complexity and scientific relevance-with particular emphasis on psychology and sociology-as well as highlighting ways in which such characterization enhances relevant AI-based applications. The position defended here is that love is best understood as a concatenation of passive sensations (e.g., emotional arousal) and active evaluative judgments (e.g., perceiving the beloved as valuable), in the interest of balancing the involuntary aspects of love with its rational accountability. To provide a structured foundation, the paper draws on Basic Formal Ontology (BFO) and other applied ontological methods to differentiate various senses of love. This work engages with objections to the love understood as concatenation, particularly concerning the relationship between sensation and judgment. A causal correlation model is defended, ensuring that the affective and cognitive components are linked. By offering a precise and scalable ontological account, this work lays the foundation for future interdisciplinary applications, making love a subject of formal inquiry in ontology engineering, artificial intelligence, and among the sciences.

AI.tldr: 本文为爱提供了一个严谨的本体论定义，结合被动感受与主动评价，平衡爱的非理性与理性，并利用形式化本体论方法支持跨学科应用。

AI.method: 采用因果关联模型，将情感与认知成分联系起来，并通过形式化本体论分析。
AI.findings: 爱是情感唤起与价值判断的结合，其本体论定义支持跨学科研究与应用。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出爱的本体论框架，为哲学、心理学和AI领域提供理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 为AI应用（如情感计算）和跨学科研究提供可扩展的本体论工具。

title: Virtual Idols and Well-Being: A New Frontier in Digital Experience
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Hanyang University and Pusan National University

detail.title: Virtual Idols and Well-Being: A New Frontier in Digital Experience
detail.abstract: This research aims to investigate virtual idols’ ability to enhance consumer well-being. Virtual idols have the characteristics of both virtual objects and celebrities, and due to the lack of prior research, the main factors were identified through a focus group interview and qualitative analysis. Through this, we examined fans’ subjective well-being based on authenticity, empathy, non-betrayal, and technological fantasy. In particular, subjective well-being was examined through community belonging and immersion among fans. Structural equation modeling yielded the following results. All variables except authenticity were found to have a positive effect on subjective well-being, and in particular, technological fantasy had a positive effect only when fully mediated by flow. In addition, when examining community engagement and social isolation as moderator variables, only community engagement was found to be significant. Through this study, we aim to provide various implications for related virtual influencer entertainment through consumer well-being.

title: Decolonizing Innovation: Applying the Moleka Grid to National Innovation Systems in
affiliations: African Research Network (ARN)

detail.title: Decolonizing Innovation: Applying the Moleka Grid to National Innovation Systems in
detail.abstract: Most African national innovation systems (NIS) remain entangled in colonial legacies, path dependencies, and donor-driven technological logics that fail to resonate with endogenous capacities and ontological realities. This article applies the Moleka Grid as a diagnostic and redesign framework to interrogate the hidden ontologies underpinning current innovation paradigms in Africa. Using real case studies from Rwanda's innovation hubs, Kenya's digital governance infrastructure, and Nigeria's energy transition programs, we expose deep structural misalignments between the epistemic assumptions of imported models and the systemic logic of African societies. The Moleka Grid enables a shift from imitation to ontological innovation-redesigning NIS as pluriversal ecosystems of transformation grounded in local metaphysics, communal intelligences, and systemic wisdom. We conclude with a proposal for a new architecture of innovation governance rooted in ontological reflexivity, regenerative design, and meta-learning systems.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨非洲国家创新系统（NIS）受殖民遗产和外部技术逻辑影响的问题，提出使用Moleka Grid框架重新设计NIS，以本土智慧和多元生态系统为基础。

title: Public Digital Platforms as Institutional Equalizers: Evidence from India's UPI Ecosystem
affiliations: Indian Institute of Management Visakhapatnam, University of Hyderabad - School of Management Studies and Indian Institute of Management Raipur

detail.title: Public Digital Platforms as Institutional Equalizers: Evidence from India's UPI Ecosystem

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No conflict of interest with any one
declarations.ethicsApproval: Received consent from the participants and it was a classroom exercise. Everyone was briefed about the purpose.
declarations.funderStatement: No funds raised

detail.abstract: Digital platforms have reshaped competition and innovation in financial services, yet most existing Information Systems (IS) research emphasizes firm-level digital capabilities and private platform ecosystems. This study introduces Digital Public Infrastructure (DPuI)—a state-led, open-access digital platform designed to enable participation by digitally under-resourced institutions. Using a mixed-method approach combining a Delphi study with senior banking executives and a panel econometric analysis of transaction data from 30 Indian banks over 2014–2023, we investigate the democratizing and spillover effects of India’s Unified Payments Interface (UPI). Our findings show that UPI disproportionately benefited low-infrastructure banks in expanding mobile banking activity, thereby narrowing the digital performance gap. Furthermore, we observe spillover effects, where enhanced digital engagement led to increased use of traditional banking channels such as debit card transactions. This study contributes to IS research by theorizing DPuI as a platform-based public good that reconfigures participation and value creation in digital ecosystems. We extend platform and coopetition theory by conceptualizing DPuI as an institutional equalizer and a new governance archetype, illustrating how digital public infrastructures can reshape competitive dynamics and enable inclusive innovation at the institutional level.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了印度统一支付接口（UPI）作为数字公共基础设施（DPuI）的民主化和溢出效应，发现其显著帮助低基础设施银行缩小数字绩效差距，并促进传统银行渠道的使用。
AI.research_question: 数字公共基础设施（DPuI）如何影响金融服务的参与和价值创造？
AI.motivation: 现有信息系统研究多关注企业级数字能力和私有平台生态，而忽视了国家主导的开放访问平台对数字包容性的作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 平台理论、合作竞争理论、公共物品理论。
AI.method: 混合方法，包括德尔菲研究（银行高管访谈）和面板计量经济学分析（2014-2023年30家印度银行的交易数据）。
AI.findings: UPI显著帮助低基础设施银行扩大移动银行业务，缩小数字绩效差距，并产生溢出效应（如增加借记卡交易）。
AI.theory_contributions: 将DPuI理论化为平台型公共物品，扩展了平台和合作竞争理论，提出DPuI作为制度均衡器和新治理原型。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者设计数字公共基础设施提供了实践指导，促进金融包容性和创新。

title: Wisdom at Scale: From Concept to Prototype in Augmenting Reflective Agency with AI
affiliations: Independent Researcher

detail.title: Wisdom at Scale: From Concept to Prototype in Augmenting Reflective Agency with AI

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The author declares no financial, institutional, or personal conflicts of interest. This research was conducted independently, without external funding or affiliation, and reflects original work and insight developed through personal study, prototyping, and reflective practice.
declarations.ethicsApproval: This study did not involve human participants, clinical data, or case studies requiring ethical review. Therefore, ethics approval was not required.
declarations.funderStatement: This research received no external funding. It was self-funded and independently conducted by the author as part of an ongoing commitment to ethical, systems-oriented AI development.

detail.abstract: In an era defined by complexity, acceleration, and information overload, wisdom is quietly eroding. This paper introduces the concept of Wisdom Entropy-the systemic breakdown of long-range, ethical, and reflective thinking in complex environments-and proposes a practical response: the Wisdom Layer. This is a modular agentic AI architecture built to mirror, support, and scale reflective agency across diverse systems. Grounded in systems thinking, chaos theory, karmic ethics, and the Moral Nash Paradox, the Wisdom Layer includes four core agents that analyze fragility, ripple effects, ethical impact, and structural drift. A working prototype has been developed and tested on multiple Complex Adaptive Systems (CAS), including IT infrastructure, leadership ecosystems, and democratic institutions. The paper describes core design principles (e.g., Reverse Wisdom Entropy, mirror-not-master, agentic scaffolding) and shares qualitative insights from prototype testing. This work demonstrates that wisdom-often dismissed as intangible-can be made visible, interactive, and extensible. The result is not just a tool, but a cognitive infrastructure for thinking more wisely at scale.

AI.tldr: 本文提出“智慧熵”概念，描述复杂环境中长期、伦理和反思性思维的崩溃，并提出“智慧层”作为解决方案。这是一种模块化AI架构，旨在支持反思性代理。通过原型测试，展示了智慧的可视化与可扩展性。
AI.research_question: 如何在复杂环境中防止智慧熵并支持反思性思维？
AI.motivation: 在复杂、快节奏和信息过载的时代，智慧正在悄然消失，亟需系统性解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于系统思维、混沌理论、因果伦理和道德纳什悖论。
AI.method: 开发并测试了包含四个核心代理（分析脆弱性、涟漪效应、伦理影响和结构漂移）的模块化AI架构原型。
AI.findings: 原型在复杂适应系统（如IT基础设施、领导力生态系统和民主制度）中验证了智慧的可视化与可扩展性。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了智慧熵概念，并展示了智慧可通过AI架构实现系统性支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 提供了一种可扩展的认知基础设施，帮助在复杂环境中实现更明智的决策。

title: Field Experiments on Digital Platforms: An Empirical Lens on Platform Dynamics
affiliations: Gies College of Business, UIUC and Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business

detail.title: Field Experiments on Digital Platforms: An Empirical Lens on Platform Dynamics
detail.abstract: This chapter surveys a growing body of randomized field experiments conducted on digital platforms, which serve as critical tools for disentangling causal effects in complex environments. Drawing on published work from major fields in business administration and economics, we examine interventions targeting consumer demand, supplier behavior, data and privacy issues, AI, and platform business models. Field experiments allow for credible causal inference in live, dynamic settings where user choices, platform design, and algorithmic logic are tightly interwoven. By reviewing findings across domains such as e-commerce, online labor, dating, and social media, we uncover recurring empirical regularities-such as trade-offs between personalization and privacy, transparency and engagement, and automation and trust. The review offers a structured empirical foundation to inform both academic inquiry and applied decision-making.

AI.tldr: 本章综述了数字平台上随机实地实验的快速增长，这些实验是解析复杂环境中因果效应的关键工具。通过分析商业管理和经济学领域的主要研究，探讨了针对消费者需求、供应商行为、数据隐私、人工智能和平台商业模式的干预措施。实地实验在动态环境中提供了可信的因果推断，揭示了个人化与隐私、透明度与参与度、自动化与信任之间的权衡。
AI.research_question: 数字平台上的随机实地实验如何揭示复杂环境中的因果效应？
AI.motivation: 数字平台的复杂性和动态性使得传统研究方法难以准确捕捉因果效应，随机实地实验为解决这一问题提供了有效工具。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于商业管理和经济学的主要理论，特别是关于消费者行为、平台设计和算法逻辑的理论。
AI.method: 综述已发表的随机实地实验研究，涵盖电子商务、在线劳动力、约会和社交媒体等领域。
AI.findings: 揭示了个人化与隐私、透明度与参与度、自动化与信任之间的权衡等实证规律。
AI.theory_contributions: 为数字平台研究提供了结构化的实证基础，推动了因果推断理论的发展。
AI.practical_contributions: 为平台设计、政策制定和商业决策提供了实证依据，帮助平衡技术发展与用户需求。

detail.abstract: With the advancement of technology day by day, societies continue to evolve. In this evolution process, the internet is an indispensable part of our daily lives with its social networking sites. The size of online sharing and the development of information technologies that allow access to and storage of a large number of data have led to the demand for the deletion and prevention of the dissemination of data that individuals do not want to be known by others, or in other words, the "right to be forgotten". The right to be forgotten, which came to the agenda with the Google decision of the Court of Justice of the European Union in 2014, has been the subject of many current national and international regulations and court decisions. The right to be forgotten has gained legal status as a right under the name of "right to erasure" for the first time with the European Union General Data Protection Regulation, which entered into force on 25 May 2018. Although the right to be forgotten has not yet found a place in a legal regulation in Turkey, it is seen that some steps have been taken by the Personal Data Protection Board. This study aims to draw the framework of the right to be forgotten as a whole at the current stage.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了“被遗忘权”在当前技术和社会背景下的法律框架，重点关注其在欧盟和土耳其的发展现状。
AI.research_question: 在当前技术和社会背景下，如何定义和实现“被遗忘权”的法律框架？
AI.motivation: 随着互联网技术的发展，个人数据的共享和存储需求增加，引发了“被遗忘权”的法律需求。本文旨在探讨该权利的法律现状。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于欧盟法院2014年谷歌案判决和欧盟《通用数据保护条例》（GDPR）的理论基础。
AI.method: 通过分析欧盟和土耳其的法律法规及案例，探讨“被遗忘权”的法律框架。
AI.findings: “被遗忘权”已在欧盟通过GDPR获得法律地位，但在土耳其尚未明确立法，仅有一些初步措施。
AI.theory_contributions: 为“被遗忘权”的法律定义和理论框架提供了系统性分析。
AI.practical_contributions: 为土耳其及其他国家在“被遗忘权”立法方面提供了参考。

detail.title: Telecom SIM Subscription Frauds: Global Policy Trends, Risk Assessments and Recommendations

declarations.declarationOfInterest: Not Applicable
declarations.ethicsApproval: Not Applicable
declarations.funderStatement: Not Applicable

detail.abstract:
Effective identity verification solutions are the key to tackling telecommunication Subscriber Identity Module (SIM) card subscription frauds. Subscription fraud involves obtaining customer KYC details needed for signing up for new SIM cards or services with valid authorization but using the SIM cards for fraudulent activities. The effects of the damage done can be catastrophic in terms of financial fraud, poor customer experience, and damage to the brand. Telecom Service Providers (TSPs) face a massive challenge in this regard; they must overcome fraud while staying compliant with Department of Telecommunication (DOT) regulations. Most telecom service providers are currently using standard techniques for customer identity validation and verification, which are ineffective in detecting and controlling subscription fraud.

In this project, the researchers have: (i) Assessed the risks in the current customer identity verification process, (ii) Analysed the SIM registration policies in 160 countries, iii) Proposed multi-channel online identification validation methods, including knowledge-based validation, phone authentication, address validation, and one-time password use. The recommendations proposed are based on a multi-layered risk-based approach that leverages intelligent analytics, predictive decision policies and knowledge-based authentication to enable real-time identity verification and regulatory compliance. The recommendations and report of the project outcome are submitted to Telangana Police.

The project was undertaken under the MOU with Telangana State Police Center of Excellence for Cyber Security.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了电信SIM卡订阅欺诈问题，提出了多通道在线身份验证方法，以改进当前无效的客户身份验证流程，并基于多层风险方法提出建议。
AI.research_question: 如何有效解决电信SIM卡订阅欺诈问题？
AI.motivation: 订阅欺诈导致财务损失、客户体验差和品牌损害，当前的身份验证方法无效。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于多层风险方法，结合智能分析、预测决策策略和知识验证。
AI.method: 评估当前验证流程风险、分析160国SIM注册政策、提出多通道验证方法。
AI.findings: 提出了包括知识验证、电话认证、地址验证和一次性密码的多层验证方法。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合智能分析和预测决策的多层风险验证框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为电信服务提供商提供了实时身份验证和合规性的解决方案，并向警方提交了建议。

title: Study on the Brand Value Enhancement of New Energy Vehicles Based on Consumer Reviews
affiliations: Beijing Information Science and Technology University, Beijing Information Science and Technology University and Beijing Information Science and Technology University

detail.title: Study on the Brand Value Enhancement of New Energy Vehicles Based on Consumer Reviews
detail.abstract: Research on the brand value of new energy vehicles can enhance consumer satisfaction and support the sustainable and healthy development of new energy vehicle enterprises. This paper selects the top five sales models from the "Dongche Di" platform as research subjects. It employs web scraping technology to collect online consumer review data, utilizing word cloud and semantic network analyses to identify and explore the potential correlations in consumer attention. The LDA-LSTM model is applied to classify the primary demands and opinion trends of consumers, capturing the emotional trends and dynamic characteristics of each category. The results indicate that endurance, driving experience, interior space, price range, and high-speed capability are the key considerations for consumers when purchasing new energy vehicle products. Consumers exhibit a higher level of negative emotion regarding driving experience, a lower level of negative emotion concerning interior space, and an overall lack of high satisfaction in emotional tendencies. Based on the four steps of Customer-Based Brand Equity (CBBE), this paper analyzes five consumer-focused aspects: range capability, driving experience, interior space, price range, and highway performance. It proposes recommendations across four dimensions: building a brand identity to enhance salience, refining brand image to crystallize unique value, leveraging brand evaluations to guide encourage feedback, and strengthening customer stickiness loyalty foster brand resonance.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过分析新能源汽车品牌的消费者关注点，利用LDA-LSTM模型分类需求与情感趋势，提出基于CBBE模型的品牌提升建议。
AI.research_question: 消费者在购买新能源汽车时的主要关注点及其情感趋势是什么？
AI.motivation: 提升消费者满意度，支持新能源汽车企业可持续发展。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于CBBE（Customer-Based Brand Equity）模型的四步理论框架。
AI.method: 采用网络爬虫技术收集评论数据，结合词云、语义网络分析及LDA-LSTM模型。
AI.findings: 消费者关注续航、驾驶体验、内饰空间、价格区间和高速性能；驾驶体验负面情绪较高，内饰空间负面情绪较低，整体满意度不高。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了CBBE模型在新能源汽车品牌价值研究中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出从品牌识别、形象塑造、评价引导和客户粘性四个维度提升品牌价值的建议。

title: A Unified and Flexible Approach for Evaluating MEV Systems with Cooperative Games
affiliations: Independent and Donald G. Costello College of Business at George Mason University

detail.title: A Unified and Flexible Approach for Evaluating MEV Systems with Cooperative Games
detail.abstract: A handful of MEV-relevant blockchain proposals-notably proposer-builder separation (PBS), multiple concurrent proposers (MP), and inclusion lists (IL)-are proposed to increase censorship resistance, yet a principled benchmark for "fair" value division among participants is still missing. We adopt the Shapley value from cooperative game theory as that benchmark and argue that an incentive-compatible protocol should allocate rewards close to its Shapley prediction. We develop a unified analytical framework that (i) models four canonical designs (pre-PBS, PBS, MP, IL); (ii) derives closed-form Shapley values for each player class; and (iii) interprets shifts in these values as changes in structural bargaining power. Applying 2024 Ethereum data to the model result under PBS, we estimate concrete Shapley shares and contrast them with observed payouts. The gap is informative: searchers are systematically over-paid, whereas relays are under-compensated-findings that align with recent market structure and rising centralization risk. Our results show how discrepancies between Shapley and realized allocations can flag incentive misalignments and guide protocol tweaks, complementing existing non-cooperative analyses with a holistic cooperative perspective.

AI.tldr: 本文提出采用合作博弈论中的Shapley值作为区块链MEV相关提案中公平价值分配的基准，并通过统一分析框架评估四种设计，发现实际分配与Shapley预测存在差距，揭示了激励错配问题。
AI.research_question: 如何为区块链MEV相关提案中的参与者提供一个公平的价值分配基准？
AI.motivation: 当前缺乏一个原则性的基准来衡量区块链MEV相关提案中的公平价值分配，导致激励错配和中心化风险。
AI.theoretical_framework: 合作博弈论中的Shapley值。
AI.method: 开发统一分析框架，建模四种设计（pre-PBS、PBS、MP、IL），推导各参与者类别的Shapley值，并分析其变化。
AI.findings: 实际分配与Shapley预测存在差距：搜索者被过度支付，而中继者被低估，这与市场结构和中心化风险一致。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出Shapley值作为公平分配的基准，补充了现有非合作分析的合作视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 通过Shapley值与实际分配的差距识别激励错配，为协议调整提供指导。

title: Three Lessons from Spotify's Personalization Paradox
affiliations: Avyayam Holdings, Singapore Management University - Lee Kong Chian School of Business and University of California Berkeley

detail.title: Three Lessons from Spotify's Personalization Paradox

declarations.funderStatement: This research was supported by the Ministry of Education (MOE), Singapore, under its Academic Research Fund (AcRF) Tier 2 Grant, No. MOE-T2EP40221-0008.

detail.abstract: Spotify's AI DJ created a personalization paradox: the feature, designed to enhance user experience through generative AI, alienated users. Our analysis of 1,400+ user comments reveals this gap stemmed from a perceived loss of user control and mismatched expectations from the human-like AI. From this, we derive three actionable lessons for IS leaders: restore user control to build trust, manage expectations for human-like AI, and balance AI safety with scalable value.

AI.tldr: Spotify的AI DJ功能旨在通过生成式AI提升用户体验，却因用户感到失去控制和对类人AI的期望不匹配而适得其反。基于1400多条用户评论的分析，本文提出了三条对信息系统领导者的实用建议。
AI.research_question: Spotify的AI DJ功能为何在提升用户体验的同时引发了用户疏离感？
AI.motivation: 探讨生成式AI在个性化服务中的实际效果与用户预期之间的差距，为信息系统领导者提供实践指导。
AI.theoretical_framework: 个性化悖论、用户控制理论、AI期望管理理论。
AI.method: 分析1400多条用户评论，识别用户对AI DJ功能的主要不满和期望。
AI.findings: 用户因感到失去控制和对类人AI的期望不匹配而产生疏离感。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了个性化悖论理论，强调了用户控制在AI驱动服务中的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为信息系统领导者提供了三条实践建议：恢复用户控制、管理类人AI期望、平衡AI安全性与可扩展价值。

title: Reducing Identity Theft
affiliations: University of Wisconsin-Madison

detail.title: Reducing Identity Theft
detail.abstract: Over the last few decades, society has been transformed by the creation of a global marketplace of goods and ideas, all available at a click of a button. Not only has this innovation facilitated the rapid diffusion of information, but it has also given consumers the ability to engage with companies all over the world. And while this isn’t necessarily a bad thing, and in most cases it is a good thing, it has become an issue with companies being able to gather more information on individuals than ever before. This has, in turn, drastically increased the cost of outside actors stealing valuable information from companies, of which they use to commit identity theft. Therefore, with companies not accounting for this cost when they collect information, it has created a negative externality within society. That is why I recommend that the Senate Committee on the Judiciary create and recommend a policy called Preemptive Measures. This policy would state that any entity that holds the critical information of 10,000 or more individuals would be required to not only share what information they are collecting, sharing, and storing, with their customers, but they would also be required to give their customers the ability to delete their critical information.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了全球化市场中公司收集个人信息的负面影响，并提出了一项名为“预防措施”的政策建议，要求公司透明化信息收集行为并允许客户删除关键信息。
AI.research_question: 如何解决公司收集个人信息带来的社会负外部性问题？
AI.motivation: 全球化市场使公司能够收集大量个人信息，但未考虑信息泄露的成本，导致社会负外部性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 负外部性理论、信息经济学。
AI.method: 政策建议分析。
AI.findings: 提出“预防措施”政策，要求公司透明化信息收集行为并允许客户删除关键信息。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了负外部性理论在信息经济学中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了解决信息泄露问题的具体建议。

title: Patentability of AI-Generated Inventions Under Turkish Law in Light of DABUS Decisions
affiliations: Ondokuz Mayis University and Ondokuz Mayis University

detail.title: Patentability of AI-Generated Inventions Under Turkish Law in Light of DABUS Decisions
detail.abstract: The rise of inventive artificial intelligence (AI) systems that challenge the traditional boundaries of human inventiveness has prompted a renewed inquiry into the role of patent law. This Article investigates whether Turkish patent law currently allows for, or should allow for, the recognition of AI systems as inventors. Drawing on an interdisciplinary, doctrinal, and comparative legal methodology, it assesses the claim that AI systems, such as DABUS, can independently generate patentable inventions. Despite assertions of full autonomy, the Article finds that human input remains indispensable throughout the invention process—including during the training, configuration, and problem-formulation stages—undermining the basis for recognizing AI systems as inventors under existing legal definitions. A comparative review of international case law reveals consistent legal resistance to AI inventorship: patent offices and courts in the United Kingdom, European Patent Organization, United States, Germany, and Australia have uniformly rejected DABUS-based applications. Even where statutes do not explicitly define 'inventor,' all jurisdictions agree—either normatively or judicially—that only natural persons can hold this status. The Article also analyzes Turkish law in light of these developments. Although the Turkish Industrial Property Code (SMK) does not define 'inventor,' it attaches personal rights and obligations to the inventorship, such as moral rights and disclosure duties, which inherently imply the need for legal personality. In addressing ownership claims over AI-generated inventions, the Article evaluates whether the doctrine of accession or other instances of involuntary legal transfer—such as inheritance upon death or equitable subrogation—could justify conferring rights on a person other than the human inventor. However, none of these scenarios neatly map onto the case of AI outputs, which are not natural fruits or extensions of human labor in the traditional legal sense. The Article finds that applying the doctrine of accession to intangible, non-biological AI-generated outputs stretches the logic of the principle beyond recognition and introduces unacceptable legal uncertainty. In light of these findings, the Article proposes a future-oriented solution: creating a sui generis category of 'machine inventions,' under which limited patent protection could be granted to natural or legal persons who materially invest in or train AI systems that produce such inventions. This would shift the legal focus from the identity of the inventor to the legitimacy of the investment and ensure legal certainty while preserving incentives for innovation.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨土耳其专利法是否应承认AI系统为发明者，通过比较法分析发现现有法律框架下AI无法独立成为发明者，并提出未来可能的解决方案。
AI.research_question: 土耳其专利法是否应承认AI系统为发明者？
AI.motivation: AI系统挑战传统人类发明边界，引发专利法角色重新审视。
AI.theoretical_framework: 专利法、AI发明权、法律人格理论。
AI.method: 跨学科、教义学与比较法分析。
AI.findings: AI无法独立成为发明者，人类输入不可或缺；国际案例一致拒绝AI发明权。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出AI发明权法律框架的不足与未来方向。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议创建‘机器发明’新类别以平衡创新激励与法律确定性。

title: Labor Market Adjustment to Generative AI: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
affiliations: University of Massachusetts Amherst

detail.title: Labor Market Adjustment to Generative AI: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
detail.abstract: A key question in labor economics and the economics of technology is how general-purpose technologies affect labor market adjustment and employment dynamics. I provide new empirical evidence on this question by studying the effects of generative AI (GenAI), the fastest consumer technology diffusion in history, on labor markets using ChatGPT's unexpected November 2022 release as a quasi-experimental shock. Using difference-in-differences estimation across industries with varying GenAI exposure, I find a simultaneous tripartite pattern of displacement, job creation, and coordination failures as high-exposure industries exhibit significant increased layoff rates, decreased quit rates and job openings, and delayed hiring gains.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了生成式AI（GenAI）对劳动力市场的影响，发现高暴露行业出现裁员率上升、离职率和职位空缺下降以及招聘延迟的三重模式。
AI.research_question: 通用技术（如生成式AI）如何影响劳动力市场的调整和就业动态？
AI.motivation: 生成式AI是历史上扩散最快的消费技术，其影响尚未被充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 劳动力经济学和技术经济学。
AI.method: 利用ChatGPT在2022年11月的意外发布作为准实验冲击，采用双重差分法分析不同行业对GenAI的暴露程度。
AI.findings: 高暴露行业出现裁员率上升、离职率和职位空缺下降以及招聘延迟的三重模式。
AI.theory_contributions: 为通用技术对劳动力市场的影响提供了新的实证证据。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和企业提供了关于GenAI对就业动态影响的参考。

title: Picture It or Type It: Comparing Visual and Textual Search in E-Commerce
affiliations: University of Chile - Industrial Engineering and University of Maryland - Department of Marketing

detail.title: Picture It or Type It: Comparing Visual and Textual Search in E-Commerce

declarations.declarationOfInterest: None
declarations.funderStatement: The first author gratefully acknowledges partial funding by ANID Chile (Grants PIA AFB230002 and Fondecyt No 1221711) and the Institute for Research in Market Imperfections and Public Policy (IS130002 ANID).

detail.abstract: Visual search technologies have become an established feature of contemporary digital platforms, with major companies such as Google, Bing, and Amazon already integrating them into their search interfaces. This study compares the effectiveness of visual and text-based search technologies in e-commerce. Using over 2 million search instances across 21 product categories, we find that image-based searches generate significantly higher click-through rates (CTR), with user attention more concentrated on top-ranked results. However, these increased clicks do not translate into higher conversion rates. Our analyses suggest that visual searches support a "targeted exploration" process: users have a clear idea of the product they seek but are not yet ready to purchase. The findings reveal distinct roles for visual and text-based search tools in consumer journeys and provide insights for platform design and marketing strategy.

AI.tldr: 本研究比较了电子商务中视觉搜索与文本搜索的效果，发现视觉搜索的点击率更高，但转化率未提升，揭示了两种搜索工具在消费者旅程中的不同作用。
AI.research_question: 视觉搜索与文本搜索在电子商务中的效果有何差异？
AI.motivation: 视觉搜索技术已成为数字平台的常见功能，但其在电子商务中的实际效果尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于消费者行为理论和搜索技术研究。
AI.method: 分析了21个产品类别中的200多万次搜索实例。
AI.findings: 视觉搜索的点击率显著高于文本搜索，但转化率未提高；用户注意力集中在排名靠前的结果。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了视觉搜索支持“目标探索”过程，丰富了消费者行为理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为平台设计和营销策略提供了视觉与文本搜索工具差异化应用的见解。

title: Generative AI as a Tourism Actor: Reconceptualising Experience Co-creation, Destination Governance and Responsible Innovation in the Synthetic Experience Economy
affiliations: International Hellenic University - School of Economics & Business, Zayed University and International Hellenic University (IHU)

detail.title: Generative AI as a Tourism Actor: Reconceptualising Experience Co-creation, Destination Governance and Responsible Innovation in the Synthetic Experience Economy

publicationDetails.detailsText: Journal of Tourism, Heritage & Services Marketing (JTHSM), Vol.11, No.2, pp.16-41. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.16562068
publicationDetails.journalName: Journal of Tourism, Heritage & Services Marketing

detail.abstract:
Purpose: This conceptual study examines how Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) reshapes value co creation, destination governance, and responsible innovation in tourism. It seeks to reposition GenAI from a backstage tool to a tourism actor and to present the Synthetic Experience System, a triadic framework connecting Tourist, GenAI, and Place/Community through data, content, and emotion layers. 

Methods: The paper follows an integrative theory building approach. It abductively synthesises tourism literature, information systems, marketing, psychology and ethics to surface recurring constructs, situates them within the service dominant logic and the actor-network theory, and iteratively refines a model through comparison of GenAI applications focusing on responsible research and innovation. 

Results: Analysis reveals three continuous co creation loops that circulate agency among actors and four boundary conditions-authenticity, bias, sustainability, privacy-that determine system viability. The Synthetic Experience System clarifies where value emerges, identifies points of potential value co destruction, and yields fifteen research propositions spanning tourist cognition, firm capabilities, destination policy, and planetary carbon limits. 

Implications: The framework provides a roadmap for destination management organisations, platform designers, and regulators to audit algorithms, design participatory prompts, and adopt carbon aware deployment. By naming actors, layers, and boundaries, the study offers a shared vocabulary that can anchor empirical investigations and stimulate cross disciplinary citations in tourism, information systems, and sustainability research.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了生成式人工智能（GenAI）如何重塑旅游中的价值共创、目的地治理和负责任创新，提出了一个连接游客、GenAI和地点/社区的‘合成体验系统’框架。
AI.research_question: 生成式人工智能如何重塑旅游中的价值共创、目的地治理和负责任创新？
AI.motivation: 将GenAI从后台工具重新定位为旅游参与者，并提供一个理论框架以指导实践。
AI.theoretical_framework: 服务主导逻辑（Service-Dominant Logic）和行动者网络理论（Actor-Network Theory）。
AI.method: 采用综合理论构建方法，结合旅游、信息系统、营销、心理学和伦理学文献，通过归纳和比较分析提炼模型。
AI.findings: 揭示了三个持续的共创循环和四个边界条件（真实性、偏见、可持续性、隐私），并提出了15个研究命题。
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了一个‘合成体验系统’框架，明确了价值共创的机制和潜在破坏点。
AI.practical_contributions: 为目的地管理组织、平台设计者和监管者提供了算法审计、参与式提示设计和碳感知部署的路线图。

title: Extreme Temperatures and Non-Work at Work
affiliations: University of Zaragoza, University of Zaragoza and University of Zaragoza - Department of Economic Analysis

detail.title: Extreme Temperatures and Non-Work at Work

publicationDetails.journalName: IZA Institute of Labor Economics Discussion Paper Series

detail.abstract: Understanding the determinants of worker effort is central, as even small changes in productivity can have significant implications for economic growth and labor market performance. This study examines the relationship between extreme temperatures and work effortproxied by non-work time while at the workplaceusing the ATUS 20032019. Results indicate that extremely hot days (? 100ºF) are related to increased time spent at work not working, particularly among women in non-supervised occupations. On these days, women in non-supervised occupations spend 6.79 more minutes at work not working compared to comfortable temperature days. Men, by contrast, do not exhibit significant changes in non-work time at work. Furthermore, the results align with increased worker bargaining power during economic expansions, which facilitates labor supply adjustments on extremely hot days, and with hypotheses regarding adaptation and acclimation to high temperatures in warmer counties. These findings underscore the relevance of temperature as a determinant of worker effort, reveal a previously overlooked margin of labor adjustment, and highlight the moderating role of occupational supervision in shaping behavioral responses to environmental stressors.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨极端高温对工人努力程度的影响，发现高温导致女性在非监督岗位的非工作时间增加，而男性无显著变化。结果支持工人议价能力和适应高温的假设。

AI.method: 使用ATUS 2003-2019数据，分析极端高温与非工作时间的关系。

title: Reducing the Digital Divide for Marginalized Households
affiliations: University of Bologna - Department of Economics, University of Bologna, Department of Economics and University of Bologna

detail.title: Reducing the Digital Divide for Marginalized Households

publicationDetails.journalName: IZA Institute of Labor Economics Discussion Paper Series

detail.abstract: Digital skills are increasingly essential for full participation in modern life. Yet many low-income families face a dual digital divide: limited access to technology and limited ability to use it effectively. These gaps can undermine adults' ability to support their children's education, restrict access to public services, and reduce their own employability. Despite growing policy attention, rigorous evidence on how to close these gapsespecially among disadvantaged adults in high-income countriesremains scarce. We evaluate the impact of a comprehensive digital inclusion program in Turin, Italy, targeting 859 low-income families with school-aged children. Participants were randomly assigned to a control group or one of two treatment arms, each combining a free tablet with internet access and digital literacy training of different durations. One year later, treated participants reported large improvements in daily technology use and digital skills, as measured by the "Digital Skills Indicator 2.0" (DSI) developed by Eurostat. Parents also became more confident in guiding their children's online activities, more engaged in digital parenting, and more likely to access public services digitally. We find no effects on employment or job search behavior, but treated participants expressed greater optimism about future training prospects. The effects are statistically similar across the two training intensities, suggesting that (i) once basic barriers are removed, digital engagement can become self-sustaining, and/or (ii) that the returns to digital training are strongly diminishing. Mediation analysis confirms that digital skills  not just access  are key drivers of broader behavioral and economic outcomes. Sequential effects are particularly strong in the domains of social inclusion and parenting. The findings underscore the importance of addressing both financial and learning constraints and suggest that bundled interventions can foster inclusive digital participation.

AI.tldr: 本文评估了意大利都灵一项针对低收入家庭的数字包容计划，发现免费设备和数字素养培训显著提升了参与者的数字技能和日常技术使用，但对就业影响有限。

title: Are Exposure Bucks Worth It? Evidence from Instagram
affiliations: Johns Hopkins University - Carey Business School and Rotman School of Management

detail.title: Are Exposure Bucks Worth It? Evidence from Instagram
detail.abstract: Using Instagram's recently introduced collaborative post feature, which lets brands credit creators in shared posts seen by the brand's followers, this study quantifies the value of exposure to a brand's audience for small creators. We collect a new dataset which consists of all collaborative posts between 260 large beauty/clothing brands and small creators, as well as a daily panel of follower counts for creators. Leveraging the high frequency of the panel, we identify changes in creators' follower counts after the collaborative post in a difference-in-differences analysis. We address creator and post content selection through propensity score matching, using creator characteristics and LLM-derived visual content embeddings to match treatment and control posts. Our estimates suggest that exposure to a brand's audience through a collaborative post increases a creator's cumulative followers by 0.47%, or roughly one week's worth of growth. Although larger brand audiences lead to more growth all else equal, larger brands tend to have less engaged followers and lower quality collaborative posts. This leads to stable treatment effects from collaboration with brands that have between 0.7m and 8.6m followers. The top 10% of collaborations average 2.1% follower growth for the creator. Our average conversion rate from brand followers to creator followers is similar to the effect of online display ads estimated in the literature.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用Instagram的协作帖子功能，量化了小创作者通过品牌受众曝光获得的价值。研究发现，协作帖子平均带来0.47%的粉丝增长，效果与在线展示广告相似。

AI.motivation: 探讨品牌协作对小创作者的影响，填补关于社交媒体曝光价值的研究空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 社交媒体营销、创作者经济、品牌合作效应。
AI.method: 采用双重差分法分析协作帖子对粉丝增长的影响，并使用倾向得分匹配处理选择偏差。
AI.findings: 协作帖子平均带来0.47%的粉丝增长，效果稳定且与品牌粉丝规模无关。
AI.theory_contributions: 量化了品牌协作对小创作者的价值，丰富了社交媒体营销的理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为品牌和小创作者提供了协作效果的实证依据，指导社交媒体合作策略。

title: Beyond the Pilot: Scaling the Africa Methane Abatement Bond to Accelerate the Green Transition
affiliations: Policy Action Initiative and Policy Research Initiative

detail.title: Beyond the Pilot: Scaling the Africa Methane Abatement Bond to Accelerate the Green Transition
detail.abstract: Cutting methane emissions is a critical pillar in Africa's climate mitigation strategy. While the continent contributes 14% of global methane emissions, only 2% of global climate finance is allocated toward addressing this potent greenhouse gas. This paper examines the Africa Methane Abatement Bond (AMAB) as an innovative financial mechanism to bridge this gap and help countries attain their Nationally Determined Contributions. Anchored in a multi-phase framework and piloted in Angola, Egypt, and Nigeria, AMAB aims to unlock sustainable finance for methane mitigation, focusing on key sectors such as agriculture, energy, and waste. Through a synthesis of financing trends, sector-specific data, and institutional frameworks, this paper proposes pathways for scaling AMAB continent-wide. It advocates for standardized project aggregation, policy coherence, and green bond certification systems aligned with global standards. The paper concludes that scaling the AMAB can position Africa as a leader in methane abatement while catalyzing its transition to a resilient, inclusive green economy.

AI.tldr: 非洲甲烷减排债券（AMAB）是一种创新金融机制，旨在填补非洲甲烷减排资金缺口，帮助国家实现国家自主贡献。通过多阶段框架和在安哥拉、埃及、尼日利亚的试点，AMAB聚焦农业、能源和废弃物等关键领域，提出标准化项目聚合、政策协调和绿色债券认证体系，以推动其在非洲大陆的规模化应用。

title: Multilateral Development Bank Ratings and Preferred Creditor Status
affiliations: Risk Control Limited, Center for Global Development and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Multilateral Development Bank Ratings and Preferred Creditor Status
detail.abstract: This paper analyzes influences on the credit standing of Multilateral Development Banks (MDBs). We focus on the quality, diversification and single name concentration of their portfolios, and on the market practice known as Preferred Creditor Status (PCS). PCS refers to the fact that sovereigns which default on other debt rarely fail to meet their obligations to MDBs. The paper examines how rating agencies assess MDB ratings, looking, in particular, at how Standard & Poor’s (S&P) evaluates capital adequacy. We benchmark the agency’s approach against an industry-standard, ratings-based Credit Risk Model (CRM). We implement the approaches for a specific MDB: the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB).The paper shows that S&P’s approach is highly conservative in its treatment of single name concentration risk and makes insufficient allowance for PCS. Calibrating the CRM with risk-neutral distributions, we examine the effect of PCS on MDB funding spreads.

title: Housing Wealth Appreciation and Household Consumption: Evidence from A Regression Discontinuity Design

detail.title: Housing Wealth Appreciation and Household Consumption: Evidence from A Regression Discontinuity Design

keywords: Regression discontinuity design JEL Codes: key1

detail.abstract: This work examines the impact of housing wealth on two household economic behaviours: consumption and savings through a regression discontinuity identification strategy according to a housing policy implemented in 2006. Results show that the positive impact of this housing policy on housing wealth growth significantly fosters household consumption per capita by around 1275 yuan. Further, this work analyses the heterogeneous effect of consumption categories, hukou status, and year of education on household consumption and savings. The analysis finds that food consumption has been significantly encouraged; residents who hold urban hukou, have received intermediate education and high education, consume more, compared to those with low education, tend to decrease their consumption. Lastly, residents with intermediate education are likely to reduce savings, while low and high-education residents would save more.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过回归断点设计分析了2006年住房政策对住房财富的影响，发现其对家庭人均消费有显著促进作用（约1275元），并探讨了消费类别、户籍和教育年限的异质性效应。

title: Predictive Maintenance in Power Transformers: A Systematic Review of AI and IoT Applications
affiliations: Western Illinois University, International American University (IAU), Independent  and Lamar University

detail.title: Predictive Maintenance in Power Transformers: A Systematic Review of AI and IoT Applications
detail.abstract: Power transformers are critical assets in electrical power systems, and their failure can result in costly downtime and catastrophic grid disruptions. This systematic review investigates the emerging role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Internet of Things (IoT) technologies in enabling predictive maintenance (PdM) of power transformers. Drawing upon 126 peer-reviewed articles published between 2015 and 2024, this review categorizes and synthesizes state-of-the-art techniques involving sensor integration, real-time condition monitoring, data fusion, machine learning (ML), deep learning, and digital twin frameworks. The analysis reveals a growing trend toward hybrid PdM models that leverage transformer health indices, vibration and thermal imaging, dissolved gas analysis (DGA), and partial discharge (PD) data. Neural networks, support vector machines, decision trees, and ensemble methods dominate the AI approaches, while IoTbased sensor networks and cloud-edge computing architectures underpin the system infrastructures. Key challenges identified include data heterogeneity, cybersecurity vulnerabilities, high initial costs, and lack of standardization in deployment practices. This review concludes that integrating AI and IoT in transformer maintenance not only enhances fault detection and failure prediction but also supports asset lifecycle optimization and grid resilience. The findings contribute to academic research and industrial applications by providing a consolidated framework for future development, standardization, and policy formulation in smart grid systems.

title: Determinants of Infrastructure Development in Kenya
affiliations: University of Eldoret and Northwestern Polytechnical University

detail.title: Determinants of Infrastructure Development in Kenya
detail.abstract: Empirical research on the macroeconomic factors influencing infrastructure development has yielded inconclusive results, with significant variations observed across studies. This study examines the determinants of infrastructure development in Kenya using a time series data analysis framework, with data spanning from 2003 to 2024. The study's main estimates use the generalized-method-of-moments (GMM) estimator that allows us to account for the potential endogeneity of the infrastructure and explanatory variables through the use of instruments. The results of this study showed that economic growth, public debt, and foreign direct investment have a significant positive influence on infrastructure development in Kenya. Interestingly, urbanization does not have a significant impact, suggesting that this factor may be less influential in infrastructure expansion. These results have significant policy implications. In order to promote infrastructure development, Kenya needs to achieve sustainable economic growth, manage public debt cautiously, and attract foreign direct investment. These findings underline the need for tailored infrastructure development policies that account for the unique macroeconomic structures and policies that influence infrastructure development and facilitate additional investment in infrastructure in Kenya.

title: Helping Under Haze: Evidence from Lost-Letter Field Experiments in Beijing and Delhi
affiliations: University of Western Australia - Department of Economics, University of Western Australia and Central University of Finance and Economics (CUFE)

detail.title: Helping Under Haze: Evidence from Lost-Letter Field Experiments in Beijing and Delhi
detail.abstract: We conduct lost-letter field experiments in Beijing and Delhi to examine whether—and in what direction—ambient air pollution influences helping behavior. Using real-time air quality data and instrumental variables—thermal inversion in Beijing and agricultural burning with wind conditions in Delhi—we find higher levels of air pollution significantly increase the likelihood that individuals post lost letters. The effect is specific to posting, not mere pickup, and most consistent for PM10, the coarser and more perceptually salient pollutant. When PM2.5 and PM10 are jointly included, only PM10 remains significant, consistent with a salience-based psychological mechanism: pollution discomfort prompts helping as a coping response. These patterns are immediate, replicable across cities, and stronger in settings with greater discomfort.

detail.title: Comments on the Commission's Proposals for Reviving the European Securitisation Market
detail.abstract:
The European Commission has issued proposals for reviving the European securitisation market by moderating the stringency of prospective Basel rules for qualifying Simple, Transparent and Standardised (STS) securitisations. This paper sets out the background to these proposals, analyses impediments to their success and suggests remedies.

The key issue on which we focus is the hierarchy of approaches to determining capital requirements for securitisation. The current proposals, while containing some positive developments, retain heavy dependence on agency ratings. The US authorities have successfully removed such dependence by the general use of formulae-based approaches and the flexibility brought by the use of proxy inputs. We see no reasons why Europe cannot do likewise. While we are hopeful that solutions can be found, we argue that defects in the hierarchy of approaches available to European banks may still vitiate the Commission’s effort to restore securitisation activity.

The Commission has left unchanged several other problematical features of the Basel Committee’s securitisation capital framework. These include the dependence of risk weights on tranche rather than asset maturity (which, we argue, is contrary to European Single Market precepts), and some inappropriate aspects of the capital formulae (such as non-risk sensitive treatment of junior mezzanines and the rewarding of poor asset performance).

We propose simple solutions that would improve the coherence of the proposals and significantly increase the likelihood that the market will indeed revive.

AI.tldr: 欧洲委员会提出通过调整巴塞尔规则对简单、透明和标准化（STS）证券化的严格性来复兴欧洲证券化市场。本文分析了这些提案的背景、成功障碍及改进建议。

AI.method: 分析当前提案的问题，并提出改进建议。
AI.findings: 当前提案存在资本公式不合理、风险权重依赖分档而非资产期限等问题。

AI.practical_contributions: 提出了改进提案的具体建议，以促进市场复兴。

detail.abstract: The aim of a tax neutral system is that any decisions made by the taxpayer should be made on their economic strengths rather than on any potential tax incentive or disincentive. This chapter explores the theory behind tax neutrality and its benefits, the key features of a neutral tax system and its challenges in implementing them. The chapter discusses how the concept of tax neutrality applies to Gibraltar's tax system and whether its tax system is effective in achieving neutrality.

title: Capital Floors, the Revised SA and the Cost of Loans in Switzerland
affiliations: University of Zurich - Department of Banking and Finance, Risk Control Limited and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Capital Floors, the Revised SA and the Cost of Loans in Switzerland
detail.abstract: The Basel Committee plans to revise the Standardised Approach (SA) to bank capital for credit risk and to employ the revised SA as a floor for bank capital based on internal models. The changes are likely to have a major impact on the overall level of capital and its distribution across banks and asset classes. This paper examines the effects of the proposed changes in capital rules on the Swiss loan market. Using primarily public information, we estimate the effects on the capital of individual Swiss banks broken down by asset class. We infer what this is likely to imply for lending rates in the Swiss market. We find that the proposed rule changes would substantially boost capital overall, affecting most severely capital for Corporate and Specialised Lending exposures. Under the BCBS 347 proposals, total bank capital would rise 39% while capital for Corporate and Specialised Lending exposures would increase by 142% and 130%, respectively. This allocation of capital across asset classes is inconsistent with the lessons of the recent financial crisis which was triggered by the collapse of the US residential mortgage market and involved relatively little impact on the quality of corporate credit. By our calculations, bank spreads for corporate loans would rise by between 63 and 103 basis points.

AI.tldr: 巴塞尔委员会计划修订信用风险的标准化方法（SA），并将其作为基于内部模型的银行资本底线。这一变化可能对资本总量及其在银行和资产类别间的分配产生重大影响。本文研究了这些资本规则变化对瑞士贷款市场的影响，发现资本总量将大幅增加，尤其是企业和专业贷款类别的资本需求。
AI.research_question: 巴塞尔委员会提出的资本规则修订对瑞士贷款市场的影响是什么？

AI.theoretical_framework: 巴塞尔协议框架下的资本监管理论。
AI.method: 主要使用公开信息，估算瑞士各银行按资产类别划分的资本变化，并推断对贷款利率的影响。
AI.findings: 修订后的规则将显著增加资本总量，企业和专业贷款类别的资本需求分别增加142%和130%，可能导致企业贷款利差上升63至103个基点。

AI.practical_contributions: 为银行和监管机构提供了资本规则修订对瑞士贷款市场的具体影响分析。

title: The Imperative of Blockchain Education for Nigerian Legal Professionals
