title: A comprehensive review of regional innovation policy research: policy paradigms, evolution and underexplored topics
affiliations: Universidad Nacional de Río Negro and Universidad Nacional de Río Negro

detail.title: A comprehensive review of regional innovation policy research: policy paradigms, evolution and underexplored topics
detail.abstract: Although regional innovation policy (RIP) has gained relevance in recent decades, the literature still lacks a comprehensive review. Beyond addressing this gap, the article challenges several limitations and interpretations of previous studies. First, RIP constitutes a substantial and coherent field, rather than a subtype of (national) innovation policies. Second, RIP extends beyond the commonly reviewed studies on regional innovation systems (RIS) and smart specialization strategies (S3), encompassing other underexplored issues. Third, RIP topics are framed across all three innovation policy paradigms, not just within the innovation systems tradition. Fourth, besides distinguishing long-term and emerging topics, our analysis reveals four phases in RIS evolution (including the latest challenge-oriented turn) and rejects that S3 derives from RIS. Finally, the article highlights remaining gaps and future research and policy agendas.

AI.tldr: 本文填补了区域创新政策（RIP）文献的空白，挑战了先前研究的局限性，提出了RIP作为一个独立领域的观点，并揭示了其演变的四个阶段。
AI.research_question: 区域创新政策（RIP）是否构成一个独立的研究领域？其演变过程如何？
AI.motivation: 尽管RIP在近几十年中日益重要，但文献中仍缺乏全面综述，且对RIP的界定和演变存在误解。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于创新政策范式的三个传统（创新系统、挑战导向等），分析了RIP的演变。
AI.method: 文献综述与分析，挑战先前研究的局限性。
AI.findings: RIP是一个独立且连贯的领域，其演变包括四个阶段，且S3并非源于RIS。
AI.theory_contributions: 明确了RIP的独立性及其演变阶段，挑战了现有理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为未来研究和政策制定提供了方向，填补了现有研究的空白。

title: Schrödinger's Sparsity in the Cross Section of Stock Returns
affiliations: Reichman University - Interdisciplinary Center (IDC) Herzliyah, City University of Hong Kong (CityU), City University of Hong Kong (CityU) and City University of Hong Kong (CityU)

detail.title: Schrödinger's Sparsity in the Cross Section of Stock Returns
detail.abstract: This paper proposes Schrödinger's Sparsity, a Bayesian asset pricing framework that treats sparsity as a latent feature to be inferred rather than imposed. Departing from conventional models that assume either sparse or dense structures ex ante, our approach learns the probability of sparsity in both mispricing (alphas) and factor loadings (betas) directly from the data. Empirically, we find that alphas are considerably sparser than betas, and that sparsity varies systematically with asset complexity, pricing difficulty, and macroeconomic conditions. By allowing model complexity to emerge endogenously, our method yields interpretable, adaptive, and high-performing predictions, offering a principled bridge between sparse selection and dense shrinkage approaches.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为“薛定谔稀疏性”的贝叶斯资产定价框架，将稀疏性视为待推断的潜在特征，而非预先假设。与传统模型不同，该方法直接从数据中学习定价错误（alphas）和因子载荷（betas）的稀疏概率。实证结果表明，alphas比betas稀疏得多，且稀疏性随资产复杂性、定价难度和宏观经济条件系统性变化。通过内生地生成模型复杂性，该方法提供了可解释、自适应且高性能的预测，为稀疏选择和密集收缩方法之间架起了桥梁。
AI.research_question: 如何通过贝叶斯框架动态推断资产定价模型中的稀疏性，而非预先假设稀疏或密集结构？
AI.motivation: 传统资产定价模型通常预先假设稀疏或密集结构，缺乏灵活性。本文旨在提出一种更灵活的方法，直接从数据中学习稀疏性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于贝叶斯统计框架，将稀疏性视为潜在特征，结合资产定价理论。
AI.method: 提出“薛定谔稀疏性”框架，通过贝叶斯推断从数据中学习alphas和betas的稀疏概率。
AI.findings: alphas比betas稀疏得多，且稀疏性随资产复杂性、定价难度和宏观经济条件系统性变化。
AI.theory_contributions: 为资产定价模型提供了一种动态推断稀疏性的新理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 该方法提供了可解释、自适应且高性能的预测，为实际资产定价决策提供了新工具。

title: The Early Public-Private Challenge of Commercializing Orbital Space: Comsat-Intelsat and Matters of Concern
affiliations: SUNY Polytechnic Institute and OREGON HEALTH & SCIENCE UNIVERSITY

detail.title: The Early Public-Private Challenge of Commercializing Orbital Space: Comsat-Intelsat and Matters of Concern

declarations.funderStatement: This research received generous support from the Sustainable Aerospace Energy Center at the State University of New York Polytechnic Institute and the College of Business, Center for Business and Applied Ethics.

detail.abstract: This study investigates the early commercialization of orbital space through a sociotechnical case analysis of the Comsat-Intelsat Network (CIN)-the first and only publicprivate enterprise (PPE) implemented in outer space. Drawing on the Matters of Concern (MCs) framework, it identifies and analyzes four core sociotechnical controversies that shaped CIN's trajectory: commercialization, stabilization, prognostication, and systematization. The research highlights how CIN's PPE model balanced government oversight with private innovation under conditions of low technological readiness, geopolitical tension, and systemic uncertainty. The findings reveal that successful PPEs require adaptive governance, inclusive stakeholder coordination, and pragmatic foresight. By extrapolating lessons from CIN, the study proposes a forward-looking framework for structuring PPEs in cislunar and interplanetary development, offering new insights for managing complexity in the next phase of space commercialization.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过社会技术案例分析Comsat-Intelsat网络（CIN），探讨了轨道空间的早期商业化，提出了适应未来太空商业化的治理框架。
AI.research_question: 如何在低技术准备度、地缘政治紧张和系统性不确定性的条件下，通过公共私营合作（PPE）模式实现轨道空间的商业化？
AI.motivation: 研究CIN作为首个太空领域的PPE案例，旨在为未来太空商业化提供治理和管理复杂性的经验。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于“关注事项”（MCs）框架，分析CIN中的商业化、稳定化、预测化和系统化四大社会技术争议。
AI.method: 采用社会技术案例分析方法，研究CIN的历史轨迹及其PPE模式。
AI.findings: 成功的PPE需要适应性治理、包容性利益相关者协调和务实的前瞻性。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了基于CIN经验的PPE治理框架，拓展了太空商业化的理论视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为未来月球和行星际开发的PPE提供了结构化建议，帮助管理复杂性。

title: Bridging Epistemologies: Integrating Faith into STEM Education and Its Impact on Student Learning Outcomes
affiliations: African Leadership University, Open Christian University and African Leadership University

detail.title: Bridging Epistemologies: Integrating Faith into STEM Education and Its Impact on Student Learning Outcomes
detail.abstract: Background: Global STEM reforms increasingly privilege technical proficiency while sidelining moral teleology, leaving graduates adept with code but adrift on questions of purpose. This study advances a Scripture-anchored, interdisciplinary framework that reunites scientific inquiry with a Christian worldview and empirically tests its influence on student learning. Methodology: Adopting a qualitative-dominant mixed-methods design, we executed an AI-assisted meta-synthesis of 180 peer-reviewed sources (2019-2025) and triangulated those insights with multi-site case studies of Wheaton College (USA), Daystar University (Kenya), and Redeemer University (Canada). Data-curricula, alumni surveys, and classroom artefacts-underwent thematic coding and cross-case pattern matching, generating testable propositions linking faith-based instruction, epistemic coherence, and learning outcomes. Results: Across contexts, faith-integrated STEM programmes exhibited markedly greater cognitive engagement, deeper ethical reasoning, and heightened spiritual formation than secular comparators. Meta-synthesised effect sizes (Hedges g = 0.35-0.55) show that explicit biblical framing elevates moral-reasoning and purpose metrics, with the most pronounced gains among students previously unfamiliar with faith-learning integration. Key mediators include faculty integration skill, mission-aligned accreditation standards, and culturally attuned pedagogy. Conclusions: Positioning sola Scriptura as the ultimate epistemic authority does not dilute scientific rigour; it re-humanises STEM by welding empirical facts to transcendent purpose. The proposed framework supplies educators, policymakers, and accreditation bodies with a scalable roadmap for producing technically competent, ethically resilient graduates equipped to steward AI, biotechnology, and green-tech frontiers. Future research should deploy longitudinal, multi-institutional designs and neurocognitive measures to further validate the model's causal pathways and global applicability.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于圣经的跨学科框架，将科学探究与基督教世界观结合，并通过实证研究验证其对学生学习的影响。研究发现，信仰整合的STEM项目在认知参与、伦理推理和灵性塑造方面优于世俗项目。
AI.research_question: 如何通过基于圣经的跨学科框架重新结合科学探究与基督教世界观，并验证其对STEM学生学习的影响？
AI.motivation: 全球STEM改革过于侧重技术能力而忽视道德目的，导致毕业生缺乏对人生意义的思考。本研究旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于圣经的跨学科框架，强调信仰与科学的结合。
AI.method: 采用定性为主的混合方法设计，包括AI辅助的元综合分析和多地点案例研究（美国、肯尼亚、加拿大）。
AI.findings: 信仰整合的STEM项目在认知、伦理和灵性方面表现更优，效果量显著（Hedges g = 0.35-0.55）。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种将信仰与科学结合的框架，验证了其对学习效果的积极影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为教育者、政策制定者和认证机构提供了可扩展的框架，以培养技术能力强且道德坚韧的毕业生。

title: The overlapping model of earnings, cash flows, and accruals
affiliations: University of Denver and University of Denver - School of Accountancy

detail.title: The overlapping model of earnings, cash flows, and accruals
detail.abstract: We challenge a pervasive assumption in financial accounting research that cash flows and accruals are mutually exclusive components of earnings (the "earnings component model") and introduce an alternative model of earnings, cash flows, and accruals based on the observation that earnings and cash flows are partially overlapping summary measures of firm performance (the "overlapping model"). Rather than splitting earnings into cash flows and accruals, the overlapping model splits earnings and cash flows into "overlaps" (cash transactions included in earnings) and two types of accruals: (1) "inclusions" (non-cash transactions included in earnings) and (2) "exclusions" (cash transactions excluded from earnings). We demonstrate that the two models may produce contradictory inferences on the Financial Accounting Standards Board's (FASB) assertion that earnings are more informative than cash flows about future cash flows. Our findings illustrate the importance of separately considering overlaps, inclusions, and exclusions when comparing the informativeness of earnings and cash flows. Data Availability: All data are available from the public sources cited in the text.

AI.tldr: 本文挑战了财务会计研究中关于现金流和应计项目是收益的互斥组成部分的普遍假设，提出了一种基于收益与现金流部分重叠的新模型（“重叠模型”），并展示了其对未来现金流信息性的影响。
AI.research_question: 现金流和应计项目是否完全互斥？收益与现金流的重叠部分如何影响其信息性？
AI.motivation: 传统模型假设现金流和应计项目互斥，但实际中收益与现金流存在重叠，这可能影响对收益信息性的评估。
AI.theoretical_framework: 提出“重叠模型”，将收益和现金流分为重叠部分（收益中包含的现金交易）和两种应计项目（收益中包含的非现金交易和收益中排除的现金交易）。
AI.method: 理论建模与实证分析，使用公开数据验证模型。
AI.findings: 传统模型与重叠模型可能得出相反的结论，特别是在评估收益对未来现金流的预测能力时。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战传统假设，提出更全面的收益与现金流关系模型。
AI.practical_contributions: 为会计准则制定者（如FASB）提供更准确的收益信息性评估工具。

title: When is Less More? Bank Arrangements for Liquidity vs Central Bank Support *
affiliations: University of Chicago - Booth School of Business, New York University (NYU) - New York University and New York University (NYU)

detail.title: When is Less More? Bank Arrangements for Liquidity vs Central Bank Support *
detail.abstract: Theory suggests that in the face of fire-sale externalities, banks have incentives to overinvest in order to issue excessive money-like deposit liabilities. The existence of a private market for insurance such as contingent capital can eliminate the overinvestment incentives, leading to efficient outcomes. However, it does not eliminate fire sales. A central bank that can infuse liquidity cheaply may be motivated to intervene in the face of fire sales. If so, it can crowd out the private market and, if liquidity intervention is not priced at higher-than-breakeven rates, induce overinvestment. We examine various forms of public intervention to identify the least distortionary ones. Our analysis helps understand the historical prevalence of private insurance in the era preceding central banks and deposit insurance, their subsequent disappearance, as well as the continuing incidence of banking crises and speculative excesses. * We are grateful to Agustin Carstens, Anastasios Dosis, Kristin Forbes (discussant), Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas (discussant)

AI.tldr: 论文探讨了银行在面临抛售外部性时过度投资的动机，以及私人保险市场和央行干预的影响。研究发现，私人保险市场可以消除过度投资动机，但无法消除抛售行为；央行干预可能挤出私人市场并引发新的扭曲。
AI.research_question: 银行在面临抛售外部性时如何平衡私人保险市场和央行干预的影响？
AI.motivation: 理解银行过度投资的动机及其对金融稳定的影响，以及私人市场和公共干预的作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于抛售外部性和银行过度投资的理论框架。
AI.method: 理论分析，探讨不同形式的公共干预。
AI.findings: 私人保险市场可消除过度投资动机，但无法消除抛售；央行干预可能挤出私人市场并引发新的扭曲。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了私人保险市场和央行干预的相互作用及其对金融稳定的影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了减少干预扭曲的建议，帮助理解历史上的金融现象。

title: Financial Risk and Investment in Artificial Intelligence in the USA: A Fresh Evidence from Quantile Wavelet Regression and Quantile Wavelet Correlation Tests

detail.title: Financial Risk and Investment in Artificial Intelligence in the USA: A Fresh Evidence from Quantile Wavelet Regression and Quantile Wavelet Correlation Tests
detail.abstract: The present study aims to capture the co-movement between financial risk and Investment in Artificial Intelligence in the USA using novel approaches, which are Quantile in ADF Unit Root, Quantile Wavelet Regression, and Wavelet Quantile Correlation Tests. The outcomes clearly reveal that financial stability and investment in artificial intelligence in the USA are positively correlated at different quantiles and time-periods.

title: THE EVOLUTION OF LEGAL KNOWLEDGE WORK IN AN AGE OF BRILLIANT(?) TECHNOLOGIES: FROM ROBO-LAWYER TO DIGITAL LAW CLERK
affiliations: University of Melbourne - Melbourne Law School and University of Melbourne - Law School

detail.title: THE EVOLUTION OF LEGAL KNOWLEDGE WORK IN AN AGE OF BRILLIANT(?) TECHNOLOGIES: FROM ROBO-LAWYER TO DIGITAL LAW CLERK
detail.abstract: Generative AI (genAI) is being hailed by legal technology insiders and many in the profession as a major disruptive force within the legal practice ecosystem. Unlike earlier forms of digital innovation, genAI has the potential to support and possibly take over at least some of the diagnostic and analytical functions performed by human lawyers. It thus adds a new dimension to the debate over how (and how much) AI will be a substitutive technology, displacing humans from knowledge work, and how it might serve to augment and enhance human expertise in performing knowledge roles. At present, however, we have relatively little objective understanding of how it is being used and the scale of its impact on what lawyers in Australia actually do. This paper takes a two-pronged approach to this question. First, we explore the potential and prospective impact of emerging AI technologies through a new taxonomy of four ideal types (archetypes) that seek to capture different, emergent, substitutive and augmentative patterns of AI-enabled legal knowledge work. Secondly, we examine the current impact of genAI on legal work from three perspectives: the limited data on its current deployment in Australia; an analysis of the nature of legal competence, and activity analysis drawing on empirical studies of lawyers' use of time. On the basis of this analysis, we argue that, by virtue of a mix of cultural, economic, and technical constraints, genAI is both unevenly distributed across the legal ecosystem, and currently over-hyped, operating chiefly as a kind of 'digital law clerk', substituting for and augmenting human work on only a limited range of lower level diagnostic tasks. Looking to the future, our analysis indicates that whether genAI and later AI iterations can become more broadly augmentative and transformative of the legal function, will depend on the technology's capacity to move safely through our more complex archetypes, taking on more sophisticated analytical and inferential tasks, and demonstrating a wider range of skills that reflect the more human qualities of lawyering. If it can do this, then our archetypal change model suggests the profession might yet be on the cusp of a period of significant adaptation not just to its legal work practices, but to the law business model and perhaps even underlying professional identity constructs. We conclude by identifying some directions for future research suggested by this analysis.

AI.tldr: 生成式AI（genAI）被法律技术专家视为法律实践生态系统的重大颠覆力量，可能取代或增强律师的诊断和分析功能。本文通过四种理想类型（原型）分类探讨其潜在影响，并基于澳大利亚律师的实际使用数据、法律能力分析及时间使用研究，指出genAI目前主要作为“数字法律助理”，仅替代和增强低层次任务。未来其能否广泛变革法律职能，取决于技术能否处理更复杂的任务。
AI.research_question: 生成式AI如何影响法律实践中的知识工作？其潜在和实际影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 当前对genAI在法律实践中的实际使用和影响缺乏客观理解，需填补这一研究空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于四种理想类型（原型）的分类框架，探讨AI在法律知识工作中的替代和增强模式。
AI.method: 1. 通过原型分类探讨潜在影响；2. 从澳大利亚律师的实际使用数据、法律能力分析和时间使用研究三方面分析当前影响。
AI.findings: genAI目前主要作为“数字法律助理”，仅替代和增强低层次任务，且分布不均。未来其广泛变革潜力取决于技术能否处理更复杂任务。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出四种原型分类框架，为理解AI在法律知识工作中的替代和增强模式提供理论工具。
AI.practical_contributions: 为法律行业提供genAI实际应用现状的分析，并指出未来技术发展的关键方向。

title: Achieving Sustainable Development Goals： a Perspective on Urban Climate Policy in China
affiliations: Capital University of Economics and Business, Capital University of Economics and Business, Capital University of Economics and Business and Capital University of Economics and Business

detail.title: Achieving Sustainable Development Goals： a Perspective on Urban Climate Policy in China

keywords: Evolutionary Game model. PSOAG Clustering Early warning system

detail.abstract: Fostering urban sustainable development within the climate policy is an important topic in China. In this paper, an evolutionary game theory is constructed to analyze the strategic interactions between city governments regarding the adoption of climate policies, integrating both synergistic and spillover effects across categories. And a structural equation model (SEM) is utilised to elucidate the mediating mechanisms of innovation and green efficiency on the transmission pathways from climate policy to sustainability results. Empirical findings suggest that punitive climate policies, such as environmental taxes or emission charges, are positively associated with improvements in green innovation and green efficiency, thereby advancing sustainable development. If innovation can effectively converts into increased green efficiency, supportive climate policies, such as fiscal incentives and subsidies, are more efficacious in fostering innovation, which can further augment sustainability either directly or indirectly. However, subsidies may lead to rent-seeking behavior or resource misallocation, failing to stimulate innovation and potentially undermining sustainability outcomes. Specifically, in eastern cities or leading cities with higher levels of sustainability, punitive climate policies are more effective at improving green innovation, while supportive policies are better suited to promote general innovation. Conversely, in western or lagging cities, punitive policies may suppress innovation due to limited absorptive capacity, and supportive policies fail to deliver meaningful improvements in green efficiency. These findings underscore the need for context-specific policy design and differentiated adjustments. Furthermore, for cities identified by the early warning system as being at risk of sustainability, climate policies should be promptly recalibrated.

AI.tldr: 本文通过演化博弈论和结构方程模型分析了中国城市政府在气候政策中的策略互动及其对可持续发展的影响，发现惩罚性政策对绿色创新和效率有积极效果，而支持性政策在创新转化高效时更有效，但需注意资源分配问题。

AI.findings: 惩罚性政策促进绿色创新和效率；支持性政策在创新转化高效时更有效，但可能引发资源错配。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了气候政策对可持续发展的中介机制和情境依赖性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为城市差异化政策设计和调整提供了实证依据。

title: Analysis symbolic of the Executive Branch from cultural legitimacy in Colombia Executive Branch, Culture and Legitimacy
affiliations: EDUKIVOTOS

detail.title: Analysis symbolic of the Executive Branch from cultural legitimacy in Colombia Executive Branch, Culture and Legitimacy
detail.abstract: This article carries out a cultural and sociological analysis of Title VII-"On the Executive Branch"-of the 1991 Colombian Political Constitution, using Émile Durkheim's notion of moral cohesion and the philosophy of legal positivism as theoretical bases. It studies whether the institutional design of the executive branch corresponds to the principles established in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UDHR), especially in relation to access to public administration, accountability, and legal equality. Furthermore, it examines whether the articles that comprise this title are consistent with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), emphasizing SDG 10 (reduction of inequalities), SDG 16 (strong institutions), and SDG 17 (partnerships for development). From a symbolic and territorial reading, gaps in citizen appropriation of executive institutionality are identified, and a reinterpretation of its legitimacy is proposed from the perspective of Colombian sociocultural diversity.

title: Technical and Calibration Challenges in the U.S. Basel III Endgame Rulemaking for Credit Risk
affiliations: INDEPENDENT RESEARCH PAPER

detail.title: Technical and Calibration Challenges in the U.S. Basel III Endgame Rulemaking for Credit Risk

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The views expressed herein—including the framing and interpretation of issues raised in the comment letters—are solely the author’s and do not represent the views of the author’s former employer or any industry association. For full disclosure, the author participated in the industry workgroups and contributed to the industry’s feedback on B3E NPR.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Not applicable
declarations.funderStatement: None

detail.abstract:
In July 2023, U.S. regulatory agencies issued a proposal for the Basel III Endgame (B3E NPR), the updated capital rules for banks. The U.S. version of B3E deviated substantially from the standards of the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (BCBS) and would have increased capital requirements for large banks significantly—an industry study projected a rise of 25% to 30%. Due to the scale of the proposed increase, the NPR faced strong opposition from banks, their clients, elected officials, and public interest groups. Although the agencies announced plans to re-propose the framework to address the concerns last year, the issues raised remain unresolved today.

The Federal Reserve Board recently announced a plan for a comprehensive capital regulation reform. The resolution of the B3E proposal—arguably, the “endgame of the Endgame”—is a core part of this effort.

This article provides an in-depth yet accessible summary and analysis of feedback on the B3E NPR, focusing on credit risk weights, counterparty credit risk, and CVA. These issues are critical to the corporate lending and financial market businesses of large banks. While certain headline concerns have garnered significant media and academic attention, many other crucial topics remain inaccessible to a broader audience due to their complexity and the extensive technical details spread across hundreds of pages.

The resolution of the issues from two years ago is critical to a successful rulemaking since it will shape the formation of the most important building blocks of B3E—capital treatments for loans, derivatives, and securities financing transactions (SFTs). This article aims to help interested readers understand the issues and their impacts using simple language. Some of the topics discussed stem from deliberate policy decisions to raise capital to a desired level, while others are “unintentional but consequential,” reflecting material unintended consequences of either purposeful supervisory choices or inadvertent drafting issues.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了美国监管机构提出的Basel III Endgame（B3E NPR）资本规则更新提案，重点关注信用风险权重、对手方信用风险和CVA问题，并探讨其对大型银行的影响。

title: When Big is Slow: Tax-motivated Income Shifting and Dividend Payouts of Korean Chaebols after the Transition to a Territorial Tax System
affiliations: Kookmin University

detail.title: When Big is Slow: Tax-motivated Income Shifting and Dividend Payouts of Korean Chaebols after the Transition to a Territorial Tax System
detail.abstract: This study examines how the organizational characteristics of chaebols affect the agility of taxplanning decision-making. Using the transition from a worldwide to territorial tax system in South Korea in 2023 as a quasi-exogenous shock, the analysis shows that multinational corporations (MNCs) significantly increased tax-motivated income shifting and dividend payouts following the reform. However, among MNCs, chaebol firms were less responsive than non-chaebol firms. The results suggest that the complex and hierarchical organizational structures of chaebols hinder swift strategic adjustments in response to tax-policy changes. This study expands and diversifies the literature on the organizational characteristics of chaebols by presenting empirical evidence challenging prior findings that chaebols are always more aggressive than non-chaebols in tax avoidance.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了财阀的组织特征如何影响税务规划决策的敏捷性，发现财阀因复杂的层级结构在应对税改时反应较慢。
AI.research_question: 财阀的组织特征如何影响其税务规划决策的敏捷性？
AI.motivation: 利用韩国2023年税制改革的准外生冲击，研究财阀与非财阀跨国公司在税务规划上的差异。
AI.theoretical_framework: 财阀组织特征与税务规划敏捷性的关系。
AI.method: 利用韩国税制改革的准外生冲击，分析财阀与非财阀跨国公司的税务规划行为。
AI.findings: 财阀企业对税改的反应较慢，表明其复杂的层级结构阻碍了快速战略调整。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战了财阀在税务规避上总是更激进的观点，丰富了财阀组织特征的研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和企业提供了财阀组织特征影响税务规划的实证证据。

title: DEVISE : Depth-Aware Vegetation Indexing System
affiliations: University of Rochester, University of Rochester, University of Rochester, University of Rochester and University of Rochester

detail.title: DEVISE : Depth-Aware Vegetation Indexing System
detail.abstract: Urban greenness is most meaningful at the pedestrian scale, yet most current metrics rely on coarse satellite imagery or street-view indices that ignore depth. We introduce DEVISE-the Depth-Aware Vegetation Indexing System-an endto-end pipeline that combines Mask2Former panoptic segmentation, MiDaS monocular depth estimation, and HSV filtering to compute distance-weighted canopy, grass, and understory shares from Google Street View (GSV) images. Applied to 1,441,746 panoramas collected every 20 m along the road networks of 60 U.S. swing counties (2004-2024), DEVISE produces the first county-month panel of street-level greenness spanning two decades. DEVISE improves on prior approaches in three key respects. First, relative to the Panorama-View Green View Index (PVGVI) of Zhang et al. (2023), it replaces a CNN backbone with a transformer, introduces depth weighting, and disaggregates vegetation classes, thereby eliminating far-field bias and reducing color-based false positives. Second, compared with the scalable Green View Index framework of Xia et al. (2021), DEVISE restores semantic precision in cluttered scenes and reduces over-estimation by pairing depth cues with spectral post-processing. Third, unlike the tree-species detector of Choi and Lee (2022), which is accurate but computationally demanding, DEVISE prioritizes longitudinal scalability, processing the national panel in six months of cloud compute while preserving perceptual realism. This study also offers a quantitative demonstration of DEVISE 's capabilities. Regression analyses show that a one-percentage-point increase in the most recent Democratic presidential vote share is linked to a 0.52-0.71 percentage-point gain in depth-adjusted total greenness after controlling for climate and socioeconomic covariates; this association remains robust with county and month fixed effects (R 2 ≈ 0.91-0.99). These findings imply that partisan alignment translates into observable street-level environmental benefits, highlighting the political significance of urban forestry. To facilitate replication and extension, all code, trained weights, and a commandline interface will be released as the open-source devise Python package. By integrating transformer segmentation, depth-aware weighting, and rigorous social science validation, DEVISE establishes a new benchmark for scalable, policy-ready audits of perceptual equity in urban environments.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了DEVISE系统，一种结合深度感知的植被指数计算方法，通过改进现有技术，提供了更精确的街道级绿化度量，并展示了其在政治与环境关联研究中的应用。
AI.research_question: 如何开发一种深度感知的植被指数系统（DEVISE），以更准确地量化街道级绿化，并分析其与政治因素的关联？
AI.motivation: 现有绿化度量方法依赖卫星图像或忽略深度的街景指数，无法准确反映行人尺度的绿化情况，亟需一种更精确的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Mask2Former全景分割、MiDaS单目深度估计和HSV过滤技术，结合深度加权和植被分类，构建DEVISE系统。
AI.method: 通过Google街景图像，结合深度感知和光谱后处理，计算距离加权的树冠、草地和下层植被比例，生成20年的县级月度面板数据。
AI.findings: DEVISE显著优于现有方法，消除了远场偏差和颜色误判，并在政治关联研究中发现民主党得票率与绿化率呈正相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出首个结合深度感知和植被分类的街道级绿化度量系统，为城市环境感知公平性研究提供新工具。
AI.practical_contributions: DEVISE系统开源，支持政策制定者进行城市绿化审计，并揭示了政治因素对城市绿化的影响。

title: The Tax on Hope: Why GST's 'Actionable Claim as a Good' Fiction is a Legal Absurdity
affiliations: GSTbyMM

detail.title: The Tax on Hope: Why GST's 'Actionable Claim as a Good' Fiction is a Legal Absurdity

keywords: H. Anraj v. Government of Tamil Nadu

detail.abstract:
The Goods and Services Tax (GST) regime’s treatment of specified actionable claims—lottery, betting, horse racing, casinos, and online money gaming—presents a significant doctrinal and constitutional anomaly. While the law generally excludes actionable claims from the tax net, it carves out these specific categories, classifying them as taxable “goods.” This paper argues that the central flaw in this approach is not merely one of discriminatory treatment under Article 14, but a more fundamental error in classification.

Our central thesis is that the law irrationally bifurcates economically identical transactions—services that create a contingent right—by mistaking the customer’s desire (the hope for a prize) for the operator’s supply (the performance of a service).

Through a comparative analysis with non-contentious parallels such as insurance policies and extended warranties, the paper establishes that the consistent legal principle is to tax the underlying supply of a service, not the consequential actionable claim. It then deconstructs the supplies in the specified categories, concluding they are, in substance, services of participation, entertainment, and management.

We further demonstrate that this misclassification renders the legal fiction of an “actionable claim as a good” entirely redundant, as the GST framework is already equipped to tax the revenue from these underlying services. Ultimately, we conclude that this forced classification is not only doctrinally incoherent and textually superfluous but also constitutionally suspect, straining the definition of “goods” under Article 366(12). It creates a contorted legal landscape that requires judicial reconsideration to restore logical consistency and constitutional alignment to India’s indirect tax law.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了印度商品与服务税（GST）对特定可诉索赔（如彩票、赌博、赛马、赌场和在线金钱游戏）的处理方式，指出其分类错误及宪法问题。
AI.research_question: GST对特定可诉索赔的分类是否合理？
AI.motivation: 现行法律将某些可诉索赔错误分类为“商品”，导致法律和宪法上的不一致。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于法律分类原则和宪法第14条及第366(12)条的分析。
AI.method: 比较分析法，对比保险政策和延长保修等非争议性案例。
AI.findings: 特定可诉索赔实质上是服务，而非商品；现行分类导致法律冗余和宪法问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了法律分类错误的理论根源，提出服务视角的税收框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议司法重新审视GST分类，以恢复逻辑一致性和宪法合规性。

title: Analysis of Dropouts from IITs and Central Institutions
affiliations: Central University of Jammu

detail.title: Analysis of Dropouts from IITs and Central Institutions
detail.abstract: This article investigates the alarming dropout rates of students from Scheduled Caste (SC), Scheduled Tribe (ST), and Other Backward Classes (OBC) in India's premier higher education institutions, including IITs, IIMs, and Central Universities. Framed against a backdrop of historical and ongoing caste-based oppression, the analysis posits that these dropouts are not isolated failures but symptoms of pervasive "social toxicity" and systemic marginalization that impacts individuals from prenatal stages to posthumous rites. The study aims to critically deconstruct the conventional narrative that attributes these dropouts primarily to financial constraints or individual academic shortcomings, arguing that such explanations are often a "policy polemic" that obscures the more profound challenges of caste-based discrimination, social alienation, and a non-inclusive institutional climate. Employing a multifaceted approach, the article synthesizes quantitative data on dropout rates and entrance examination performance with qualitative analysis of case studies, institutional practices, and policy critiques. Key findings reveal that over 13,600 reserved category students dropped out between 2018 and 2023. Analysis of JEE and CAT entrance scores demonstrates that while performance gaps persist, they are often narrower than portrayed and are decreasing, challenging the simplistic narrative of "lack of merit." The paper identifies the primary drivers of attrition as systemic issues, including persistent microaggressions, social and academic isolation, inadequate and culturally insensitive support systems, and institutional apathy. Evidence is drawn from the struggles of faculty from marginalized backgrounds, discriminatory practices such as mess hall segregation, and the stark contrast between these issues and institutional priorities. The article concludes that attributing dropouts to superficial causes allows institutions to evade the necessary work of dismantling systemic barriers. It calls for a paradigm shift from focusing solely on access to ensuring retention through proactive measures, including fostering genuine inclusivity, implementing robust and empathetic support systems, and holding institutional leadership accountable for creating equitable environments where all students can thrive.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了印度顶尖高等教育机构中来自SC、ST和OBC背景学生的高辍学率，指出辍学现象是系统性社会毒性和边缘化的表现，而非单纯的财务或个人学术问题。
AI.research_question: 印度顶尖高等教育机构中SC、ST和OBC学生高辍学率的主要原因是什么？
AI.motivation: 揭示辍学现象背后的系统性社会毒性和边缘化问题，挑战将辍学归因于财务或个人学术能力的传统叙事。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于种姓制度的历史和现实背景，分析社会毒性和系统性边缘化对教育的影响。
AI.method: 结合定量数据（辍学率和入学考试成绩）与定性分析（案例研究、制度实践和政策批判）。
AI.findings: 2018至2023年间有超过13,600名保留类别学生辍学；入学考试成绩差距在缩小，但系统性歧视和社会孤立是主要辍学原因。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战了传统关于辍学原因的叙事，提出社会毒性和系统性边缘化的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 呼吁从单纯关注入学机会转向确保学生留存，提出具体措施如建立包容性支持系统和问责制度。

title: How Terrorism has Impacted Global Security: A Case Study of the Boko Haram Insurgents in Northern Nigeria
affiliations: Coventry University

detail.title: How Terrorism has Impacted Global Security: A Case Study of the Boko Haram Insurgents in Northern Nigeria

declarations.ethicsApproval: This study was approved by the Coventry University Ethics Committee as a high-risk project. Certificate of Ethical Approval was granted on 01 April 2021.

detail.abstract: In recent times, especially after the attack on U.S in 2001, the world has seen the destructive impact of terrorism and have brought to the world’s attention the proliferation of terrorist groups like the Boko Haram sect, since the beginning of their violent attacks in Northern Nigeria, there has been an enormous loss of lives and properties. Boko Haram that was formerly known to be a machete yielding group with no arms sophistication now poses as a threat to global security. It has been argued that Boko Haram is now more ruthless compared to AlQaeda terrorist group due to their violent activities like the kidnapping of 276 Chibok girls, the killing of both Christians and Muslims, bombing of the United Nations structure in Abuja, kidnapping and killing of foreigners in Nigeria and have even extended attacks to neighbouring countries like Chad, Cameroun and Niger. An extensive argument has been established on the level of threat that Boko Haram poses to global security. Though some persons see Boko Haram as a regional threat, others regard it as an existential threat to the society particularly global security. In order to foster global security in the international scene, multilateral organisations were created with a collective agreement to aid with global issues and security with organisations like the U.N, however, these organisations have failed to help Nigeria to completely end Boko Haram violent activities in Nigeria. The realism theory helps to explain why idealism has failed to curb out terrorism in the international arena, this is due to the selfish nature of the international system. Boko Haram has adversely impacted Nigeria and global security, the global community ought to come together to end Boko Haram’s violent activities and possibly end terrorism altogether to foster global security.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了博科圣地恐怖组织对全球安全的威胁，分析了其暴力活动的破坏性影响，并指出国际组织在应对此类威胁时的局限性。

AI.method: 文献分析与案例研究，聚焦博科圣地的暴力活动及其影响。

title: Talking Green: The Impact of Climate-Related ECB Announcements on Green Bond Markets
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Talking Green: The Impact of Climate-Related ECB Announcements on Green Bond Markets
detail.abstract: This paper analyzes the impact of climate-related ECB communication on green bond returns. Green bonds play a crucial role in financing the transition to a carbon-neutral economy, and while the ECB cannot directly finance sustainable projects, its strategy and communication are key tools to influence market expectations. Using an event study combined with Structural Topic Modeling (STM), we examine 40 climate-related ECB announcements between 2019 and 2023. Our results show that green bond returns respond to these announcements, with significant variation in both direction and magnitude. The STM analysis further reveals that Green finance and Climate-related risk topics are associated with the most pronounced negative abnormal returns, while Sustainable growth topics cause modest positive responses. The findings underscore the importance of clear and well-targeted communication to avoid unintended market volatility and support the broader green transition.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了欧洲央行（ECB）与气候相关的沟通对绿色债券回报的影响，发现不同主题的沟通对市场反应有显著差异。

title: Discussions on Public Relations and Marketing: Trends in Spanish University Degrees. Estudio comparativo con Portugal, Estados Unidos y Gran Bretaña)

detail.title: Discussions on Public Relations and Marketing: Trends in Spanish University Degrees. Comparative Study on Portugal, the US and the UK (Las relaciones públicas y el marketing: tendencias en los grados de las universidades españolas. Estudio comparativo con Portugal, Estados Unidos y Gran Bretaña)

publicationDetails.detailsText: Revista Internacional de Relaciones Públicas, volume 10, issue 19, 2020[10.5783/RIRP-19-2020-09-157-178]

detail.abstract: English Abstract: The following is a reflection on Spanish undergraduate studies that combine the concepts of marketing and public relations. Sharing origins and often functions and specialists, both concepts have run parallel paths that have merged on multiple occasions. This evolution has been studied from different points of view. Initially, marketing experts included PR techniques as an additional tool to grant it a greater specific instrumental relevance over time. On the other hand, PR scholars have tried to dissociate themselves from marketing in order acquire an independent position within the field of communication. In Spain, these conceptual differences are currently blurred due to the creation of new university degrees and double degrees combining both disciplines. This trend is evidenced within the Spanish university market which, throughout this article, will be compared to other markets, namely the American and the British ones, as a scientific reference for both concepts, and to the Portuguese one, given its geographical proximity. We will reflect on the reasons that have led the Spanish university market to combine both concepts and to offer official studies that include them in their nomenclature, far from the historical tradition in this country, where studies in public relations have been related to the  field of communication, while those in marketing have been related to the field of economics. The identification of this trend in the job market of organisational communication professionals poses new challenges to training institutions, especially to universities. Spanish Abstract: Presentamos una reflexión sobre los estudios universitarios españoles que combinan los conceptos de marketing y relaciones públicas. Compartiendo orígenes y a menudo funciones y especialistas, ambos conceptos han recorrido caminos paralelos que se han fusionado en múltiples ocasiones. Esta evolución ha sido estudiada desde diferentes puntos de vista. Inicialmente, los expertos en marketing incluyeron las técnicas de relaciones públicas como una herramienta propia, pero éstas fueron alcanzando una mayor relevancia a lo largo del tiempo. Por otro lado, los estudiosos de las relaciones públicas han tratado de disociarse del marketing para adquirir una posición independiente dentro del campo de la comunicación. En España, estas diferencias conceptuales están actualmente desdibujadas debido a la creación de nuevos títulos universitarios y dobles títulos que combinan ambas disciplinas. Esta tendencia se evidencia en el mercado universitario español que, a lo largo de este artículo, se comparará con otros mercados: el americano y el británico, como referencia científica para ambos conceptos, y con el portugués, dada su proximidad geográfica. Reflexionaremos sobre las razones que han llevado al mercado universitario español a conjugar ambos conceptos y a ofrecer estudios oficiales que los incluyan en su nomenclatura, lejos de la tradición histórica de este país, donde los estudios de relaciones públicas han estado relacionados con el campo de la comunicación, mientras que los de marketing han estado relacionados con el campo de la economía. La identificación de esta tendencia en el mercado laboral de los profesionales de la comunicación organizativa plantea nuevos retos a las instituciones de formación, especialmente a las universidades.)

title: Trap Door: The Underappreciated Effect of Complexity on Decisions
affiliations: University of Illinois Chicago and Rutgers University-Camden

detail.title: Trap Door: The Underappreciated Effect of Complexity on Decisions
detail.abstract: In deciding among options involving uncertainty, the rational decision maker will calculate the expected utility of the options and select the one with the largest value. However, in some settings, expected utility is impossible to calculate. For example, when there are numerous states of the world and the probabilities of these states are difficult (or impossible) to learn. The effects of this complexity on decision making are often overlooked and we refer to the effect as the Trap Door. We note Trap Door effects in the decision to wash one’s hands and in the decision regarding anti-cholesterol drugs. There are likely several other settings where the failure to account for the complexity that renders expected utility impossible to calculate has significant consequences.

AI.tldr: 论文探讨了在不确定性决策中，由于状态复杂性和概率难以计算而导致的“陷阱门”效应，并举例说明了其影响。

detail.title: Preference Robust Insurance Design
detail.abstract: This paper studies the problem of preference robust insurance design within the risk minimization framework and from a decision maker's (DM's) perspective. We focus on the case that the DM's risk preference is not completely known and would consider all the distortion functions that meet some criteria, such as preferring certain lotteries over other lotteries and having some confidence intervals for the risks of a list of lotteries when making decision. Under the expectedvalue premium principle, the DM picks the robust insurance indemnity function that minimizes its risk exposure based on the worst-case distortion risk measure. By assuming that the DM's risk preferences have certain curvature, such as being concave or inverse S-shaped, we disentangle the structure of the optimal indemnity function and the worst-case distortion function in an analytical way, and give the tractable reformulations to determine the later when the underlying loss is discretely distributed. Moreover, several extensions to our framework are presented and discussed. Some numerical examples are given at the end to show more implications of our main results.

detail.title: Why Did the Two Koreas Diverge?
detail.abstract: This study models North Korea as a Solow economy to measure the role of different causes driving the country's growth underperformance visa -vis South Korea from 1958-2018. Counterfactual experiments show that North Korea's nonperformance resulted primarily from productivity failure, with the disintegration of the Soviet Union and high defense burden aggravating the decline. These findings align with the outcomes from experiments using a Ramsey model calibrated to stand for South Korea and subjected to North Korean shocks. The productivity divergence resulted primarily from the increasingly despotic North Korea's failure to shed misallocation as rapidly the democratizing South Korea did.

detail.abstract:
This compendium consolidates five pioneering manuscripts that redefine the boundaries of AI governance, ethics, propaganda, financial control, and systemic risk intervention through the lens of Dynamic Financial Applied Science (DFAS). Each component offers an original doctrinal framework that shifts governance from abstract ethical ideals to enforceable, evidence-based mechanisms rooted in documentation, disclosure, and systemic accountability. The included works are:

  1. DFAS–AI Governance: GCC Edition
    Proposes a context-specific AI governance framework tailored to Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) nations, integrating political centralization, financial networks, and AI-induced systemic risk into a doctrine that operationalizes transparency, intervention, and geopolitical alignment.

  2. DAIF – Doctrinal Architecture of Intelligent Finance
    Reconstructs financial governance by outlining a doctrine-driven AI architecture that embeds regulatory logic and public accountability into the core of financial algorithms, moving beyond compliance checklists to sovereign-coded execution logic.

  3. DFAS–CICP: Crisis, Intervention, and Control Protocol
    Introduces a multi-phase emergency response protocol designed for AI-induced market collapse, regime destabilization, or coordinated disinformation warfare. The CICP outlines doctrinal interventions, classification schemes, and governance escalation triggers that override latency in conventional regulatory response.

  4. DFAS–AAP: AI-Assisted Propaganda Doctrine
    Defines the operational, legal, and geopolitical blueprint for identifying and neutralizing AI-assisted propaganda at scale. The doctrine balances free expression with national sovereignty, proposing systemic filters, discourse manipulation detection, and proactive cognitive resilience mechanisms.

  5. Algorithmic Wars: The Doctrinal Blueprint
    Provides the overarching geopolitical and ethical theory for understanding future conflict structures shaped by AI-driven financial, informational, and psychological weapons. This manuscript establishes the core philosophical grounding for DFAS, proposing war doctrines based on algorithmic influence rather than kinetic force.

Collectively, these manuscripts provide a strategic arsenal for governments, regulatory bodies, and critical institutions to reclaim control over AI systems that threaten autonomy, financial stability, and civic integrity. This compendium is not a theoretical exposition—it is a doctrinal call to action. Doctrine Series.

title: Weathering the Storm: How Climate Change Encourages Labor Formalization
affiliations: Duke University and University of Pennsylvania, School of Social Policy and Practice and Department of Political Science

detail.title: Weathering the Storm: How Climate Change Encourages Labor Formalization
detail.abstract: What explains persistent urban informality in developing contexts, despite state efforts to register and tax populations? Contrary to conventional economic explanations (e.g., individual income constraints), we argue that formalization is a collective decision: when most street vendors sell in informal markets, formalized market spaces are not a competitive place to sell. Exposure to the effects of climate change, however, can disrupt this equilibrium of persistent labor informality. Unpredictable weather limits informal sellers' ability to protect their goods and sell in the streets, increasing demand for stability, shelter, and coordination with peers. We argue that demand for social capital-trust and coordination with peer sellers-drives labor formalization in response to climate shocks. Evidence from focus groups and a survey experiment with 2,400 street vendors in urban Liberia reveal that labor formalization is (a) a critical form of adaptation to climate change and (b) more appealing when informal vendors view formalized peers as more trustworthy. In particular, informal sellers' perceptions that formalized sellers are "good citizens" who follow the law is a strong mechanism that induces formalization. These findings suggest that beyond economic incentives, peer effects and the sociopolitical context of markets play a central role in shaping patterns of labor formalization.

title: Why Study Corruption? To Understand and Enable Inclusive and Sustainable Development

detail.title: Why Study Corruption? To Understand and Enable Inclusive and Sustainable Development
detail.abstract: This introductory chapter outlines the motivations that contributors to Corruption and the Sustainable Development Goals have for choosing to study corruption. In addition to the effects of corruption on economic growth and development, the environmental and distributional consequences of corruption are strong themes in scholars' motivation for studying corruption. Personal background and intellectual curiosity are also important drivers, as is a desire to develop effective anti-corruption initiatives that are informed by careful examination of the costs, beneficiaries, and victims of corruption. We also summarise the other chapters of the book, each of which sets out the theory and evidence linking corruption to the targets and indicators of the Sustainable Development Goal in question. Chapters also note gaps in the existing literature and in many cases offer a critique of the targets and indicators used to define and track progress towards the sustainable development agenda. We conclude by noting some general principles for anti-corruption for sustainable development but note that more research, and funding, is required in many cases to develop and test effective sector specific interventions.

detail.abstract: In the context of the growing livestreaming industry, “tip culture” refers to the practice of voluntary financial contributions from viewers that has emerged as a key factor shaping the behavior of content creators (livestreamers) today. Tipping not only serves as a primary source of income but also represents a form of audience engagement and recognition, directly influencing streamers' content production decisions. This study aims to analyze the impact of tip culture on the content supply of streamers, including the frequency, type of content, and creative direction. Using a mixed-methods approach that combines direct surveys with content analysis on platforms such as Twitch, YouTube, and TikTok, the research provides empirical insights into the relationship between financial incentive mechanisms and creative behavior. The study's findings will showcase the economic and psychological drivers behind streamer behavior, providing implications for platforms, audiences, and policymakers in building a more sustainable livestreaming ecosystem.

detail.abstract: How do preferences for international redistribution vary with income across countries? And within countries, are poor people more or less likely than rich people to support international redistribution? I develop a simple model which includes both domestic and international tax and transfer programs. I show that an increase in international redistribution comes at the expense of domestic redistribution. Still, I find that income is negatively correlated with support for international redistribution. Using new data on preferences for an international tax and transfer program in 29 countries, I first show a strong negative correlation across countries between income and preferences for international redistribution. Then, using individual level-data, and different measures of income, I show that in the U.S., and within other countries, income is negatively correlated with support for international redistribution. That is, poor people are more likely than rich people to support international redistribution.

detail.title: Scarcity-Aligned Discounting in Asset Valuation

detail.abstract: This paper introduces a scarcity-aligned framework for selecting discount rates in asset valuation. Conventional approaches often apply market-derived or statistically inferred rates across asset classes that monetize fundamentally different types of scarcity. This practice leads to valuation distortions and undermines the interpretability of intertemporal pricing. We propose that the discount rate c should be benchmarked to an external asset that monetizes a similar form of constraint, such as algorithmic, physical, or legal scarcity. This reframes discounting as an economic judgment rather than a regression output. The framework addresses the circularity of self-referential estimation methods and corrects for category mismatches in valuation. We formalize a scarcityaligned benchmarking principle, derive implications for inter-asset comparability, and illustrate benchmark selection across asset classes including Bitcoin, Ethereum, gold, equities, and derivatives. The result is a coherent, structurally grounded approach to valuation that aligns the logic of discounting with the logic of monetization.

detail.title: Cooperative and Non-Cooperative Solutions in a Dynamic Model of Forest Management
detail.abstract: This study develops a finite-horizon optimal control model linking forest biomass, biodiversity, cumulative extraction, and stochastic disturbance shocks to assess three governance regimes: non-cooperative management with free terminal states (OLNE-Free) and two cooperative approaches-one with fixed ecological targets (Regulator-Fixed) and another with flexible endpoints (Regulator-Free). Non-cooperative harvesters prioritize short-term extraction, overlooking biodiversity's contribution to productivity and allowing extraction to accumulate. In contrast, cooperative regimes internalize ecological values and dynamically adjust harvest effort, resulting in improved ecological and economic outcomes. Cooperative management moderates harvesting intensity, enhances biodiversity, and increases overall welfare compared to non-cooperative approaches. Implementing mechanisms-such as fees, taxes, or regulations-that align private incentives with social values helps decentralize cooperation and buffers outcomes against parameter variability. Sensitivity analysis demonstrates that cooperative regimes consistently influence ecological changes and tend to promote more stable long-term dynamics. These findings highlight the critical role of biodiversity valuation and flexible cooperation in advancing sustainable forest management amid ecological and economic indeterminacies.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过有限期最优控制模型比较了三种森林治理模式：非合作自由终端状态（OLNE-Free）和两种合作模式（固定生态目标和灵活终点）。合作模式通过动态调整采伐努力，显著提升生态与经济成果。
AI.research_question: 如何通过不同治理模式（非合作与合作）优化森林生物量、生物多样性和采伐累积的动态管理？
AI.motivation: 探讨在生态与经济不确定性下，合作治理如何通过内部化生态价值实现可持续森林管理。
AI.theoretical_framework: 有限期最优控制理论、博弈论（非合作与合作策略）、生态经济学。
AI.method: 构建有限期最优控制模型，模拟三种治理模式（OLNE-Free、Regulator-Fixed、Regulator-Free）的动态效果。
AI.findings: 合作模式通过动态调整采伐努力，显著提升生态与经济成果，优于非合作模式。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了合作治理在生态与经济不确定性下的优越性，强调生物多样性价值的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出通过费用、税收或法规等机制，将私人激励与社会价值对齐，促进分散化合作。

title: The 2025 update of the UN Model Tax Convention
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: The 2025 update of the UN Model Tax Convention
detail.abstract:
In March 2025, the UN Tax Committee gave final approval for the 2025 update of its flagship publication, the UN Model Tax Convention.
This report provides an overview and background of the most important changes made to the UN Model (2025). The changes reflect the work of the UN Tax Committee during the past four years on various cross-border tax issues.
The UN Model Tax Convention serves as an important point of reference for countries, particularly developing countries, in their tax treaty negotiations with other countries. The changes are also a useful indicator of where international tax policy debates are heading in the future.

This report was written for and first published by the Tax Justice Network.

title: Pedagogical Philosophy Statement
affiliations: Theological Education Seminary Institution - TESI

detail.title: Pedagogical Philosophy Statement
detail.abstract:
This Pedagogical Philosophy Statement represents my experiences and knowledge gained over the years through the use of teaching and learning methods to become a successful educator. The decade we live in now, the year 2025, has brought challenges to education. Digital transformation, artificial intelligence, intelligent technologies, and industrial robotics ensure that learners search for answers with less effort and do not delve deeper into the subject matter. We see a generation with less consistent, structured, and analytical thinkers, as solutions and answers are delivered quickly and easily through technology. The tendency to make things very easy is just around the corner, and the vitality of learning how things are formed fundamentally is at stake.
I believe that our societies, especially in our age of technology boom, digital transformation, and increasing artificial intelligence, need more and more systematic and consistent education in all parts of today's world. To a certain extent, digitization, which changes education towards technological reactions and responses, weakens traditional education, but acquires and promotes an advanced education, especially in terms of andragogy (self-learner through teacher or mentor guided) and heutagogy (self-autonomous, independent, and self-determined learner), striving for better and making progress by using the improved existing skills, intellectual capital, and artificial intelligence to obtain knowledge and answers to problems.
This statement will focus on classical pedagogy, emphasizing the fundamentals of comprehension processes and the development of knowledge. While learners can easily understand concepts through Artificial Intelligence and other responsive applications, they still need to learn the methods and strategies for conducting research. Educators play a crucial role in providing guidance and mentoring to ensure that knowledge is conveyed systematically and appropriately for their developmental stage. Learners need to understand how artificial intelligence functions and how to conduct systematic research. This includes defining research objectives, applying research methods, and identifying needs and problems without relying solely on pre-programmed applications that may not accurately reflect willingness or conscious thought. These applications are merely tools. Learners must learn to synthesize information and develop creative solutions.
Societies are now at the center of the educational frameworks, creating politically affordable and economical offers (decision-making bodies), influencing stakeholders (educational institutions, teachers, learners, and parents) to act as well, quickly, and purposefully as possible, considering what is necessary for their school development and in the public interest.
I am enthusiastic and passionate about my desire to continue to be an inspirational and professional educator in business and engineering. I aim to apply my acquired knowledge and experience through the continuity of current teaching and vision methods, and to help the students learn progressively, achieve their goals, and experience their lives through success stories.
This statement of pedagogical philosophy is organized on the roles of the actors that factorize education. The roles of education, institutions, educators, and the learners.
I hope this paper helps you define your teaching philosophy statement. Once you have written such a paper, explaining the concepts, experience, and pedagogical theories, you will be able to define your one-page Teaching Philosophy Statement.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了在数字化和人工智能时代，教育面临的挑战及应对策略，强调传统教育方法与现代技术的结合，以及教育者在培养学生系统性思维和研究能力中的关键作用。

title: Missing Financial Data in Chinese Market
affiliations: Guangdong University of Finance & Economics, Hunan University - School of Finance and Statistics, Singapore Management University - Lee Kong Chian School of Business and Hunan University - College of Finance and Statistics

detail.title: Missing Financial Data in Chinese Market
detail.abstract: This paper investigates missing financial data in the Chinese stock market, focusing on firm-level characteristics and their impact on asset pricing. Unlike the U.S. market, the Chinese market’s data missingness has received less attention, where differences in data sources, market maturity, and regulations affect data completeness. Using a dataset of 106 firm characteristics from 1992 to 2022, we find that missing data in China follows a “cliff-shaped” pattern, with significant improvements post-2000. We compare two imputation methods, Expectation-Maximization (EM) and Mean Imputation (MN), and evaluate their effects on asset pricing using portfolio analysis and machine learning. Results indicate that, in univariate analysis, both imputation methods have minimal impact on stock return predictions due to high similarity in extreme deciles before and after imputation.   However, when combining all characteristics in machine learning models, the EM method slightly improves return prediction accuracy compared to MN imputation. This study provides insights into handling missing data in emerging markets and emphasizes the importance of appropriate imputation methods for machine learning-based asset pricing.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了中国股市中缺失财务数据的问题，重点关注公司层面特征及其对资产定价的影响。研究发现，缺失数据呈现“悬崖式”模式，2000年后显著改善。比较了两种填补方法（EM和MN），发现EM方法在机器学习模型中略微提高了预测准确性。
AI.research_question: 中国股市中缺失财务数据的特征及其对资产定价的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 中国股市的数据缺失问题尚未得到充分研究，且与美国市场存在差异，研究填补方法对资产定价的影响具有重要意义。
AI.theoretical_framework: 资产定价理论、数据填补方法（EM和MN）、机器学习模型。
AI.method: 使用1992年至2022年的106个公司特征数据集，比较EM和MN填补方法，并通过组合分析和机器学习评估其对资产定价的影响。
AI.findings: 缺失数据呈现“悬崖式”模式，2000年后改善；EM方法在机器学习模型中略微提高了预测准确性。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了新兴市场缺失数据研究的空白，强调了填补方法对机器学习模型的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为新兴市场的数据处理提供了实践指导，建议在机器学习模型中使用EM方法。

title: The Bitcoin Hurdle Fallacy: Why Risk Misalignment Distorts Valuation
affiliations: Independant

detail.title: The Bitcoin Hurdle Fallacy: Why Risk Misalignment Distorts Valuation

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The author declares no competing interests.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Not applicable. The study uses only publicly available data and involves no human participants.
declarations.funderStatement: This research received no funding.

detail.abstract: Some commentators have proposed using Bitcoin's historical return, often exceeding 30 percent annually, as a universal benchmark for capital allocation and valuation. This paper challenges that view by emphasizing a foundational principle of asset pricing: discount rates must reflect the opportunity cost of capital relative to structurally comparable assets. Using Bitcoin's return as a hurdle rate for equities, real estate, or decentralized finance protocols introduces a misalignment between risk structure and valuation logic. We formalize this critique through five illustrative cases of discount rate misapplication and propose an alternative: scarcity-aligned discounting. This framework benchmarks the cost of capital to assets with comparable economic constraints, whether algorithmic, geographic, regulatory, or operational, restoring coherence in valuation across heterogeneous asset classes.

AI.tldr: 本文挑战了将比特币历史回报率作为资本分配和估值通用基准的观点，提出应根据可比资产的机会成本调整折现率，并提出了稀缺性对齐折现框架。

AI.method: 通过五个折现率误用的案例进行批判性分析，并提出稀缺性对齐折现框架。
AI.findings: 比特币回报率作为通用基准会导致风险与估值逻辑不匹配，稀缺性对齐折现能恢复估值一致性。

AI.practical_contributions: 为资本分配和估值提供了更合理的折现率选择方法，避免风险结构不匹配问题。

title: Do CEOs Manipulate News? Evidence from Fixed-term Employment Contracts
affiliations: London School of Economics & Political Science (LSE), Students and Stockholm School of Economics - Finance Department

detail.title: Do CEOs Manipulate News? Evidence from Fixed-term Employment Contracts
detail.abstract: We study the strategic behavior of chief executive officers (CEOs) in disclosing discretionary corporate news close to their contract renewal dates. Analyzing 296 fixed-term employment contracts of Standard & Poor's (S&P) 1500 firms covering the period from 2000 to 2009 and using contract length as an instrumental variable, we show that, compared to the baseline, the number of discretionary news items is higher by 1.4 in the quarter preceding the renewal date and by 1.44 in the quarter following it. The sentiment of news items is higher by 0.43 in the quarter before the renewal date and lower by 0.34 in the subsequent quarter. This provides evidence of strategic disclosure of good news before, and a clustering of bad news after, the contract renewal dates. This behavior is notably stronger among CEOs with a history of poor performance and weaker among those who also hold the position of chairman.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了CEO在合同续签日期前后披露公司新闻的战略行为，发现他们在续签前披露更多正面新闻，续签后则集中披露负面新闻。
AI.research_question: CEO在合同续签日期前后如何战略性地披露公司新闻？
AI.motivation: 探讨CEO在合同续签期间的行为动机及其对公司信息披露的影响。

AI.method: 分析了2000年至2009年间296份S&P 1500公司的固定期限合同，使用合同长度作为工具变量。
AI.findings: 续签前季度披露的新闻数量增加1.4条，续签后季度增加1.44条；续签前新闻情绪提高0.43，续签后降低0.34。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了CEO在合同续签期间的战略信息披露行为，丰富了代理理论的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为董事会和投资者提供了识别CEO战略行为的依据，有助于优化公司治理。

title: Can Polish Farmers Have Their Cake and Eat It Too? Protests Against EU Trade Agreements Vs. Benefits for Polish Agriculture from European Integration
affiliations: Warsaw School of Economics (SGH) and Warsaw School of Economics (SGH)

detail.title: Can Polish Farmers Have Their Cake and Eat It Too? Protests Against EU Trade Agreements Vs. Benefits for Polish Agriculture from European Integration
detail.abstract: This paper investigates the paradox of Polish farmers' persistent opposition to EU trade agreements, despite being among the key beneficiaries of European integration and the Common Agricultural Policy (CAP). Employing an interdisciplinary approach that combines economic analysis and legal review, the study examines whether farmers' resistance is rooted in actual economic threats or driven by status quo bias-a psychological preference for the familiar, even when change brings measurable gains. By analysing trade flows, subsidy structures, and the legal safeguards embedded in EU trade agreements, the paper shows that Polish agriculture has maintained strong export performance and positive trade balances, while protective mechanisms mitigate potential competition risks. The findings suggest that perceived threats and cognitive biases play a greater role than material disadvantages. The study concludes that understanding this paradox is crucial for designing policies that balance rural political preferences with the EU's strategic goals for trade liberalisation and sustainability.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了波兰农民对欧盟贸易协定的持续反对现象，尽管他们是欧洲一体化和共同农业政策的主要受益者。研究发现，农民的抵抗更多源于心理偏见而非实际经济威胁。

title: Managing the Risks of Inflation Expectation De-Anchoring
affiliations: European Central Bank (ECB) and International Monetary Fund (IMF)

detail.title: Managing the Risks of Inflation Expectation De-Anchoring

publicationDetails.journalName: ECB: Working Paper Series (Topic)

detail.abstract: This paper investigates the implications of a potential loss of credibility in the central bank’s ability to bring inflation back to target in the medium-term (”de-anchoring”). We propose a monetary policy framework in which the central bank accounts for de-anchoring risks using a regime-switching model. First, we derive the optimal monetary policy strategy, which balances the trade-off between the welfare costs of a stronger response to inflation and the benefits of preserving the central bank’s credibility. Next, we apply this framework in a medium-scale regime-switching DSGE model and develop a method to assess de-anchoring risks in real time. Using the post-COVID inflation episode in the euro area as a case study, we find that an explicit ”looking-through” strategy would have only modestly increased de-anchoring risks. These findings highlight the importance of monitoring de-anchoring risks in monetary policy design.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了央行在中期内恢复通胀目标能力（“脱锚”）可能失去信誉的影响，并提出了一种考虑脱锚风险的货币政策框架。通过状态转换模型，分析了最优货币政策策略，并以欧元区后疫情通胀为例，发现“观望”策略仅轻微增加脱锚风险。

title: The Psychology of Investing: How Automation Reduces Bias
affiliations: Zurich University of Applied Sciences (ZHAW) and ZHAW School of Management and Law

detail.title: The Psychology of Investing: How Automation Reduces Bias
detail.abstract: This study explores how emotional biases such as fear, greed, and uncertainty shape individual investment behavior and evaluates whether automated investment tools, such as robo-advisors, can mitigate these psychological influences. Grounded in behavioral finance theory and enriched by empirical data from a quantitative survey of 210 respondents, the research examines emotional responses across four investor types: manual, automated, hybrid, and non-investors. A key contribution of this study is its nuanced disaggregation of emotional triggers and their effects on decision-making, combined with a comparative analysis of emotional discipline between users and non-users of automated tools. The findings demonstrate that while traditional emotional biases like loss aversion and risk aversion play a lesser role than previously assumed, overconfidence, familiarity bias, and herd behavior remain prominent. Importantly, the study shows that automated tools effectively reduce susceptibility to impulsive or emotionally driven investment behaviors, enhance long-term orientation, and promote strategy adherence. By integrating psychological and technological dimensions of investing, this investigation contributes to the literature on behavioral and digital finance and provides empirical support for the potential of automation in improving financial decision quality. The paper offers practical implications for investor education, digital tool design, and policy frameworks aimed at promoting financially rational behavior.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨情绪偏差（如恐惧、贪婪和不确定性）如何影响个人投资行为，并评估自动化投资工具（如机器人顾问）是否能减轻这些心理影响。基于行为金融理论，通过210名受访者的定量调查数据，研究分析了四种投资者类型（手动、自动、混合和非投资者）的情绪反应。研究发现，传统情绪偏差（如损失厌恶和风险厌恶）的作用比预期小，而过自信、熟悉偏差和从众行为更为显著。自动化工具能有效减少冲动或情绪驱动的投资行为，增强长期导向和策略坚持。
AI.research_question: 情绪偏差如何影响个人投资行为？自动化投资工具是否能减轻这些心理影响？
AI.motivation: 探索情绪偏差对投资行为的影响，并验证自动化工具在减少情绪驱动决策中的作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 行为金融理论。
AI.method: 基于210名受访者的定量调查数据，分析四种投资者类型的情绪反应。
AI.findings: 传统情绪偏差（如损失厌恶和风险厌恶）作用较小，而过自信、熟悉偏差和从众行为更显著。自动化工具能减少情绪驱动行为，增强长期导向。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了行为金融和数字金融的文献，整合了心理和技术维度。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者教育、数字工具设计和政策框架提供实践建议，以促进理性金融行为。

title: Soft Resistance, Hard Decisions: Free Speech in Hong Kong
affiliations: Harvard University - Harvard Law School

detail.title: Soft Resistance, Hard Decisions: Free Speech in Hong Kong
detail.abstract: Among the most controversial and oft-criticized phrases in Hong Kong in the National Security Law (NSL) era is the phrase “soft resistance.” Despite the fact that “soft resistance” is not mentioned or defined in the common law, the NSL, the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance (SNSO), or in any other Hong Kong statutory law, the phrase has been on the lips of countless senior Hong Kong officials from Chief Executive John Lee downwards ever since it was first uttered in a speech given by former director of the Central Government Liaison Office in Hong Kong Luo Huining. It is notable that even though Hong Kong officials such as the Secretary for Security Chris Tang began to use the phrase in their own public speeches since 2021, the SNSO did not mention "soft resistance" in its provisions, meaning that for now, the legality of "soft resistance" is unclear. This article attempts to analyze why the Hong Kong government has been intentionally vague regarding the definition of "soft resistance" and also provides suggestions as to how the government may want to regulate "soft resistance" activities in the future, with reference to anti-smoking and obscenity regulations

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了香港国安法时代下“软抵抗”一词的争议性，分析了政府对其定义的模糊性，并提出了未来可能的监管建议。

AI.motivation: “软抵抗”虽未在法律中明确定义，但被广泛提及，其合法性不明确，引发争议。

title: Carbon Pricing Policies and Global Climate Change by AK Kirkpatrick 25June2025 1 Carbon Pricing Policies and Global Climate Change -Critical Perspectives (Second edition)
affiliations: Bournemouth University Business School

detail.title: Carbon Pricing Policies and Global Climate Change by AK Kirkpatrick 25June2025 1 Carbon Pricing Policies and Global Climate Change -Critical Perspectives (Second edition)
detail.abstract: The paper considers carbon pricing policies that have developed in response to global climate change concerns. There have been significant international institutional climate change policy drivers to harness a global effort to reduce adverse anthropogenic (humaninduced) effects on the climate system. Following the Kyoto Protocol (1997) and then the Paris Agreement (2015) many countries have adopted carbon pricing policies with various mechanisms that in combination had achieved coverage of some 28 per cent. of global carbon emissions by 2025 according to the World Bank. There are both mandatory and voluntary carbon markets that are effectively specialised human-construct commodity markets. Carbon pricing has encouraged structured financial engineering based on measured carbon emissions in different jurisdictions. Further research will be necessary to assess whether the progress in carbon pricing and carbon markets is sufficiently effective in achieving positive outcomes at national and global levels. Governments may face increasing pressure to consider the balance between carbon pricing policies and promotion of carbon management technologies especially if the latter prove to be more effective and/or acceptable to businesses and the wider public. This paper identifies some controversies and challenges in the development of carbon pricing and concludes with a consideration of important issues to address in the future.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了为应对全球气候变化而发展的碳定价政策，分析了其国际政策驱动、覆盖范围、市场机制及未来挑战。
AI.research_question: 碳定价政策在实现国家和全球层面积极成果方面的有效性如何？
AI.motivation: 全球气候变化问题日益严峻，国际社会通过《京都议定书》和《巴黎协定》推动碳定价政策，但其实际效果和未来发展方向仍需研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于国际气候政策框架，探讨碳定价政策的理论基础，包括强制性市场和自愿性市场的运作机制。
AI.method: 通过文献综述和政策分析，评估碳定价政策的覆盖范围、机制设计及其对减排的影响。
AI.findings: 截至2025年，碳定价政策已覆盖全球约28%的碳排放，但其有效性仍需进一步评估。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了碳定价政策的理论框架，探讨了其与碳管理技术的平衡问题。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政府和企业在碳定价政策与技术推广之间的权衡提供了实践指导。

title: Long-Term Benefits of Call Overwriting
affiliations: Lombard Odier & Cie

detail.title: Long-Term Benefits of Call Overwriting
detail.abstract: In this article, we study the benefits of call overwriting using a utility maximization framework. In the special case of exponential utility function and normality of stock returns, we show that, if options are fairly priced, investors are indifferent to call overwriting. However, even a small option overpricing makes call overwriting optimal whatever the magnitude of equity premium. This conclusion is no more valid when we depart from normality assumption adopting a more realistic distribution of stock returns. In the typical case when downside volatility exceeds the upside one, the investor demands a certain minimum implied volatility premium for call overwriting, which we derive analytically. Using actual bid prices of at-themoney call options on S&P 500 index, we find that current levels of implied volatility premium are not high enough to justify call overwriting unless one has bearish-to-neutral view on equities.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在效用最大化框架下使用看涨期权覆盖策略的收益。在特定条件下（指数效用函数和股票收益正态分布），若期权定价公平，投资者对看涨期权覆盖策略无偏好；但即使期权轻微高估，该策略仍为最优。然而，当股票收益分布偏离正态时，结论不再成立。在典型的下行波动大于上行波动情况下，投资者要求一定的隐含波动溢价，我们通过分析得出这一溢价。实证发现，当前隐含波动溢价水平不足以支持看涨期权覆盖策略，除非投资者对股市持中性或看跌观点。
AI.research_question: 在效用最大化框架下，看涨期权覆盖策略的收益如何受期权定价和股票收益分布的影响？
AI.motivation: 探讨看涨期权覆盖策略在不同市场条件下的适用性，为投资者提供决策依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 效用最大化理论、期权定价理论、股票收益分布假设（正态与非正态）。
AI.method: 理论分析（指数效用函数和正态分布假设）、实证研究（S&P 500指数的实际期权数据）。
AI.findings: 在期权定价公平且股票收益正态分布时，投资者对看涨期权覆盖策略无偏好；期权高估时策略最优。非正态分布下，投资者需隐含波动溢价支持策略。实证显示当前溢价不足。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了效用最大化框架下的期权策略研究，提出非正态分布下的隐含波动溢价要求。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者在期权策略选择中提供理论支持，指出当前市场条件下看涨期权覆盖策略的适用性有限。

title: Predicting the Predictable: Decomposing and Forecasting Stock Returns in a Data-rich Environment
affiliations: Nankai University, Nankai University and Nankai University

detail.title: Predicting the Predictable: Decomposing and Forecasting Stock Returns in a Data-rich Environment

declarations.funderStatement: We acknowledge the financial support from the National Natural Science Foundation of China (72173068, 71803091), and the Fundamental Research Funds for the Central Universities.

detail.abstract: We propose a new method for forecasting stock market returns in a data-rich environment: the factor-augmented sum-of-the-parts (FA-SOP) approach. Rather than predicting returns directly, FA-SOP decomposes them into three components-dividend-price ratio, earnings growth, and price-earnings multiple growth (gm)-and models each separately. We emphasize that gm is a more promising target for forecasting due to its stronger connection with macroeconomic conditions and greater variability over time. FA-SOP forecasts gm using latent macroeconomic factors extracted from high-dimensional data, capturing the underlying state of the economy while avoiding overfitting. Applied to S&P 500 returns from 1960 to 2022, FA-SOP outperforms predictive regressions, factor-augmented regressions, and traditional decomposition approaches, yielding robust out-of-sample gains in both statistical and economic terms. Simulations based on a present-value model further show that FA-SOP's advantage stems from its ability to track the true data-generating process more closely. Our results highlight the value of decomposing returns and focusing on components that are more predictably linked to economic fundamentals.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的股票市场回报预测方法——因子增强部分和（FA-SOP），通过分解回报为三个组成部分并分别建模，显著提升了预测效果。
AI.research_question: 如何在数据丰富的环境中更准确地预测股票市场回报？

AI.method: FA-SOP将回报分解为股息价格比、盈利增长和gm，并利用高维数据提取的宏观经济因子建模gm。
AI.findings: FA-SOP在1960-2022年标普500回报预测中优于传统方法，统计和经济指标均表现出色。
