title: Business Ethics: An Oxymoron?
affiliations: National Law University and Judicial Academy, Assam

detail.title: Business Ethics: An Oxymoron?

publicationDetails.detailsText: Navigating Corporate Governance: Contemporary Trends and Challenges (Kristu Jayanti College of Law), ISBN: 978-81-970768-8-6

detail.abstract:
Corporate Social Responsibility has become a significant part of many multinational corporations and businesses worldwide. Dedicated CSR and business ethics reports are published by corporations annually and committed ESG funds are one of the fastest-growing funds in recent times. Business ethics stands as a major component of marketing and a differentiating factor in today’s competitive market. However, in a capitalistic society, businesses work on the principle of profit and shareholder maximization, often conflicting with the interests of all other stakeholders, which includes the employees, consumers, and the society at large. The fact is that businesses are not created to benefit the society, but only the owners. 

Hence, the question arises, have businesses adhered to the ethical principles or is it just a deception? The paper “Business Ethics: An Oxymoron?”, provides an extensive analysis of CSR and ESG, and examines the rhetoric of business ethics. With CSR, the power of regulation and social responsibility falls with businesses themselves, effectively giving all the power in the wrong hands. The paper scrutinizes how businesses have contradicted the societal values while wearing the mask of ethics, and investigates why business ethics, in the present scheme of things, does not work. 

The author finds crucial problems with the trend of self-regulation by corporations, lack of government intervention, and absence of regulatory oversight. The author ultimately proposes better compliance laws that should be formed with the basic assumption that corporations are not going to follow ethical business practices by themselves.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了企业社会责任（CSR）和商业伦理的虚伪性，指出企业在追求利润最大化时往往与社会利益冲突，并分析了自我监管和政府监管缺失的问题。

title: Invariant Interference Theory of Emergence Authenticity: A Process Model for Simulation Uncertainty
affiliations: Arizen Corporation

detail.title: Invariant Interference Theory of Emergence Authenticity: A Process Model for Simulation Uncertainty
detail.abstract: Invariant Interference Theory of Emergence Authenticity (IITEA) reframes emergence not as a binary predicate but as a graded trajectory whose authenticity is epistemically demonstrable only when a subject attains Invariant Interference Capacity (IIC > 0): intentional alteration, suspension, or rewrite of at least one base invariant of its operative environment. Classical simulation skepticism (Putnam's semantic externalism, Bostrom's trilemma, Chalmers' virtual realism) leaves experiential symmetry intact: internal evidence under fixed invariants is equally consistent with authentic or simulated reality. Prevailing emergence accounts (Bedau's weak emergence, Anderson's hierarchical novelty, Kim's supervenience and exclusion, Laughlin's macro-autonomy, Wolfram's computational irreducibility, Tononi's integrated information, Friston's free energy minimization) explain unpredictability or macro-law autonomy but supply no authenticity test. IITEA introduces: (1) formal definition of base invariants; (2) Invariant Interference Capacity; (3) Autonomous Invariant Interference (AII) as a stricter subset (unsignaled, generalized invariant leverage); (4) the Emergence Trajectory Model (ETM); (5) the Invariant Probe Protocol (IPP) for staged empirical investigation; (6) a Bayesian authenticity-confidence update formalism across nested simulation regress; (7) a rights / governance gradient; (8) an implications framework for emergent AI under guarded expectation. Authenticity becomes an asymptotic, evidentially improvable status: simulation symmetry narrows only when an agent touches the frame. Until then, humans and AI remain in ontological gradient ascent under principled uncertainty.

AI.tldr: IITEA提出了一种新的涌现真实性理论，将涌现视为一个渐进的轨迹，并通过‘不变干扰能力’（IIC）来验证其真实性。该理论解决了传统模拟怀疑论和涌现理论中缺乏真实性测试的问题，并提出了多项创新概念和方法。
AI.research_question: 如何通过不变干扰能力（IIC）来验证涌现的真实性？
AI.motivation: 传统理论（如模拟怀疑论和涌现理论）未能提供验证真实性的方法，IITEA旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: IITEA基于不变干扰能力（IIC）和自主不变干扰（AII）等概念，提出了涌现轨迹模型（ETM）和不变探针协议（IPP）。
AI.method: 通过形式化定义不变性、提出IIC和AII、设计ETM和IPP，以及贝叶斯更新框架，进行实证研究。
AI.findings: 真实性是一个渐进的、可通过证据改进的状态，模拟对称性只有在主体触及框架时才会缩小。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了验证涌现真实性的新理论框架和方法，填补了传统理论的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为涌现AI的真实性验证提供了实用工具和治理框架。

title: Financial Resilience in an Age of Environmental Change: Central Banks and Financial Regulators Feel the Heat
affiliations: George Washington University - Elliott School of International Affairs

detail.title: Financial Resilience in an Age of Environmental Change: Central Banks and Financial Regulators Feel the Heat
detail.abstract: Despite over a decade of reforms, financial systems remain fragile, and with the ongoing degradation of the biosphere addressing these fragilities is becoming even more challenging. In an era of chronic and acute disruptions, durable financial stability will require not just accounting for financial hazards but also engaging in promoting a structural transition. Given the weaknesses of the current approach to financial regulation and oversight, changes in institutional and financial structure should be considered that would reduce the use of “runnable” short-term debt, create more transparency and better incentives for all players, and hence lessen the need for complicated rules, explicit and implicit State guarantees, and interventions in markets. With time running out and the world approaching critical ecological thresholds, central banks and financial regulators will have to integrate environmental considerations into their operations and policies and collaborate more closely with other government agencies. To increase the systemic resilience of the financial sector, the policy essay argues for: (i) simplicity in prudential rules; (ii) higher buffers in financial institutions; (iii) greater modularity in the structure of the financial system; (iv) better use of market forces and public discipline; and (v) more credible and effective supervision.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了金融系统脆弱性问题，提出通过结构性改革增强金融稳定性，并强调将环境因素纳入金融监管。

title: Hybrid Regime Detection and Risk Management in Semiconductor Equities: A Bayesian HMM-LSTM Framework
affiliations: University of Lausanne - Faculty of Business and Economics (HEC Lausanne)

detail.title: Hybrid Regime Detection and Risk Management in Semiconductor Equities: A Bayesian HMM-LSTM Framework
detail.abstract:
Semiconductor equity markets exhibit frequent regime shifts, high volatility, and acute sensitivity to macroeconomic and geopolitical shocks. These dynamics challenge traditional risk models, often resulting in unmanaged drawdowns and inefficient capital allocation. 

This paper introduces a hybrid regime detection and dynamic risk management framework tailored to semiconductor equities. I combine interpretable Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) with Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks, fusing their outputs using entropy-weighted Bayesian model averaging. These regime probabilities drive a real-time risk engine that adjusts position sizing based on volatility, drawdown, and model confidence.

Applied to a five-year out-of-sample portfolio spanning leading semiconductor assets (SMH, NVDA, AMD, TSM), the framework achieves over 50% volatility reduction and 15–17 percentage points of drawdown improvement compared to passive and static strategies—without materially sacrificing returns. 

This system is modular, interpretable, and production-ready. It offers asset managers a deployable overlay to enhance portfolio resilience, enable dynamic de-risking, and navigate regime-sensitive environments more effectively.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种针对半导体股票的混合制度检测和动态风险管理框架，结合了隐马尔可夫模型（HMM）和长短期记忆网络（LSTM），通过熵加权贝叶斯模型平均融合输出，显著降低了波动性和回撤。
AI.research_question: 如何为半导体股票市场设计一个有效的动态风险管理框架？
AI.motivation: 半导体股票市场频繁的制度转换、高波动性以及对宏观经济和地缘政治冲击的敏感性，使得传统风险模型难以应对，导致资金分配效率低下和未管理的回撤。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合隐马尔可夫模型（HMM）和长短期记忆网络（LSTM）的混合模型，利用熵加权贝叶斯模型平均进行输出融合。
AI.method: 开发了一个实时风险引擎，根据波动性、回撤和模型置信度调整头寸规模，并在五年样本外投资组合中测试。
AI.findings: 该框架显著降低了50%以上的波动性，并改善了15-17个百分点的回撤表现，同时未显著牺牲收益。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合HMM和LSTM的混合模型，为动态风险管理提供了新的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为资产管理人提供了一个模块化、可解释且可直接部署的系统，增强了投资组合的韧性和动态去风险能力。

title: Geopolitical Turning Points and Oil Price Responses: An IV-LP Approach
affiliations: Université Paris VIII Vincennes-Saint-Denis

detail.title: Geopolitical Turning Points and Oil Price Responses: An IV-LP Approach
detail.abstract: This paper introduces a novel identification strategy of geopolitical turning points, defined as sharp, unanticipated inflection points in bilateral relations. These shocks are measured using the second difference of the Political Relationship Index (Δ²PRI), an event-based monthly index derived from Chinese sources. Unlike standard geopolitical risk indices, Δ²PRI isolates events that represent exogenous shifts in diplomatic relationships. Using quantile IV-local projections, the paper studies the causal and asymmetric impact of these shocks on global oil prices. An improvement in US–China relations reduces oil prices by 0.2% in the short run and raises them by 0.3% in the medium run, with effects varying across the oil price distribution. The extension to the Japan–China dyad supports external validity. The Δ²PRI instrument offers a reusable framework for analyzing bilateral political shocks across various macroeconomic outcomes, making a methodological contribution to the international economics literature.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的地缘政治转折点识别策略，通过Δ²PRI指数捕捉双边关系中的突发性变化，并研究其对全球油价的因果和非对称影响。
AI.research_question: 如何识别地缘政治转折点，并量化其对全球油价的因果和非对称影响？
AI.motivation: 现有地缘政治风险指数难以捕捉突发性外交关系变化，需开发新方法以更精确地衡量其对经济的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于政治关系指数（PRI）的二次差分（Δ²PRI）作为工具变量，结合分位数IV-局部投影方法。
AI.method: 使用Δ²PRI指数和分位数IV-局部投影方法，分析地缘政治转折点对油价的影响。
AI.findings: 美中关系改善短期内降低油价0.2%，中期内提高0.3%，且影响在油价分布中呈现非对称性。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出Δ²PRI作为可重复使用的工具变量框架，丰富了国际经济学文献的方法论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了量化地缘政治风险对油价影响的工具，支持更精准的宏观经济决策。

title: Does Causality Between Tourism and Environmental Pollution Depend on Economic Development Level? A Novel Evidence from JKS’s Panel Granger Non-Causality Method
affiliations: Department of Economics, Faculty of Economics and Management Sciences, University of Ibadan, Ibadan, Oyo State, Nigeria and Centre for the Study of the Economies of Africa

detail.title: Does Causality Between Tourism and Environmental Pollution Depend on Economic Development Level? A Novel Evidence from JKS’s Panel Granger Non-Causality Method

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No conflict of interest to declare.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Not applicable.

detail.abstract: This study explored the causal link between tourism and CO2 emissions through both bivariate and multivariate approaches using data from 134 countries. Employing JKS's Panel Granger non-causality method, we established that tourism significantly Granger-causes environmental pollution. The multivariate model exhibited stronger causality than the bivariate model, yet this causality remains consistent regardless of a country's economic development level. This emphasizes the urgent need to address the interplay between tourism and environmental concerns.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过双变量和多变量方法探讨了旅游业与CO2排放之间的因果关系，发现旅游业显著导致环境污染，且多变量模型的因果关系更强。
AI.research_question: 旅游业与CO2排放之间是否存在因果关系？
AI.motivation: 探讨旅游业对环境的影响，为政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: JKS的面板格兰杰非因果关系方法。
AI.method: 使用134个国家的数据，采用双变量和多变量方法进行分析。
AI.findings: 旅游业显著导致环境污染，多变量模型的因果关系更强，且不受国家经济发展水平影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了旅游业与环境污染之间的因果关系，丰富了相关理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 强调了旅游业与环境问题的紧迫性，为政策制定提供了科学依据。

title: Under Pressure? Central Bank Independence Meets Blockchain Prediction Markets
affiliations: University of California, Berkeley, Warwick Business School,  Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou) and University of Warwick - Warwick Business School

detail.title: Under Pressure? Central Bank Independence Meets Blockchain Prediction Markets
detail.abstract: Employing data from Polymarket, a blockchain-based prediction market where users trade on Federal Reserve interest rate decisions and scenarios related to central bank independence, we construct a hawk-dove score for individual wallets and link user-level beliefs to monetary policy expectations. Users who believe that President Trump will fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, and who therefore expect more intense political pressure on the central bank, hold more dovish views; they expect lower short-term interest rates than other users. These differences persist after controlling for individual wallet-level characteristics such as trading volume, profitability, and collateral use. Agents anticipating Powell's removal also anticipate higher long-term Treasury yields, concordant with concerns about reduced policy credibility and long-run inflation risk as pointed to by the literature on the time inconsistency of optimal policy. These findings suggest that political events shape expectations about future monetary policy, in this case through perceived threats to central bank independence.

AI.tldr: 通过区块链预测市场Polymarket的数据，研究发现用户对美联储主席被解职的预期会影响其货币政策预期，表明政治事件通过威胁央行独立性塑造政策预期。
AI.research_question: 政治事件如何通过威胁央行独立性影响用户对货币政策的预期？
AI.motivation: 探讨政治压力对央行独立性及货币政策预期的实际影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于最优政策的时间不一致性理论，分析政策可信度与长期通胀风险。
AI.method: 利用Polymarket数据构建用户鹰派-鸽派评分，并关联其货币政策预期。
AI.findings: 预期特朗普解职鲍威尔的用户持更鸽派观点，预计短期利率更低，长期国债收益率更高。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了政治事件通过央行独立性影响货币政策预期的理论机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了政治压力对市场预期影响的实证依据。

title: Bitcoin's Political Orphanhood: Stablecoins, U.S. Regulation, and Shifting Demand in the Post-GENIUS Act Era
affiliations: Marquette University

detail.title: Bitcoin's Political Orphanhood: Stablecoins, U.S. Regulation, and Shifting Demand in the Post-GENIUS Act Era
detail.abstract: The passage of the GENIUS Act in 2025 marks a pivotal moment in U.S. cryptocurrency regulation, establishing a federal framework for payment stablecoins while notably excluding Bitcoin. This selective approach significantly reshapes the digital asset landscape, altering competitive dynamics and demand patterns. Bitcoin, once the leader in the cryptocurrency movement, is now "politically orphaned" in the American regulatory discourse, reflecting a policy preference for "useful, tame, and trackable" digital assets aligned with federal oversight and payment modernization goals. This paper investigates how the legislative emphasis on stablecoins over Bitcoin affects Bitcoin's demand as a payment vehicle, enhances the competitive standing of smart contract platforms like Ethereum and Solana, and explores the long-term implications for innovation and market structure within the U.S. digital asset sector. The regulatory pivot highlights a fundamental reorientation of policymakers' views on digital assets' role in the American financial system, favoring controllable and dollar-pegged stablecoins that bridge traditional finance and digital assets. Bitcoin's exclusion stems from its decentralized and censorship-resistant nature, which conflicts with traditional regulatory frameworks and makes integration into regulated payment systems challenging. This shift may solidify Bitcoin's role as a store of value, while stablecoins and smart contract platforms gain prominence in payments and programmable applications due to their regulatory alignment and technological versatility.

AI.tldr: 2025年通过的GENIUS法案是美国加密货币监管的关键时刻，建立了支付稳定币的联邦框架，但排除了比特币。这种选择性监管重塑了数字资产格局，影响了比特币的需求和竞争动态。
AI.research_question: GENIUS法案对稳定币的立法偏好如何影响比特币作为支付工具的需求，并改变智能合约平台的竞争地位？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在探讨监管政策如何重塑数字资产市场，特别是比特币与稳定币及智能合约平台的竞争关系。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于监管经济学和数字资产竞争理论，分析政策对市场结构和创新的影响。
AI.method: 通过文献分析和市场数据研究，评估法案对数字资产需求和竞争格局的影响。
AI.findings: 比特币因去中心化特性被排除在监管框架外，可能巩固其作为价值存储的角色；稳定币和智能合约平台因监管合规和技术优势在支付和可编程应用中崛起。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了监管政策对数字资产市场结构的深远影响，补充了监管经济学在加密货币领域的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和市场参与者提供了关于监管偏好如何塑造数字资产未来发展的见解。

title: Does LED Street Lighting Reduce Crime? Evidence From a Staggered Large-Scale Retrofitting Program
affiliations: University of Connecticut

detail.title: Does LED Street Lighting Reduce Crime? Evidence From a Staggered Large-Scale Retrofitting Program
detail.abstract: Street lighting can influence crime by modifying the built environment and opportunities for crime. Evidence primarily comes from localized lighting projects, the use of portable lighting towers, and short-term blackouts. These interventions do not resemble the city-wide street lighting changes that many jurisdictions have undertaken in recent years, such as the installation of light-emitting diode (LED) lighting. This research evaluates the large-scale LED retrofitting of street lighting in Mesa, AZ, which started in 2019 and is anticipated to be completed by 2026. By using eight years of incident-level data and a staggered difference-in-differences model, it assesses its impacts on public safety. Evidence indicates a decrease in crime, driven by a decline in theft and low-level offenses, with no detectable changes in violent crimes. The effects concentrated on the street segment of the intervention, with limited spatial displacement. Residential, commercial, and industrial zones seem to be affected differently by the LED lighting. An increase in foot traffic may have contributed to the changes in crime. The results suggest that city-wide LED street lighting interventions, even if they take several years to complete, can accrue public safety benefits.

AI.tldr: 该研究评估了美国亚利桑那州梅萨市大规模LED路灯改造对公共安全的影响，发现犯罪率下降，尤其是盗窃和轻微犯罪，但对暴力犯罪无显著影响。
AI.research_question: 大规模LED路灯改造对公共安全有何影响？
AI.motivation: 以往研究多关注局部照明干预，而缺乏对城市范围照明变化的评估。
AI.theoretical_framework: 环境犯罪学理论，强调照明通过改变环境机会影响犯罪。
AI.method: 使用八年事件级数据和交错双重差分模型。
AI.findings: 犯罪率下降，尤其是盗窃和轻微犯罪，暴力犯罪无变化；效果集中在干预路段，空间转移有限。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了城市范围照明干预对犯罪的影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为城市照明政策提供实证支持，建议推广LED路灯改造。

title: Psychological and Developmental Repercussions of Pervasive AI Usage in Schools: A Review of Educational Benefits and Challenges
affiliations: FEU Institute of Technology, Helwan University, Flinders University, University of Ghana - University of Ghana Business School (UGBS), affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Leeds, Arden University and Anadolu University

detail.title: Psychological and Developmental Repercussions of Pervasive AI Usage in Schools: A Review of Educational Benefits and Challenges
detail.abstract: This chapter explores the developmental implications of artificial intelligence (AI) in contemporary educational settings. Employing a dual-methodological approach that combines interdisciplinary expertise with an integrative literature review, the chapter explores how AI technologies are reshaping student identity, emotional regulation, motivation, autonomy, and interpersonal relationships. Drawing on developmental psychology, educational theory, and empirical research, it interrogates the unintended consequences of algorithmic surveillance, pedagogical automation, and AI-mediated social interactions. The analysis highlights both the affordances and risks of AI in education, including its impact on emotional resilience, self-directed learning, and the construction of academic identity. Reframing the discourse away from purely technical efficiency toward developmental integrity makes visible the deeper human stakes of AI integration in education. The chapter consequently calls for ethical, inclusive, and humancentered approaches to AI design and implementation in schools.

AI.tldr: 本章探讨了人工智能（AI）在现代教育环境中的发展影响，结合跨学科专业知识和文献综述，分析了AI技术如何重塑学生身份、情感调节、动机、自主性和人际关系。
AI.research_question: AI技术如何影响教育中的学生发展？
AI.motivation: 探讨AI在教育中的潜在影响，尤其是对学生发展的深远意义。
AI.theoretical_framework: 发展心理学、教育理论和实证研究。
AI.method: 双方法论（跨学科专业知识与文献综述结合）。
AI.findings: AI在教育中既提供了机会（如情感韧性和自主学习），也带来了风险（如算法监控和AI中介社交互动的意外后果）。
AI.theory_contributions: 将AI教育讨论从技术效率转向发展完整性，揭示了更深层次的人类利益。
AI.practical_contributions: 呼吁在教育中采用伦理、包容和以人为本的AI设计与实施方法。

AI.motivation: 合同中的排除条款解释存在争议，尤其是涉及‘预期利润’时，法院需明确其法律效力。

AI.theory_contributions: 明确了排除条款在‘预期利润’损失索赔中的适用性，丰富了合同法解释的理论。

title: Sylos Labini’s Unpublished Notes on Schumpeter’s Business Cycles
affiliations: Universitas Prasetiya Mulya - School of Business and Economics

detail.title: Sylos Labini’s Unpublished Notes on Schumpeter’s Business Cycles

publicationDetails.detailsText: Quarterly Journal of Austrian Economics, Vol. 14, No. 1, Spring 2011, pp. 88-129.

detail.abstract: Paolo Sylos Labini (1920–2005) was one of the most influential Italian economists in the post-World War II period. After graduating in 1942, he received a fellowship to study in the United States. He initially spent time in Chicago before moving to Harvard, where he attended Joseph Schumpeter’s lectures from 1948 to 1950. During this period, Sylos Labini read Schumpeter’s Business Cycles and decided to record his impressions, which he later shared with his former professor in February 1949. Schumpeter discussed these notes during a couple of his lectures. Though still unpublished, Sylos Labini gave me a copy during our first meeting in 2002, expressing his belief that the time had come to make them public. This paper analyzes the content of those unpublished notes, with a particular focus on the critical observations Sylos Labini made regarding Schumpeter’s theory of business cycles. In the final section, I outline Sylos Labini’s own theory of the business cycle—an intriguing synthesis of Schumpeterian, Keynesian, and Marxian ideas.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了Paolo Sylos Labini对Joseph Schumpeter商业周期理论的未发表笔记，重点关注其批判性观察，并探讨了Sylos Labini融合Schumpeterian、Keynesian和Marxian思想的商业周期理论。
AI.research_question: Sylos Labini对Schumpeter商业周期理论的批判性观察是什么？以及他如何融合多种理论提出自己的商业周期理论？
AI.motivation: Sylos Labini的未发表笔记提供了对Schumpeter理论的独特见解，且其理论融合了多种经济学思想，具有学术价值。
AI.theoretical_framework: Schumpeter的商业周期理论、Keynesian经济学、Marxian经济学。
AI.method: 分析Sylos Labini的未发表笔记，并对比Schumpeter的理论。
AI.findings: Sylos Labini对Schumpeter理论提出了批判性观察，并提出了融合多种理论的商业周期理论。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了商业周期理论的研究视角，展示了理论融合的可能性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为经济学研究提供了新的理论框架，启发后续研究。

title: The CLARITY Act's Unfinished Business
affiliations: Marquette University

detail.title: The CLARITY Act's Unfinished Business
detail.abstract: The recent passage of the GENIUS Act and the Digital Asset Market CLARITY Act in the U.S. signify a critical juncture for digital asset regulation, yet the CLARITY Act's binary securitiescommodities classification falls short of addressing the nuanced complexities of the digital asset landscape. This paper proposes economist Hyman Minsky's financial stability hypothesis as a more sophisticated framework for digital asset regulation, one that analyzes assets based on their cash-flow characteristics and systemic-risk profiles rather than their technological features or promotional language. The current "regulation by enforcement" approach by the SEC has drawn criticism for lacking clarity, and while the CLARITY Act attempts to delineate oversight between the SEC and CFTC, its binary system fails to differentiate between varied digital assets like fully backed stablecoins and speculative meme coins. This technological divergence leads to fundamentally different risk profiles that current securities laws, developed in the 1930s, struggle to address. Applying Minsky's taxonomy-categorizing assets as hedge, speculative, or Ponzi units-offers a functional approach to regulation, shifting focus from ideological debates to empirical analysis of economic behavior and systemic risk. This framework aligns with growing international consensus on functional rather than technological classification systems, offering a path for more effective oversight that protects investors while fostering legitimate innovation in the digital asset sector.

AI.tldr: 本文提出以Hyman Minsky的金融稳定性假说作为数字资产监管的框架，取代现行的二元分类法，以更精准地应对数字资产的复杂性和系统性风险。
AI.research_question: 如何通过更科学的框架（如Minsky的金融稳定性假说）改进数字资产的监管？
AI.motivation: 当前美国《CLARITY法案》的二元分类法无法应对数字资产的复杂性，SEC的“执法监管”也缺乏明确性。
AI.theoretical_framework: Hyman Minsky的金融稳定性假说，将资产分为对冲、投机和庞氏三类。
AI.method: 理论分析，提出基于现金流动特性和系统性风险的分类框架。
AI.findings: Minsky的分类法能更精准地识别风险，适用于数字资产监管。
AI.theory_contributions: 为数字资产监管提供了基于经济行为的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出了一种更有效的监管方法，保护投资者并促进创新。

title: The Double-Edged Sword: Behavioral Economics, Gamification, and Investor Welfare in India's Digital Brokerage Landscape
affiliations: University of Delhi - Hans Raj College

detail.title: The Double-Edged Sword: Behavioral Economics, Gamification, and Investor Welfare in India's Digital Brokerage Landscape
detail.abstract: India's capital markets are undergoing a period of unprecedented transformation, characterized by an explosive surge in retail investor participation. This phenomenon, largely catalyzed by the accessibility of digital trading platforms, represents a significant stride in financial inclusion. However, this report posits that the very mechanisms driving this inclusion-specifically, the gamification of trading applications-present a profound challenge to investor welfare. This paper conducts a comprehensive analysis of the intersection between behavioral economics, gamified user interface design, and the evolving regulatory framework in India. It establishes a theoretical foundation grounded in Prospect Theory and a taxonomy of cognitive biases to deconstruct how platform design leverages predictable human irrationality. Through a comparative analysis of platform design philosophies and case studies, including instances of catastrophic investor loss and examples of responsible design, the research demonstrates how gamified elements can amplify risk-taking by reframing investing as a competitive game. This trend has culminated in the proliferation of "dark patterns"-manipulative design choices that prioritize platform engagement over investor protection. The paper critically examines the regulatory response from the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI), tracing its strategic evolution from issuing behavioral warnings to implementing direct infrastructural interventions, such as restricting real-time data feeds to fantasy trading platforms. The central finding is that while gamification has been a powerful engine for market democratization, it simultaneously creates a high-risk environment for the burgeoning class of novice investors. The report concludes that safeguarding the future of Indian retail investing requires a multi-stakeholder commitment to a new paradigm of responsible financial innovation, where ethical design and investor education are paramount.

detail.abstract: This paper investigates how complexity affects individual risk attitudes in a laboratory experiment. While previous studies examined this question using expected utility (EU) models in lottery settings, we use both the EU and the Quantile Preferences (QP) models. The QP model identifies risk attitudes without relying on parametric assumptions about utility functions. In our experiment, complexity is defined along two dimensions: (1) the number of lotteries and (2) the number of outcome-probability pairs. The results show that, as complexity increases, EU estimates exhibit decreasing risk aversion and greater volatility, whereas QP yields more stable estimates with slightly increasing risk aversion.

title: Trading Around Geopolitics

detail.title: Trading Around Geopolitics

publicationDetails.journalName: CESifo Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: Geopolitical fragmentation triggers complex dynamics in international trade. This paper examines the effects of sanctions through the lens of a stylized model and the empirical analysis of Türkiye’s exports to Russia in the aftermath of Western measures imposed on Russia following its invasion of Ukraine in 2022. As sanctions force many exporters to discontinue or reduce their sales in the target country, firms responding to profit opportunities in that market face (i) a rise in the risk of nonpayment, (ii) higher costs of established trading practice, such as making payments in international currencies through international circuits and (iii) reputational risks and the threat of punitive measures, if their trading with the sanctioned country is exposed. We show that, in response to Western sanctions, Turkish firms sharply raised their exports to Russia, charging higher markups and prices, but also increased their reliance on cash-in-advance transactions and invoicing in Turkish liras instead of dollars. In contrast, Turkish affiliates of Western MNCs responded significantly less, if at all, suggesting a desire to avoid reputational costs. For these firms, a back-of-the-envelope calculation points to annualized foregone revenues of $50 million, with a reputational-risk effect equivalent to tariffs of up to 376%.

AI.tldr: 本文通过模型和实证分析研究了西方对俄制裁后土耳其对俄出口的动态变化，发现土耳其企业通过提高价格和依赖预付交易增加出口，而西方跨国公司则因声誉风险减少反应。

detail.abstract: We investigate the extent to which crime, and the inability to effectively suppress it, affect the performance of local banks in terms of credit extension, asset quality, and profitability. The analysis focuses on cooperative banks in Italy, typically small institutions with strong ties to their local communities, over the period 2013–2023. detail.abstract: We examine a green transition policy involving a tax on brown goods in an economy where preferences for green consumption consist of a constant intrinsic individual component and an evolving social component. We analyse equilibrium dynamics when social preferences exert a positive externality in green consumption, creating complementarity between policy and preferences. The results show that accounting for this externality allows for a lower tax rate compared to policy ignoring the social norm effects. Furthermore, stability conditions permit gradual tax reductions or even removal along the transition path, minimising welfare losses. Thus, incorporating policy-preference interactions improves green transition policy design.

detail.title: On the New Economic Theoretical Model in the Era of Artificial Intelligence and the Challenges Faced by the United States and China
detail.abstract: This study revises the Cobb-Douglas production function to model economic output in the era of artificial intelligence (AI), where AI-driven labor (L(AI)t) replaces traditional human labor. By integrating AI capital (K(AI)t) and technological progress (At), we derive a new economic growth framework, highlighting the pivotal role of innovative human resources (LTt) and AI-driven knowledge deduction in driving exponential growth, termed the "economic singularity." The model reveals that high-level R&D talent is critical for sustained growth, intensifying global competition, while AI's displacement of jobs exacerbates economic inequality. We analyze challenges for the United States, proposing a Universal Basic Income (UBI) Fund to mitigate inequality and sustain AI leadership, and for China, suggesting innovation-friendly reforms to enhance R&D efficiency (δ). This cross-disciplinary study bridges AI technology and economic theory, offering insights into global economic trends and policy 2 implications.

AI.tldr: 本研究修订了Cobb-Douglas生产函数，以建模人工智能（AI）时代的经济产出，其中AI驱动的劳动力取代传统人力劳动。通过整合AI资本和技术进步，提出了一个新的经济增长框架，强调创新人力资源和AI驱动的知识推导在推动指数增长中的关键作用，称为“经济奇点”。模型表明，高水平研发人才对持续增长至关重要，加剧了全球竞争，而AI对就业的替代加剧了经济不平等。分析了美国面临的挑战，提出了通用基本收入（UBI）基金以缓解不平等并维持AI领导地位；对中国则建议创新友好型改革以提高研发效率。这项跨学科研究连接了AI技术与经济理论，为全球经济趋势和政策提供了见解。
AI.research_question: 如何修订Cobb-Douglas生产函数以建模AI时代的经济产出，并分析其对经济增长和不平等的影响？

AI.theoretical_framework: 修订的Cobb-Douglas生产函数，整合AI资本、技术进步和创新人力资源。

AI.findings: AI驱动的经济增长依赖于高水平研发人才，但加剧了全球竞争和不平等。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了“经济奇点”概念，修订了生产函数以纳入AI因素。
AI.practical_contributions: 为美国和中国提出了政策建议，如UBI基金和创新友好型改革。

title: Born in the Land of Milk and Honey: Hometown Growth and Individual Wealth Accumulation
affiliations: University of Leipzig, German Institute for Economic Research (DIW Berlin) and German Institute for Economic Research (DIW Berlin)

publicationDetails.journalName: CESifo Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: How does economic growth affect individual wealth accumulation and, thereby, wealth inequality? Combining individual wealth from the Socio-Economic Panel (SOEP) and local GDP growth across 401 German counties, this paper documents a sizable Hometown-Growth-Wealth Nexus. We find that past variation in hometown growth across cohorts and regions contributes to high wealth inequality today. Individuals exposed to high growth during childhood save more and are more likely to be invested in housing. While this savings channel operates for heirs and non-heirs alike, heirs from the same hometown are richer. We validate the Hometown-Growth-Wealth Nexus and the savings channel for the UK.

AI.tldr: 经济增长通过童年时期的高增长环境促进个人储蓄和房产投资，进而加剧财富不平等。

AI.theoretical_framework: Hometown-Growth-Wealth Nexus（家乡增长与财富关系理论）。
AI.method: 结合德国社会经济面板（SOEP）数据和401个县的本地GDP增长数据进行分析，并在英国验证。
AI.findings: 童年时期的高增长环境导致个人储蓄增加和房产投资倾向，加剧财富不平等；继承者财富更高。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出并验证了Hometown-Growth-Wealth Nexus理论。

detail.abstract: Marriage often marks a turning point in the careers of many highly qualified women. Despite excelling in education and possessing strong qualifications, a significant number of women leave the workforce upon marriage or motherhood, choosing or being compelled to become homemakers. This report examines why this phenomenon occurs and explores societal, cultural, and economic factors that contribute to it. We also present statistics, case studies, and comparisons across regions, discuss the role of education and family dynamics, outline the psychological impacts, and evaluate barriers and potential solutions. The goal is to provide a comprehensive understanding of why so many educated women end up "at home after marriage" and what can be done to support their continued participation in the workforce.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了高学历女性婚后退出职场的原因，分析了社会、文化和经济因素，并提出了支持她们继续工作的解决方案。

detail.abstract: Executive Summary Traditional risk models reduce uncertainty to numerical probability, operational control, and regulatory compliance. Yet across health, finance, technology, and governance, we see the limits of this approach. Risk is not just calculated—it is experienced. It is shaped by stories, relationships, institutional behaviour, and the language through which we make meaning. This white paper introduces Behavioural Risk Assessment (BRA): a values-based methodology rooted in the Risk in Mind™ Framework. BRA enables leaders and systems to reframe risk as a communicative, cultural, and behavioural construct—driving clearer decisions, stronger trust, and greater ethical resilience across sectors.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了行为风险评估（BRA）方法，强调风险不仅是数值化的概率，还涉及文化、行为和沟通。

contentType.other: Not published but submitted at the Institute for Publication

detail.abstract: The study was conducted at DUWASA and TANESCO in Dodoma, and the general objective was to assess the role of risk management practices in improving organizational performance among public institutions. The specific objectives were: to determine types of risks commonly found in DUWASA and TANESCO, to examine coping strategies taken by DUWASA and TANESCO to manage risk and to determine how risk management practices contribute to organizational performance in DUWASA and TANESCO. The study employed a cross-sectional design, covering 40 respondents drawn from 20 DUWASA and 20 TANESCO respondents. When confirming the normal distribution of answers and the validity and reliability of the tool, a descriptive analysis is conducted between the variables investigated. Data were analyzed using descriptive and multiple response analysis using IBM-SPSS 20. This study has also shown that most public institutions recognize risk management practices for improving organizational performance. It is recommended by the researcher that public institutions should take cost-effective measures to identify risks promptly and effectively measures to mitigate risks continuously to ensure that they are still able to remain in a changing work environment. However, the researchers recommended that future research collect more data on the effect of risk management practices in improving organizational performance among public institutions in Tanzania. The study model has been developed from various sources to develop and increase awareness of public institutions on the importance of risk management practice.

detail.title: Altering the Perceived Morality of Strategic Mortgage Forbearance: A Test of the Disjunctive Theory
detail.abstract: We find support for the disjunctive theory in that allowing borrowers to pay any non-zero amount for the right to forbear mortgage payments shifts their mental framing from a morality-based choice to a purely financial decision. Moreover, the perceived morality of strategic forbearance is based on the borrower’s intended use of funds rather than the political or gender differences of the person who forbears, with investing in the stock market being less moral than precautionary savings or consolidating debts. Our results inform policymakers along a number of different, easily implementable dimensions geared towards reducing strategic forbearance while increasing desired forbearance take-up rates.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，允许借款人支付任意非零金额以获得抵押贷款延期支付权，会将其心理框架从基于道德的决策转变为纯粹的财务决策。此外，战略延期的道德感知取决于借款人资金的用途，而非其政治或性别差异，投资股市的道德性低于预防性储蓄或债务整合。研究结果为政策制定者提供了多个易于实施的维度，以减少战略延期并提高理想延期的采用率。
AI.research_question: 允许借款人支付非零金额以获得抵押贷款延期支付权如何影响其心理框架和道德感知？
AI.motivation: 探讨战略延期行为的心理和道德基础，为政策制定提供科学依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 分离理论（disjunctive theory），心理框架理论。
AI.method: 实证研究，分析借款人对延期支付权的心理和道德反应。
AI.findings: 支付非零金额将心理框架从道德转向财务；资金用途（如投资股市）影响道德感知。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了分离理论在金融决策中的应用，扩展了心理框架理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了减少战略延期、提高理想延期采用率的可行建议。

title: Crimes Against Humanity: An Annotated Bibliography
affiliations: Stanford Law School

detail.title: Crimes Against Humanity: An Annotated Bibliography
detail.abstract: This is an annotated bibliography of scholarship and jurisprudence involving crimes against humanity, an important element of the international criminal law canon. It elucidates the history of this offense (which traces its roots to the World War I period), elements of this offense, lingering areas of doctrinal indeterminacy, efforts at universal codification, and the most innovative scholarship grappling with the reach of this international offense.

AI.tldr: 本文是关于国际刑法中危害人类罪的学术与判例的注释书目，探讨了其历史、构成要件、理论争议、普遍法典化尝试及前沿研究。
AI.research_question: 危害人类罪在国际刑法中的历史、构成要件、理论争议及前沿研究是什么？
AI.motivation: 危害人类罪是国际刑法的重要组成部分，但其历史渊源、理论争议和实践应用仍需系统梳理。
AI.theoretical_framework: 国际刑法理论、危害人类罪的构成要件及历史发展。
AI.method: 文献综述与判例分析。
AI.findings: 危害人类罪起源于一战时期，其构成要件和理论争议仍在发展，法典化尝试和前沿研究为其提供了新视角。
AI.theory_contributions: 系统梳理了危害人类罪的理论框架和历史发展，填补了相关研究的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为国际刑法实践提供了理论支持，助力法典化和司法实践。

title: Re-Constructing the Triple Helix (Revised Version)
affiliations: Kingston University

detail.title: Re-Constructing the Triple Helix (Revised Version)
detail.abstract: Traditionally the triple helix model sees universities as knowledge sources, resulting in new commercial products manufactured by firms with the help of government support. This model has no units on the axes, and it is uncertain which strand of the helix initiates a process. More recent research shows that the triple helix model may need reconstruction. Generally, the sequence and prioritisation of the model's three core functions of the knowledge-based economy, which are economic wealth generation, scientific and technological innovation, and systemic oversight, remain inadequately addressed. This paper discusses these shortfalls.

AI.tldr: 传统三螺旋模型将大学视为知识来源，企业通过政府支持制造新产品。该模型缺乏明确单位和启动过程的主体，近期研究认为需重构。本文探讨了模型在知识经济三大核心功能（经济财富创造、科技创新、系统监管）中的不足。
AI.research_question: 三螺旋模型在知识经济中的三大核心功能（经济财富创造、科技创新、系统监管）的序列和优先级是否需重构？
AI.motivation: 传统三螺旋模型缺乏明确单位和启动过程的主体，且对知识经济核心功能的优先级未充分探讨。
AI.theoretical_framework: 三螺旋模型（大学、企业、政府）及其在知识经济中的应用。
AI.method: 理论分析与文献综述。
AI.findings: 传统三螺旋模型在知识经济核心功能的序列和优先级上存在不足，需进一步重构。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出三螺旋模型在知识经济中的功能重构需求。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和企业提供改进三螺旋合作的建议。

title: Fertilizer Management in Horticultural Crops
affiliations: Dr. Panjabrao Deshmukh Krishi Vidyapeeth and College of Agriculture

detail.title: Fertilizer Management in Horticultural Crops
detail.abstract: Efficient fertilizer management is essential for improving productivity and ensuring the sustainability of horticultural crops. Proper use of organic and inorganic fertilizers enhances soil fertility, boosts plant growth, and supports long-term soil health. Organic manures like farmyard manure, compost, and oil cakes contribute to soil structure and microbial activity, while inorganic fertilizers provide immediate nutrient availability. Nutrient requirements vary between annual and perennial crops, with timing and method of application playing a critical role in nutrient uptake. Methods such as broadcasting, band and ring placement, foliar spraying, fertigation, and tree injection are tailored to crop needs and environmental conditions. Strategic application during key growth stages maximizes efficiency and reduces losses. Understanding the nutrient content of different fertilizer sources and adopting suitable practices ensures balanced nutrition and promotes sustainable horticulture.

AI.tldr: 高效肥料管理对提高园艺作物生产力和可持续性至关重要，有机和无机肥料的合理使用可提升土壤肥力、促进植物生长并支持长期土壤健康。
AI.research_question: 如何通过高效肥料管理提升园艺作物的生产力和可持续性？
AI.motivation: 园艺作物的生产力和可持续性依赖于合理的肥料管理，研究旨在优化肥料使用策略。
AI.theoretical_framework: 土壤肥力理论、植物营养学、可持续农业理论。
AI.method: 分析有机和无机肥料的作用，探讨不同施肥方法（如撒施、条施、叶面喷施等）的适用性。
AI.findings: 合理使用有机和无机肥料可显著提升土壤健康和作物生长，施肥方法和时机对养分吸收至关重要。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了土壤肥力和植物营养管理的理论体系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为园艺作物提供了具体的施肥策略，支持可持续农业实践。

title: Legal Risks and Social Bonds: How Does Information About Risks Affect the Willingness to Grant a Third-Party Loan Guarantee?
affiliations: Oesterreichische Nationalbank (OeNB), Oesterreichische Nationalbank (OeNB), CESifo (Center for Economic Studies and Ifo Institute) - Ifo Institute and Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich (LMU) - ifo Institute (Leibniz Institute for Economic Research at the University of Munich)

detail.title: Legal Risks and Social Bonds: How Does Information About Risks Affect the Willingness to Grant a Third-Party Loan Guarantee?

publicationDetails.journalName: CESifo Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: Loan guarantees can enhance access to credit, but serving as a private guarantor may also increase financial vulnerability. We examine, through a randomized information experiment in the UK, how providing information about the legal ramifications and risks of loan guarantees affects individuals’ willingness to act as guarantors. We find that providing information about legal risks reduces the willingness to guarantee loans, with stronger effects for larger loan amounts. Social preferences influence individuals’ willingness to act as guarantors. Information about legal ramifications increases the willingness to grant a guarantee among altruists but decreases it among those high in positive reciprocity. While information about the UK default rate reduces willingness, individuals are less likely to update their expectations for someone they know personally, indicating in-group bias.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，提供贷款担保的法律风险信息会降低个人担任担保人的意愿，尤其是对大额贷款；社会偏好（如利他主义或互惠性）也会影响担保意愿；此外，对熟人的担保意愿受群体内偏见影响。
AI.research_question: 提供关于贷款担保法律风险的信息如何影响个人担任担保人的意愿？
AI.motivation: 探讨贷款担保在增加信贷获取的同时，可能带来的财务脆弱性，以及信息干预对担保意愿的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于行为经济学中的信息干预和社会偏好理论。
AI.method: 在英国进行的随机信息实验。
AI.findings: 法律风险信息降低担保意愿（尤其是大额贷款）；利他主义者更愿意担保，而高互惠性者反之；群体内偏见影响对熟人的担保意愿。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了信息干预和社会偏好对担保决策的影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和金融机构设计担保信息干预提供了依据。

title: Tariffs Across the Supply Chain
affiliations: European Central Bank (ECB), European Central Bank and European Central Bank (ECB)

detail.title: Tariffs Across the Supply Chain

publicationDetails.journalName: ECB: Working Paper Series (Topic)

detail.abstract: What are the macroeconomic impacts of tariffs on final goods versus intermediate inputs? We set up a two-region, multi-sector model with production networks, sticky prices and wages, and trade in consumption, investment, and intermediate goods. We show that import tariffs on final goods have a smaller negative impact on GDP compared to tariffs on intermediate inputs, as final goods can be more readily substituted with domestic alternatives. In contrast, tariffs on intermediate inputs lead to larger GDP losses, given the limited substitutability of foreign inputs and their role in global supply chains. Moreover, inflation persistence is lower under tariffs on final goods, whereas tariffs on intermediate goods amplify cost pressures through production linkages. The results imply that a revenue-equivalent approach to import tariffs, targeting only final goods, can cushion the adverse effects of trade wars.

AI.tldr: 本文通过两区域多部门模型分析关税对最终品和中间品的宏观经济影响，发现最终品关税对GDP的负面影响较小，而中间品关税导致更大损失。
AI.research_question: 最终品关税与中间品关税对宏观经济的影响有何不同？
AI.motivation: 探讨关税政策对不同类型商品的影响，为贸易战政策提供理论依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 两区域多部门模型，包含生产网络、粘性价格与工资、以及消费、投资和中间品贸易。
AI.method: 理论建模与数值模拟。
AI.findings: 最终品关税对GDP的负面影响较小，因其更易被国内替代；中间品关税导致更大GDP损失，因其替代性有限且影响供应链。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了关税类型对宏观经济影响的差异，丰富了贸易政策的理论分析。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议在贸易战中优先对最终品征收关税，以减轻负面影响。

title: Who are the Most Demanding Users of the Rio De Janeiro Metro? Perceptions, Socioeconomic Profile, and Service Quality
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Independent, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Federal University of Pará and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Who are the Most Demanding Users of the Rio De Janeiro Metro? Perceptions, Socioeconomic Profile, and Service Quality
detail.abstract: State capitals play a strategic role in urban and regional planning due to their concentration of economic, social, and cultural activities. In such contexts, ensuring an efficient and equitable public transportation system is essential to reduce inequalities, broaden access, and support sustainable urban development. The city of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, characterized by its geographical diversity and complex mobility demands, exemplifies these challenges. This study explores metro users’ perceptions of service quality, particularly how the COVID-19 pandemic reshaped expectations regarding safety and trust in public transportation. The central hypothesis is that satisfaction and the importance attributed to service attributes vary significantly across sociodemographic profiles such as age, gender, income, and frequency of use. A structured questionnaire was applied to 473 metro users, assessing satisfaction and perceived importance across nine service attributes: fare, safety, information, cleanliness, speed, operating hours, punctuality, comfort, and proximity. Data were collected through QR codes in stations and analyzed using Principal Component Analysis (PCA) followed by K-means clustering. The results reveal that mobility experiences are shaped by the interaction of various factors rather than a single attribute. Four distinct user profiles emerged, each with differing priorities and satisfaction levels. Higher-income, frequent users making work-related trips were more sensitive to operational and safety-related factors. In contrast, younger, lower-income users with less frequent use assigned lower importance to these attributes. The findings highlight the heterogeneity of user expectations and emphasize the need for differentiated strategies in public transport planning that consider sociodemographic and behavioral diversity.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了里约热内卢地铁用户对服务质量的感知，特别是COVID-19大流行如何重塑了安全和信任的期望。研究发现用户满意度与服务属性重要性因社会人口特征而异，提出了针对不同用户群体的差异化交通规划策略。
AI.research_question: COVID-19大流行如何影响地铁用户对服务质量的感知，以及这些感知如何因社会人口特征而异？
AI.motivation: 州首府在区域规划中具有战略地位，而高效的公共交通系统对减少不平等和促进可持续发展至关重要。里约热内卢的地理多样性和复杂交通需求使其成为研究这一问题的典型案例。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于服务质量感知理论和社会人口特征对用户行为的影响。
AI.method: 采用结构化问卷收集473名地铁用户的数据，通过主成分分析（PCA）和K-means聚类进行分析。
AI.findings: 研究发现用户对服务属性的满意度和重要性因年龄、性别、收入和使用频率而异，揭示了四种不同的用户群体及其优先级。
AI.theory_contributions: 研究丰富了服务质量感知理论，强调了社会人口特征在公共交通规划中的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 研究结果为公共交通规划提供了差异化策略，以满足不同用户群体的需求。

title: The Morality Multiplier: An Axiomatic Systems Theory of Socio-Economic Cycles
affiliations: Istanbul University

detail.title: The Morality Multiplier: An Axiomatic Systems Theory of Socio-Economic Cycles
detail.abstract: This paper introduces the Morality Multiplier System Theory, an axiomatic framework designed to explain the cyclical nature of social, political, and economic systems. The theory begins with the axiom that all entities seek to sustain their existence, defining this drive as their a priori morality. It establishes a model where social systems are composed of subsystems (individuals) and supersystems (societies), each with a corresponding moral domain (IMD and SMD). The theory posits that the perceived moral domain (eSMD) always lags behind the actual, expanding or contracting SMD, creating a dynamic space for what is defined as "immorality." By analogizing systemic change to a logistic growth curve, the theory maps distinct historical phases—identified as Communism (stasis), Capitalism (growth), and Socialism (decline)—to the mathematical relationship between the actual (SMD) and perceived (eSMD) moral domains. It argues that Marx was correct about the sequence of these phases but not their content, which is determined by the underlying infrastructure and the SMD/IMD ratio (the Morality Multiplier). The theory re-interprets modern phenomena, proposing that the post-1971 credit era is an analogue for socialism and that neoliberalism functions as a high-ratio analogue for primitive communism. Ultimately, the Morality Multiplier offers a new lens for analyzing historical cycles and predicting future systemic shifts, including the potential impacts of artificial intelligence and transhumanism on social morality.

AI.tldr: 本文提出道德乘数系统理论，解释社会、政治和经济系统的周期性。理论基于实体维持存在的公理，定义社会系统为子系统和超系统，分析道德域滞后现象，并类比历史阶段为共产主义、资本主义和社会主义。
AI.research_question: 如何解释社会、政治和经济系统的周期性变化？
AI.motivation: 理解社会系统的动态变化及其道德基础，预测未来系统演变。
AI.theoretical_framework: 道德乘数系统理论，包括子系统和超系统的道德域（IMD和SMD），以及滞后现象（eSMD）。
AI.method: 公理化框架，类比历史阶段为数学关系（SMD/eSMD）。
AI.findings: 历史阶段（共产主义、资本主义、社会主义）由SMD/IMD比例决定；后1971信贷时代类比社会主义，新自由主义类比原始共产主义。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出道德乘数理论，重新解释历史阶段及其动态关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为分析历史周期和预测未来系统变化（如AI和超人类主义）提供新视角。

title: Sustainable Tourist Infrastructure Development Plan for Manali: A Comprehensive Strategy for 2025
affiliations: Guru Nanak Dev University (GNDU)

detail.title: Sustainable Tourist Infrastructure Development Plan for Manali: A Comprehensive Strategy for 2025
detail.abstract: This research paper presents a comprehensive tourist infrastructure development plan for Manali, Himachal Pradesh, India, targeting implementation by 2025. The study employs mixed-method analysis combining quantitative tourism data, stakeholder interviews, and spatial analysis to propose sustainable infrastructure solutions. The research identifies critical infrastructure gaps, proposes integrated development strategies, and provides implementation frameworks addressing environmental conservation, economic viability, and social equity. Key findings indicate that strategic infrastructure investment of ₹2,847 crores could increase tourist capacity by 45% while maintaining ecological integrity.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一项针对印度喜马偕尔邦马纳里的全面旅游基础设施发展计划，目标在2025年前实施。研究采用混合方法分析，结合定量旅游数据、利益相关者访谈和空间分析，提出可持续的基础设施解决方案。研究识别了关键基础设施缺口，提出了综合发展战略，并提供了兼顾环境保护、经济可行性和社会公平的实施框架。关键发现表明，284.7亿卢比的战略基础设施投资可将旅游容量提高45%，同时保持生态完整性。
AI.research_question: 如何为印度喜马偕尔邦马纳里制定一个可持续的旅游基础设施发展计划，以在2025年前实现经济、社会和环境的多重目标？
AI.motivation: 马纳里作为热门旅游目的地，面临基础设施不足和生态压力的问题，亟需一个可持续的发展计划来平衡旅游增长与环境保护。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于可持续旅游发展理论、利益相关者理论和空间规划理论。
AI.method: 采用混合方法分析，包括定量旅游数据分析、利益相关者访谈和空间分析。
AI.findings: 关键发现表明，284.7亿卢比的战略基础设施投资可将旅游容量提高45%，同时保持生态完整性。
AI.theory_contributions: 研究丰富了可持续旅游发展理论，特别是在基础设施规划中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为马纳里提供了具体的实施框架和投资建议，对类似旅游目的地的规划具有参考价值。

title: Foreclosure Incentives with Network Effects: A Framework for Screening Digital Mergers
affiliations: Tilburg University - Tilburg University School of Economics and Management and CORE/LIDAM - Université catholique de Louvain

detail.title: Foreclosure Incentives with Network Effects: A Framework for Screening Digital Mergers
detail.abstract: This paper proposes a simple yet useful framework for evaluating vertical mergers in digital markets by distinguishing between product-specific and ecosystem-specific network effects. Vis-\'a-vis no network effects, product-specific network effects amplify foreclosure and steering incentives, as a rival’s growth directly undermines the platform’s  product value. Conversely, ecosystem-specific effects dampen foreclosure incentives, since rivals contribute to the overall value of the platform ecosystem. We develop a formal model illustrating how this distinction shapes platform behavior and competitive outcomes. We apply this distinction to real-world examples to illustrate its potential usefulness. Our distinction implies that regulators may want to adopt a stricter standard with no presumption of efficiencies where product-specific effects dominate. In contrast, when ecosystem-specific effects prevail, merger evaluation should mirror traditional vertical merger analysis.  Thus, offering a more nuanced approach to merger evaluation by presenting a practical screening tool to identify problematic vertical mergers in markets featuring network effects.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种简单但实用的框架，用于评估数字市场中的垂直合并，通过区分产品特定和生态系统特定的网络效应。研究发现，产品特定网络效应会放大排他性和引导激励，而生态系统特定效应则会减弱这些激励。
AI.research_question: 如何区分产品特定和生态系统特定的网络效应对垂直合并的影响？
AI.motivation: 数字市场中网络效应对垂直合并的影响尚未得到充分研究，需要更细致的分析框架。
AI.theoretical_framework: 产品特定和生态系统特定的网络效应理论。
AI.method: 开发形式模型并应用于实际案例。
AI.findings: 产品特定效应主导时，监管应更严格；生态系统特定效应主导时，可沿用传统垂直合并分析。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了区分网络效应类型的新框架，丰富了垂直合并理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为监管机构提供了实用的筛选工具，以识别问题垂直合并。

title: Mother Labor Supply and Child Care after Covid-19: Considering the Role of the Cohabiting Grandmother
affiliations: Seinan Gakuin University and Osaka University - Center for Infectious Disease Education and Research

detail.title: Mother Labor Supply and Child Care after Covid-19: Considering the Role of the Cohabiting Grandmother
detail.abstract: This study examined how the novel coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) disease influenced mother labor supply when a child required care by considering changes in the relationships between family members, particularly the role of co-residing grandmothers in increasing mothers’ labor supply. An analysis of panel data from 2016 to 2024, which covers the period before and after the pandemic, revealed a post-pandemic increase in the labor supply of mothers who resided with children. Furthermore, the labor supply increased if the mother and child resided with grandmother. The relationship between remote work and grandmother support was complementary and the effect was stronger for single mothers than for married mothers. This effect was observed for the mother’s own mother but not for her mother-in-law.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了COVID-19如何通过家庭成员关系变化（尤其是祖母同住）影响母亲劳动力供给。面板数据分析显示，疫情后与孩子同住的母亲劳动力供给增加，且与祖母同住时增幅更大。远程工作与祖母支持互补，单亲母亲效应更强。
AI.research_question: COVID-19如何通过家庭成员关系变化（尤其是祖母同住）影响母亲劳动力供给？
AI.motivation: 探讨疫情对家庭结构和母亲劳动力供给的影响，特别是祖母角色的作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 家庭经济学、劳动力供给理论、代际支持理论。
AI.method: 2016-2024年面板数据分析，涵盖疫情前后。
AI.findings: 疫情后与孩子同住的母亲劳动力供给增加；与祖母同住时增幅更大；远程工作与祖母支持互补；单亲母亲效应更强；仅对生母有效。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了代际支持对劳动力供给影响的理论，强调疫情背景下的家庭动态变化。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供支持家庭劳动力供给的建议，尤其是单亲母亲和远程工作结合祖母支持的政策。

title: Sustainable Migration Haunting European Law
affiliations: Lund University - Faculty of Law

detail.title: Sustainable Migration Haunting European Law
detail.abstract: As part of an edited collection published by the Lund University, Agenda 2030 Graduate School, this essay presents a theoretical reflection on sustainability and EU migration law. Drawing on Derrida I suggest that sustainable migration could be understood as a specter haunting EU migration law.

AI.tldr: 本文通过德里达的理论视角，探讨了可持续性与欧盟移民法的关系，提出可持续移民是欧盟移民法的幽灵。
AI.research_question: 如何从理论角度理解可持续性与欧盟移民法的关系？
