title: Gas Flows and Strategic Gaps: The EU-Azerbaijan Energy Partnership under Scrutiny
affiliations: London School of Economics & Political Science (LSE)

detail.title: Gas Flows and Strategic Gaps: The EU-Azerbaijan Energy Partnership under Scrutiny
detail.abstract: Since the 2022 signing of a strategic energy partnership between the European Union and Azerbaijan, Baku has emerged as a key alternative supplier of natural gas to Europe amid efforts to reduce dependence on Russian energy. However, this article exposes a critical contradiction in the EU's energy diversification strategy: the increasing likelihood that Russian gas is being rerouted through Azerbaijan and sold into European markets under the Azerbaijani label. Drawing on recent supply data, contract developments, infrastructure bottlenecks, and energy partnerships, the study demonstrates that Azerbaijan lacks the production capacity to fulfill its ambitious export pledges to the EU without supplementing domestic supplies through imports from Russia and Turkmenistan. The article also highlights the growing role of Russian companies in Azerbaijan's gas value chain, including Lukoil's significant stake in the Shah Deniz field. An input-output analysis of Azerbaijan's 2023 gas flows reveals a troubling statistical imbalance, raising the possibility of indirect Russian gas re-exports to the EU. The paper concludes that Europe's shortterm geopolitical needs have eclipsed its long-term energy independence goals, and that without stricter supply chain transparency and oversight, the EU risks undermining its own energy security and climate commitments.

title: Strategies Are Not Algorithms
affiliations: SUNY College at Brockport

detail.title: Strategies Are Not Algorithms
detail.abstract: Institutions in economics are commonly modeled as repeated games, and strategies in repeated games are modeled as algorithms. Algorithms are explicit sequences of instructions that map from an input to an output. But in a world of open-ended affordances, Goodhart’s law implies no finite-length algorithm can maintain cooperation in large groups over time, posing a fundamental limit to algorithmic models of human cooperation. Instead, this paper suggests strategies be modeled as interpretive, a nonsymbolic mapping using holistic distance to inductively learned category exemplars. This has long been understood to be true of the human brain, but recent implementation of large-scale interpretive systems in silico holds forth the possibility of tractable general equilibrium models of human cooperation in open-ended worlds.

AI.tldr: 经济学中的制度常被建模为重复博弈，而博弈策略则被建模为算法。然而，在开放环境中，Goodhart定律表明有限长度的算法无法维持大规模群体的长期合作，这对人类合作的算法模型提出了根本性限制。本文提出将策略建模为“解释性”的非符号映射，利用整体距离与归纳学习的类别范例，为开放世界中的合作提供了可行的均衡模型。

title: Against Sanctions
affiliations: California State University

detail.title: Against Sanctions

keywords: New Haven School of International Law

detail.abstract:
Economic sanctions are often portrayed as peaceful alternatives to war. This Article challenges that narrative, arguing that sanctions are a form of economic warfare that frequently precedes or complements military conflict. Rather than achieving their intended political goals, sanctions often inflict disproportionate harm on civilian populations. The Article critiques the prevailing frameworks in international law, which have failed to address the destructive nature of sanctions or to regulate their use effectively. By analyzing historical patterns and contemporary practices, it highlights the need for a more robust normative approach to economic sanctions.

The Article introduces three distinct theories of sanctions, each offering a different perspective on their role and impact. It calls them the Compliance Theory of Sanctions, the Humanitarian Theory of Sanctions, and the Critical Theory of Sanctions. It shows the limitation of each theory. This Article offers a new perspective. Economic sanctions, the Article argues, risk destabilizing the post-World War II liberal order by undermining global economic stability and international cooperation. As the world shifts from a unipolar to a multipolar structure, overreliance on sanctions heightens tensions and invites retaliatory actions, potentially leading to broader conflicts. To counter these risks, the Article proposes a new normative framework that confines sanctions to serious violations of peremptory norms of international law affecting human dignity. The Article’s normative framework emphasizes clear objectives, robust monitoring mechanisms, and international oversight to ensure accountability. It also advocates for practical measures like sunset clauses to prevent indefinite sanctions and restrictions on unilateral actions to avoid misuse. By redefining the role of economic sanctions, the Article seeks to establish a more just and stable global order, using sanctions as a tool of last resort rather than a default policy instrument.

publicationDetails.detailsText: St. Thomas University, Intercultural Human Rights Law Review, Volume 20, 2025

detail.abstract: In the process of developing a new approach to the particular social group ground of asylum, the federal circuit courts should first acknowledge the trauma that asylum applicants have experienced. Not only is the trauma relevant to the persecution that applicants have endured or will endure, but trauma experienced is relevant to the manner in which applicants tell their stories in their asylum applications, in supporting declarations, and in their testimony at trial. This article argues that the trauma-informed approach being put forth here is the lens that should always be used in asylum, including when reformulating this definition.  It is consistent with the deferential tone of INS v. Cardoza-Fonseca in its recognition of the humanitarian purpose of asylum, which establishes that a ten percent likelihood of future persecution is all that is needed to establish well-founded fear. A trauma informed perspective would force a uniform approach to the definition across federal circuits, thereby increasing the judicial economy by standardizing the basic understanding that asylum applicants come to the table with several disadvantages.  It would also be consistent with our humanitarian responsibility to refugees, and it would help to compensate for the fact that asylum seekers often go without representation. This article ends by providing tips on how to approach PSG formulation in the present day while we await direction from circuit courts of appeal.

detail.abstract: This Insight examines the developments in the EU restrictive measures against Russia in the aftermath of the full-scale aggression in Ukraine, focusing on the novel "(g) criterion" designed to target Russian businesspersons (often referred to as Russian oligarchs). The analysis illustrates the recent litigation before the General Court, in which targeted individuals seek to annul their designations. It highlights that, compared to previous sanctions practice, the new criterion adopts an innovative sector-based approach, establishing a new link between businesspersons operating in certain economic sectors and vital source of revenue for the Russian government. The Insight further explores the Court's cautious stance on de-listing Russian businesspersons, emphasizing the prudent assessment of evidence and circumvention attempts. Finally, the Insight points to the broad implications of the "(g) criterion" and suggests that the Council holds considerable political discretion in exerting maximum pressure on Russia's business elite, with the ultimate objective of reducing the Kremlin's ability to finance its war.

detail.title: Sustainable Investment Management in the European Union
detail.abstract:
The aim of this article is to provide a coherent discussion of the main European sustainability rules that must be observed by individual asset managers and investment fund managers (collectively referred to below as asset managers). The recent proposals to weaken or in any event simplify European sustainability rules are also discussed.

First, the author deals with the European sustainability rules with which asset managers must comply in so far as they relate to the relationship with external parties (clients, other investors and members of the general public): (I) providing sustainability transparency under (i) the Sustainable Finance Disclosure Regulation (SFDR), (ii) the ESMA Guidelines on Funds’ Names, (iii) the Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive (CSRD), (iv) the Taxonomy Regulation and (v) the Corporate Sustainability Due Diligence Directive (CSDDD); (II) inquiring about client sustainability preferences under (i) the Markets in Financial Instruments Directive II (MiFID II) and (ii) the European Long Term Investment Fund (ELTIF) Regulation.

Second, the author considers the internally-focused sustainability rules, i.e. those that explicitly or implicitly impose requirements on the internal operations of asset managers: (I) the due diligence obligations under (i) the CSDDD, (ii) the SFDR, (iii) the Taxonomy Regulation and (iv) the CSRD; (II) the obligation to prepare, update and implement a climate transition plan under the CSDDD and the CSRD; (III) the obligation to integrate sustainability risks into their policies, for example their remuneration policies, their product governance and their investment policies.

The author concludes that the EU sustainability rules with which asset managers must comply are extremely complex and not infrequently unclear, creating practical application problems, legal uncertainty and high compliance costs. The sustainability transparency provisions are so detailed and complex that retail investors struggle to understand them. Despite the EU’s introduction of all new sustainability rules, reports of greenwashing have proved persistent. For all these reasons, it is doubtful whether the EU sustainability rules will make a sufficient contribution to the transition to a more sustainable world. Finally, it is clear that sustainability thinking in Europe is currently undergoing a transformation. At present, the European Commission is trying to lighten the burden on European businesses by weakening or in any event simplifying EU sustainability rules in order to enhance Europe’s competitiveness.

AI.tldr: 本文讨论了欧洲资产管理者需遵守的可持续发展规则，分析了其复杂性、应用问题及欧盟近期简化规则的提议。
AI.research_question: 欧洲资产管理者需遵守的可持续发展规则是什么？这些规则是否足够推动可持续发展？
AI.motivation: 探讨欧洲可持续发展规则的复杂性及其对资产管理者、投资者和公众的影响，以及欧盟简化规则的动机。
AI.theoretical_framework: 以欧盟的可持续发展法规（如SFDR、CSRD、CSDDD等）为理论基础。
AI.method: 文献分析与政策讨论。
AI.findings: 欧盟可持续发展规则复杂且不清晰，导致应用困难和高合规成本；零售投资者难以理解透明度条款；绿色washing问题持续存在。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了欧盟可持续发展规则的实际问题及其对可持续转型的潜在影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为资产管理者、政策制定者和投资者提供了对规则复杂性的认识，并探讨了简化规则的必要性。

title: How Big Is Too Big? The Competitive Effects of Shipping Technology Innovation
affiliations: Cornerstone Research, Inc. - Boston Office

detail.title: How Big Is Too Big? The Competitive Effects of Shipping Technology Innovation

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The views and opinions expressed in this paper are solely those of the author and do not necessarily reflect the view of any affiliated institutions or the company the author is employed by.

detail.abstract: Technological innovation drives economic progress but can also lead to unintended consequences, such as market over-consolidation. This paper examines the competitive effects of technological advancement in the container shipping industry, focusing on the relationship between vessel size and market structure, and its impact on welfare. Using a dynamic oligopoly model and proprietary data, we quantify the economies of scale associated with vessel size and explore how it interact with market competition and investment behavior. We find that a 10% increase in vessel size reduces operational costs by 3.4% but contributes to market concentration, potentially offsetting consumer benefits. Counterfactual analysis suggests that the welfare-optimal vessel size is around 20,000 TEU under current demand level, as larger vessels risk over-consolidating the market. Additionally, smaller innovation steps promote competition, while larger steps drive consolidation. These findings highlight the need for policymakers to balance the efficiency gains of technological advancements with their competitive impacts, particularly when designing infrastructure investments in industries with strong economies of scale.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了集装箱航运业中技术进步对市场竞争的影响，特别是船舶规模与市场结构的关系及其对福利的影响。研究发现，船舶规模增加10%可降低运营成本3.4%，但也导致市场集中度上升，可能抵消消费者利益。最优船舶规模约为20,000 TEU，更大的船舶可能导致市场过度集中。
AI.research_question: 技术进步（特别是船舶规模扩大）如何影响集装箱航运业的市场竞争和福利？
AI.motivation: 技术创新虽推动经济进步，但也可能带来市场过度集中等负面效应。本文旨在量化船舶规模的经济效益及其对市场竞争的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 动态寡头垄断模型，结合规模经济理论。
AI.method: 使用动态寡头垄断模型和专有数据，量化船舶规模的规模经济效应及其对市场竞争和投资行为的影响。
AI.findings: 船舶规模增加10%降低运营成本3.4%，但导致市场集中度上升；最优船舶规模为20,000 TEU；小规模创新促进竞争，大规模创新推动集中。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了技术进步与市场竞争的复杂关系，为规模经济与市场结构的动态互动提供了理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了平衡技术进步效率与市场竞争影响的依据，特别是在基础设施投资设计中。

title: Quantifying the Use of Evidence in Policymaking in the Philippines: An NLP-Based Analysis of the Use of Evidence in the House of Representatives from the 13th to 19th Congress
affiliations: National Graduate Institute for Policy Studies (GRIPS), University of the Philippines Diliman, Bureau of the Treasury, University of the Philippines, University of the Philippines and University of the Philippines

detail.title: Quantifying the Use of Evidence in Policymaking in the Philippines: An NLP-Based Analysis of the Use of Evidence in the House of Representatives from the 13th to 19th Congress
detail.abstract: In recent years,  evidence-informed policymaking has significantly come into the fore, driven by greater demand for specialized knowledge due to the ever-increasing complex and multifaceted needs of contemporary governance. In the Philippines, despite the existence of institutions and initiatives promoting EBPM, there appears to be little systematic effort to assess the extent to which evidence has been used in policymaking. In an effort to fill this gap, this paper will explore EBPM in the country’s national legislative bodies, the Philippine Senate and House of Representatives, and measure their use of research evidence, particularly at the formulation and deliberation stages. To achieve this, we will conduct a big data analysis of all the bills, resolutions, and committee and plenary proceedings filed during the 13th to 19th Congress. Given the enormous amount of data needed to cover for the analysis, data collection will utilize a semi-automated tool that integrates Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques. Particularly, these techniques, which employ computational methods to analyze and interpret human language, will then be used to mine policy documents, assist the labeling process carried out by the authors, and automatically identify policies that make use of research evidence. The analysis will then proceed with characterizing the evidence used in these documents, examining their sources, nature, and rigor. To conclude, the study hopes to proffer recommendations in view of promoting the use of research evidence in the Philippine Congress and suggest areas for further academic and policy research inquiry.

AI.tldr: 本文通过大数据分析和自然语言处理技术，评估菲律宾国会（参议院和众议院）在政策制定中研究证据的使用情况，旨在填补系统性评估的空白，并提出改进建议。

title: Iran's Sustainability Gap: An Economic Analysis
affiliations: Islamic Azad University (IAU) - Economics and Accounting College and Islamic Azad University (IAU) - Economics and Accounting College

detail.title: Iran's Sustainability Gap: An Economic Analysis
detail.abstract: Iran faces a widening sustainability gap as biocapacity stagnates while the ecological footprint expands. This study investigates how external debt, economic growth, natural resource rents, and renewable energy consumption affect the national load capacity factor-a composite index of biocapacity relative to ecological demand. Annual data for 1995-2023 were compiled from the World Bank and the Global Footprint Network. After verifying integration orders with Augmented Dickey-Fuller tests and selecting an optimal lag length, Johansen cointegration confirmed the presence of a long-run equilibrium relationship. Long-run coefficients were then estimated using Fully Modified Ordinary Least Squares (FMOLS). Model adequacy was evaluated with Hansen and Park cointegration tests, Jarque-Bera normality, and Ljung-Box and ARCH diagnostics. FMOLS estimates revealed positive elasticities for external debt (0.12) and renewable energy consumption (0.11), indicating that prudent external financing and clean-energy expansion enhance Iran's load capacity factor. Conversely, economic growth (-0.96) and natural resource rents (-0.12) exhibited negative elasticities, reflecting the resource-curse effect and the economy's current position on the upward phase of the Environmental Kuznets Curve. Diagnostic tests detected no autocorrelation, heteroskedasticity, or coefficient instability. managed sovereign borrowing and accelerated investment in renewables can improve Iran's environmental carrying capacity, provided that growth strategies become less resource-intensive and rent dependence diminishes. Policy measures should include carbon-linked fiscal rules, green load-capacity bonds, a naturalresource-rent stabilization fund, and an inflation-indexed carbon tax whose proceeds support renewable feed-in tariffs.

AI.tldr: 伊朗面临生态足迹扩大而生物承载力停滞的可持续性缺口。研究发现外部债务和可再生能源消费对负载能力因子有正面影响，而经济增长和自然资源租金有负面影响。政策建议包括碳相关财政规则和绿色债券。
AI.research_question: 外部债务、经济增长、自然资源租金和可再生能源消费如何影响伊朗的负载能力因子？
AI.motivation: 伊朗的生态足迹扩大而生物承载力停滞，导致可持续性缺口，需研究其影响因素。
AI.theoretical_framework: 环境库兹涅茨曲线、资源诅咒效应。
AI.method: 使用完全修正普通最小二乘法（FMOLS）分析1995-2023年数据。
AI.findings: 外部债务和可再生能源消费对负载能力因子有正面影响，经济增长和自然资源租金有负面影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了资源诅咒效应和环境库兹涅茨曲线在伊朗的适用性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议通过碳相关财政规则、绿色债券和可再生能源投资改善环境承载力。

title: The Productivity Myth: Why Scarcity Drives All Value
affiliations: Independant

detail.title: The Productivity Myth: Why Scarcity Drives All Value

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The author declares no personal, financial, or professional conflict of interest related to this research. The views expressed are solely those of the author and do not represent any institutional affiliation or organization.
declarations.ethicsApproval: No human participants, personal data, or case studies were involved in this theoretical study. Ethics approval was therefore not required.
declarations.funderStatement: This research was conducted independently and received no funding. All data and sources cited in this paper are publicly available and verifiable.

detail.abstract: Mainstream economic thought views productivity, the ability to transform inputs into valuable outputs, as the foundation of asset value. This paper challenges that view. We argue that value originates from scarcity, not productivity. All assets require some productive effort in their creation, but this alone does not sustain value. Many assets, such as gold, Bitcoin, or art, derive their worth from constrained access rather than ongoing productive transformation. We distinguish between scarce resources as inputs and economic scarcity as a monetizable condition. Productivity may help create or channel scarcity, but it is scarcity that gives rise to and sustains value.

AI.tldr: 本文挑战了主流经济学观点，认为资产价值源于稀缺性而非生产力。
AI.research_question: 资产价值的真正来源是生产力还是稀缺性？
AI.motivation: 主流经济学认为生产力是资产价值的基础，但许多资产（如黄金、比特币、艺术品）的价值源于稀缺性而非生产力。
AI.theoretical_framework: 稀缺性理论，区分了作为投入的稀缺资源和可货币化的经济稀缺性。
AI.method: 理论分析，通过案例（如黄金、比特币、艺术品）支持论点。
AI.findings: 稀缺性是资产价值的真正来源，生产力仅能创造或引导稀缺性。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战了主流经济学对资产价值的理解，提出了稀缺性为核心的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者和政策制定者提供了新的视角，强调稀缺性在资产定价中的重要性。

title: A Continuous Combinatorial Financial Exchange: Design, Simulations, and Live Testing
affiliations: University of Cambridge - Faculty of Economics, California Institute of Technology (Caltech) - Division of the Humanities and Social Sciences, Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University, University of Cambridge and University of Melbourne - Department of Finance

detail.title: A Continuous Combinatorial Financial Exchange: Design, Simulations, and Live Testing

declarations.ethicsApproval: University of Melbourne Ethics ID Number 20805.

detail.abstract: We present the design of a continuous double-sided combinatorial financial exchange (COEX), where orders are submitted for trader-defined bundles of assets, with allocational outcomes superior to the status quo mechanism and attractive computational properties. In a live experiment, 82% of trading volume originates in "combinatorial" orders. Traders reveal preferences for diversification, which they accomplish better with COEX than the status quo mechanism. In the human experiment and large-scale simulation of 120 agents, clearing computation times are uniformly below 1/3 second. Understanding matching requisites is important; enforcing a "No-Envy Condition" reduces trade, doubles clearing times, and exposes the market to manipulation.

AI.tldr: 本文设计了一种连续双面组合金融交易所（COEX），其订单提交方式为交易者自定义资产组合，分配结果优于现有机制且具有吸引人的计算特性。实验表明，82%的交易量来自组合订单，交易者更倾向于多样化，COEX比现有机制更能满足这一需求。在人类实验和大规模模拟中，清算时间均低于1/3秒。研究发现，强制“无嫉妒条件”会减少交易、延长清算时间并增加市场操纵风险。
AI.research_question: 如何设计一种能够优化资产组合分配并提升交易效率的金融交易所机制？
AI.motivation: 现有金融交易所机制在资产组合分配和交易效率方面存在不足，需要一种更优的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于组合拍卖理论和市场设计理论，研究资产组合分配的最优机制。
AI.method: 通过人类实验和大规模模拟（120个代理）验证COEX的性能，并与现有机制对比。
AI.findings: 82%的交易量来自组合订单，COEX在多样化需求满足和清算效率上优于现有机制。强制“无嫉妒条件”会带来负面影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种新的连续双面组合金融交易所机制，丰富了市场设计理论。
AI.practical_contributions: COEX机制在实际交易中表现出高效性和实用性，为金融交易所设计提供了新思路。

title: The Schrödinger Dollar: An Operational Constructivist Approach to Monetary Value and Entropy
affiliations: Independent Researcher

detail.title: The Schrödinger Dollar: An Operational Constructivist Approach to Monetary Value and Entropy

keywords: Philosophy of Science This work utilized multiple Large Language Models (LLMs)

detail.abstract: Modern monetary value, particularly for fiat and digital currencies, exhibits a profound contingency and probabilistic nature that challenges classical economic models. This paper introduces the "Schrödinger Dollar" as a phenomenological model (Level 2 in a hierarchy of understanding) to better describe this reality. Grounded in a philosophical methodology of Operational Constructivism (OC), this paper argues that the "reality" of monetary value is not assumed but must be continuously "earned" through the successful functioning of the systems and belief structures that sustain it. We deconstruct the value of modern money by applying a multilayered entropic framework, distinguishing between material/energy, informational, social, and systemic entropy. The analysis reveals that the stability of the "Schrödinger Dollar" is an emergent, low-entropy state, a probabilistic outcome of continuous "negentropic work" performed by institutions to manage these interacting layers of disorder. By examining phenomena like speculative bubbles, multiple equilibria, and the real-world costs of cryptocurrency creation, we illustrate how an OC-informed, entropically-aware perspective provides a more robust framework for understanding monetary dynamics and navigating the inherent uncertainties of complex financial systems. Finally, present a number of Unanswered Questions and discuss some promising research approaches to address them.

AI.tldr: 本文提出“薛定谔美元”作为现象学模型，通过操作建构主义和多层熵框架分析现代货币价值的偶然性和概率性，揭示其稳定性是低熵状态的涌现结果。
AI.research_question: 如何更好地描述现代货币价值的偶然性和概率性？
AI.motivation: 古典经济模型难以解释现代货币价值的动态性和不确定性，需要新的理论框架。
AI.theoretical_framework: 操作建构主义（OC）和多层熵框架（物质/能量熵、信息熵、社会熵、系统熵）。
AI.method: 哲学方法论和熵分析，结合现实案例（如投机泡沫、加密货币成本）。
AI.findings: 货币价值的稳定性是低熵状态的涌现结果，依赖于持续的“负熵工作”。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出“薛定谔美元”模型，扩展了对货币价值的理解。
AI.practical_contributions: 为复杂金融系统的管理提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Weather Guarantees for Experience Products
affiliations: Concordia University and University of Colorado at Boulder

detail.title: Weather Guarantees for Experience Products
detail.abstract: Many activities, such as beach vacations and camping trips, require advance planning. However, the experience of these activities depends heavily on weather conditions. As a result, customers often cancel reservations upon unfavorable weather forecasts. To address this issue, many service providers o!er weather guarantees that automatically reimburse customers for uncanceled reservations based on measurable weather events. In this paper, we examine the mechanisms of weather guarantees and evaluate their impact. We find that weather guarantees can reduce cancellations due to unfavorable weather forecasts but often lead to higher product prices. O!ering weather guarantees is advantageous for service providers when customers are highly sensitive to weather, not excessively loss averse, and the probability of bad weather is not too high. Interestingly, service providers may not benefit from adopting weather guarantees when the odds of bad weather are extremely high and the customers are rather insensitive to it. Although customers are generally not better o! under weather guarantees, there are scenarios where it can be a win-win. Further, we find that weather forecast accuracy plays a nuanced role in the adoption of weather guarantees. Our results o!er insight into the strategic role of weather guarantees in mitigating exogenous risk in experience products.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了天气保障机制及其影响，发现其能减少因不良天气预报导致的取消，但可能推高产品价格。天气保障对服务提供商有利的条件是客户对天气敏感、不过度厌恶损失且坏天气概率不高。
AI.research_question: 天气保障机制如何影响服务提供商和客户的行为及其结果？
AI.motivation: 许多活动依赖天气，客户常因不良天气预报取消预订，天气保障机制旨在解决这一问题。
AI.theoretical_framework: 天气保障机制、客户行为理论、风险管理理论。
AI.method: 机制分析与影响评估。
AI.findings: 天气保障减少取消但提高价格；对服务提供商有利的条件是客户对天气敏感且坏天气概率不高。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了天气保障在缓解体验产品外生风险中的战略作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为服务提供商是否采用天气保障提供了决策依据。

detail.abstract: The need to achieve a safe and just ecological transition is a key target of European policy makers. Green jobs are often presented as key levers to achieve this objective, as they enable the creation of new employment opportunities across a wide spectrum of occupations, including low skill ones. In this paper we investigate if and how these opportunities are seized by one of the most vulnerable segment of the labor force, namely migrants. By relying on detailed administrative data covering more that 12 million contract activations in the Emilia-Romagna Region (Italy) we document that, after controlling for potential confounders, migrants are less likely than natives to find employment in green jobs. Moreover, when they do, they have higher chances to be hired with either a fixed-term or an agency contract. Heterogeneity analysis across industries and occupations reveals that such precarious employment patterns are driven primarily by firm attempts to reduce green costs. These results are rationalized through the lenses of institutional segmentation theory. Related policy implications are discussed.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了欧洲绿色就业机会中移民的就业情况，发现移民比本地人更难获得绿色工作，且合同更不稳定，原因与企业降低绿色成本有关。
AI.research_question: 移民是否能够抓住绿色就业机会，以及这些机会的就业条件如何？
AI.motivation: 绿色就业是实现生态转型的关键，但移民作为劳动力中的弱势群体，其就业情况尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 制度分割理论。
AI.method: 基于意大利艾米利亚-罗马涅大区1200万份合同激活的详细行政数据，控制潜在混杂因素。
AI.findings: 移民比本地人更难获得绿色工作，且合同多为临时或中介性质，企业降低绿色成本是主要原因。
AI.theory_contributions: 通过制度分割理论解释了移民在绿色就业中的劣势。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于如何改善移民在绿色就业中机会的建议。

title: Generative AI and Content Homogenization: The Case of Digital Marketing
affiliations: London Business School, London Business School and London Business School

detail.title: Generative AI and Content Homogenization: The Case of Digital Marketing
detail.abstract: Traditionally, entrepreneurs and small businesses, constrained by limited resources, struggle to create high-quality marketing content, which limits consumer engagement and hampers growth. Generative artificial intelligence (Gen AI) presents a powerful, yet affordable tool to overcome this challenge. However, the widespread adoption of Gen AI may have unintended consequences. Specifically, content generated by popular large language models may appear more similar to each other compared to human created content, known as content homogenization. In the context of marketing, such homogenization may dampen consumer engagement and dilute brand uniqueness over time. To examine the extent of content homogenization and its potential implications, we study the restaurant industry — a highly fragmented sector where 70% of the establishments are owned by independent entrepreneurs. We leverage the country-wide ChatGPT ban in Italy during April 2023 as a natural experiment to examine how access to Gen AI affects content homogenization, consumer engagement, and volume of social media marketing content created by small business owners. Our study shows that restaurants in the treatment group — located in Milan, Italy — experienced relative decreases of 15%, 12%, 2%, and 3% in lexical, syntactic, semantic, and language style similarity in their Instagram marketing content during the ban, suggesting that access to ChatGPT leads to content homogenization. We also find the ban has a positive effect on consumer engagement — an approximate 3.5% increase in average like counts — despite negative effects on posting frequency and post length. By better underscoring an unintended consequence of Gen AI adoption, this research aims to provide valuable insights to entrepreneurs and small businesses on how to better harness the capability of Gen AI while mitigating potential drawbacks.

AI.tldr: 生成式人工智能（Gen AI）虽为小企业提供低成本营销工具，但可能导致内容同质化，降低消费者参与度和品牌独特性。研究以意大利餐厅为例，发现ChatGPT禁令减少了内容同质化并提高了消费者参与度。
AI.research_question: 生成式人工智能（Gen AI）的广泛使用是否会导致营销内容同质化，并影响消费者参与度？
AI.motivation: 小企业和创业者因资源有限难以制作高质量营销内容，Gen AI提供解决方案，但其潜在负面影响（如内容同质化）尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 内容同质化理论、消费者参与度理论、品牌独特性理论。
AI.method: 利用意大利2023年4月ChatGPT禁令作为自然实验，对比米兰餐厅在禁令前后的Instagram营销内容同质化程度及消费者参与度变化。
AI.findings: 禁令期间，米兰餐厅的营销内容在词汇、句法、语义和语言风格上的相似性分别下降15%、12%、2%和3%，消费者参与度（点赞数）增加约3.5%。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了Gen AI导致内容同质化的机制，丰富了内容同质化与消费者参与度的理论研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为小企业提供使用Gen AI时的策略建议，以平衡效率与品牌独特性。

title: Integration of Artificial Intelligence in Biodegradable Plastic Packaging Design: Exploring Stakeholder Attitudes
affiliations: International Islamic University Malaysia, International Islamic University of Malaysia (IIUM) and Noakhali Science and Technology University - Department of Tourism and Hospitality Management

detail.title: Integration of Artificial Intelligence in Biodegradable Plastic Packaging Design: Exploring Stakeholder Attitudes
detail.abstract: Biodegradable plastic or biopolymers from renewable resources have attracted growing interest from industries as well as individual consumers as a solution to the environmental problems and limited resources of petroleum-based polymers. This research aims to explore stakeholder attitudes towards the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) in biodegradable plastic packaging design, aiming to address gaps in sustainable packaging innovation. This study engaged 30 principal players, comprising packaging designers, sustainability officers, lawmakers, NGO representatives, and ecologically aware customers. The researchers employed a multi-method qualitative framework, encompassing comprehensive case studies of five organisations at various levels of AI deployment and a phenomenological analysis of stakeholder experiences. The data gathering encompassed semi-structured interviews, focus group discussions, and the analysis of business sustainability reports and policy documents. The results identified three major stakeholder groups: hopeful industrial pragmatists, cautious reformers, and sceptical consumers. Significant obstacles included knowledge disparities between technical and executive teams, regulatory ambiguities, and workforce transfer apprehensions. Consequences for practice include methods for implementing artificial intelligence in stages, open certification systems, and legislative subsidies for ethical innovations.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了利益相关者对人工智能在可生物降解塑料包装设计中应用的态度，通过多方法定性研究揭示了三大利益相关者群体及其面临的障碍，并提出了实践建议。
AI.research_question: 利益相关者对人工智能在可生物降解塑料包装设计中的整合持何种态度？
AI.motivation: 解决可持续包装创新中的空白，探索人工智能在环保材料设计中的应用潜力。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于利益相关者理论和可持续发展理论，分析不同群体对技术整合的态度。
AI.method: 采用多方法定性框架，包括案例研究和现象学分析，数据来源为访谈、焦点小组讨论及政策文件分析。
AI.findings: 识别出三大利益相关者群体：乐观的工业实用主义者、谨慎的改革者和怀疑的消费者；主要障碍包括知识差距、监管模糊和劳动力转移担忧。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了利益相关者理论在可持续技术整合中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出分阶段实施人工智能、开放认证体系和立法补贴等实践建议。

title: THE EFFECTS OF SOCIAL MEDIA ADVERTISING AMONG ECO-TOURISTS IN MALAYSIA: AN EMPIRICAL STUDY ON MALAYSIAN ECOTOURISM
affiliations: International Islamic University Malaysia, University Kuala Lumpur, International Islamic University of Malaysia (IIUM) and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: THE EFFECTS OF SOCIAL MEDIA ADVERTISING AMONG ECO-TOURISTS IN MALAYSIA: AN EMPIRICAL STUDY ON MALAYSIAN ECOTOURISM
detail.abstract: The focus of the study is to achieve the maximum advertising value on ecotourists using social media. In this area, the main objective of the "Technology Acceptance Model (TAM)" is to increase the present awareness of social media marketing. This topic is primarily concerned with exploring the context of social media advertisement with knowledge, service, and its behavioural intent to use social media ads within the unique environment of ecotourism in Malaysia. The approach of the study is to analyse a survey of 395 local Malaysian tourists in Klang Valley to test the "Technology Acceptance Model (TAM)". The empirical findings denote that social media advertisement in ecotourism has positive effects on "Perceived ease of use" and "Perceived usefulness," in terms of its 'Informativeness' and "Service Functionality." That, in effect, contributes to the behavioural purpose of using social media ecotourism advertisements. The discipline's findings indicate that advertising in social media in ecotourism needs to be utilized to provide a quick understanding. Also, the advertising is updated continuously to ensure reliable and appropriate sources to meet ecotourists' information requirements and the support of tourist product ratings. These traits should satisfy travellers, making them likely to revisit different ecotourism sights. These appearances should satisfy tourists and allow them to re-visit various ecotourist attractions.

AI.tldr: 该研究旨在通过社交媒体最大化生态旅游者的广告价值，利用技术接受模型（TAM）提升社交媒体营销的认知。研究发现，社交媒体广告在生态旅游中对“感知易用性”和“感知有用性”有积极影响，促进了使用意图。
AI.research_question: 如何通过社交媒体广告在马来西亚生态旅游中最大化广告价值？
AI.motivation: 探索社交媒体广告在生态旅游中的作用，以提升游客的认知和行为意图。
AI.theoretical_framework: 技术接受模型（TAM）
AI.method: 对马来西亚Klang Valley的395名当地游客进行问卷调查。
AI.findings: 社交媒体广告在生态旅游中显著影响“感知易用性”和“感知有用性”，尤其是信息性和服务功能性，从而促进使用意图。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了TAM在生态旅游社交媒体广告中的适用性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议生态旅游广告应注重信息更新和可靠性，以满足游客需求并促进重访。

title: CUSTOMER PERCEPTION ON SERVICE QUALITY TOWARDS TOURISM CUSTOMER SATISFACTION IN MALAYSIAN MARINE TOURISM SECTOR
affiliations: International Islamic University Malaysia, University Kuala Lumpur, International Islamic University of Malaysia (IIUM) and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: CUSTOMER PERCEPTION ON SERVICE QUALITY TOWARDS TOURISM CUSTOMER SATISFACTION IN MALAYSIAN MARINE TOURISM SECTOR
detail.abstract: Marine based tourism has emerged as a subject of concern in the area of ocean and coastal management. Today, demand for marine tourism has increased dramatically and is highlighted as one of the new horizons and fastest-growing sectors in the world's tourism industry. Malaysia is indeed one of the countries with the most beautiful and diversified marine life. The fundamental purpose of this study is to examine the satisfaction of tourists towards the service quality of marine tourism in Malaysia. The development of the research framework is based on the SERVQUAL model. A total of 300 responses were received from the Klang Valley area of Malaysia. For the purpose of processing and analyzing the data, Partial Least Square (PLS-SEM) method was employed. By applying a two-step approach, the study assesses the measurement model and the structural model. Findings from the survey reveal that assurance, tangibility, empathy, reliability, and responsiveness have a significant positive relationship with customer satisfaction thus these factors describe the customer satisfaction adequately. This study would enable policymakers and tourism companies to develop policies to improve customer satisfaction by increasing the quality of service.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了马来西亚海洋旅游服务质量对游客满意度的影响，基于SERVQUAL模型，通过PLS-SEM方法分析300份问卷数据，发现保证、有形性、同理心、可靠性和响应性对满意度有显著正向影响。
AI.research_question: 马来西亚海洋旅游服务质量如何影响游客满意度？
AI.motivation: 海洋旅游需求快速增长，马来西亚因其丰富的海洋资源成为研究焦点，需提升服务质量以满足游客需求。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于SERVQUAL模型，涵盖保证、有形性、同理心、可靠性和响应性五个维度。
AI.method: 采用PLS-SEM方法分析300份来自Klang Valley的问卷数据，分两步评估测量模型和结构模型。
AI.findings: 保证、有形性、同理心、可靠性和响应性对游客满意度有显著正向影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了SERVQUAL模型在海洋旅游领域的适用性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和旅游公司提供提升服务质量和游客满意度的策略依据。

title: Determinants of Technology Acceptance towards 5G Mobile Repurchase Intention: An Empirical Study on Malaysian Customer Satisfaction
affiliations: International Islamic University of Malaysia (IIUM), Students, International Islamic University Malaysia and International Islamic University of Malaysia (IIUM)

detail.title: Determinants of Technology Acceptance towards 5G Mobile Repurchase Intention: An Empirical Study on Malaysian Customer Satisfaction
detail.abstract: This study investigates the elements influencing consumer satisfaction and repurchase intention in the context of 5G technology adoption. The study uses the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM) as its theoretical framework within a positivist design, emphasising deductive reasoning and empirical evidence to predict human behaviour, employing a methodical methodology matched with research as a means of acquiring and analysing data. It emphasises experimental study, which allows for variable isolation and causal inference while adhering to scientific norms. The survey will use a sample size of 125 respondents and focus on Klang Valley, Malaysian urban regions and tech-savvy smartphone users with 5G access. Data collected using a 5-point Likert scale and convenience sampling via online questionnaires, allowing for an organised examination of customer retention behaviour in telecoms. The research constructs were painstakingly specified, conceptualised, and operationalised, including perceived usefulness, perceived ease of use, and network effects, in addition to satisfaction and repurchase intention. Afterwards, the collected data was examined using SPSS 26 & AMOS 23 software. Through different testing, rigorous preparatory analysis ensured instrument reliability and validity. The findings revealed that customer satisfaction (CS) had an average variance extracted (AVE) value of 0.474 initially, which improved to 0.594 after item adjustments. Similarly, repurchasing intention (RI) showed an AVE value of 0.665, indicating robust convergent validity. The AVE values of the other parameters, PU 0.590, PEOU 0.554 & NEf 0.602, were found satisfactory. In summary, this study adheres to a rigorous research method by using an online self-administered questionnaire. Its painstaking design, testing, and early analysis create a solid platform for future data collecting and analysis, providing genuine insights on 5G technology uptake and repurchase intention.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了影响5G技术采用背景下消费者满意度和再购买意愿的因素，基于技术接受模型（TAM），采用实证研究方法，通过125名受访者的问卷调查，揭示了满意度和再购买意愿的关键驱动因素。
AI.research_question: 5G技术采用背景下，哪些因素影响消费者的满意度和再购买意愿？
AI.motivation: 随着5G技术的普及，了解消费者满意度和再购买意愿的驱动因素对电信行业至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 技术接受模型（TAM），包括感知有用性（PU）、感知易用性（PEOU）和网络效应（NEf）。
AI.method: 采用在线自填问卷的实证研究方法，样本为125名马来西亚Klang Valley地区的5G用户，数据通过SPSS 26和AMOS 23分析。
AI.findings: 消费者满意度（CS）和再购买意愿（RI）的AVE值分别为0.594和0.665，表明模型具有较好的收敛效度。PU、PEOU和NEf的AVE值也达到满意水平。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了TAM模型在5G技术背景下的适用性，并扩展了网络效应的影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为电信企业提供了提升消费者满意度和再购买意愿的具体策略，如优化5G技术的易用性和网络覆盖。

title: Consumer Evaluation and Visual Attribution of Realistic AI-Generated Advertisements
affiliations: University of California Berkeley, Haas School of Business and University of California, Berkeley - Haas School of Business

detail.title: Consumer Evaluation and Visual Attribution of Realistic AI-Generated Advertisements
detail.abstract: Generative AI (GenAI) enables scalable ad creation, but it remains unclear whether consumers can distinguish AI-generated ads from human-made ones and how such perceptions affect evaluations of ad quality. This paper examines the distinguishability and perceived effectiveness of AI-generated advertising visuals using a custom image generation pipeline and human evaluation data. Respondents perform only slightly better than chance in identifying the source of the ad, with an average accuracy of 64%. Reported confidence levels do not correlate with correctness, and reported cues such as "attractiveness" and "creativity" are often misleading. While truly human-made ads slightly outperform AI ads on a few quality dimensions, ads perceived as human-made receive significantly higher ratings across all effectiveness metrics even if they are AI-generated. We train neural networks to predict both ad origin and perceived effectiveness from image features, and use GradCAM to interpret the visual drivers of perception. Object detection and clustering reveal that image regions related to text, logos, and human depictions often drive misclassification. These findings highlight that subtle visual features-not actual content origin-play a central role in how AI-generated ads are judged, with implications for GenAI-assisted ad design and consumer trust.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，消费者仅略高于随机水平（64%准确率）区分AI与人类制作的广告，且感知为人类制作的广告评分更高，即使实际为AI生成。视觉特征（如文本、标志、人物）是误判的关键。
AI.research_question: 消费者能否区分AI与人类制作的广告？这种区分如何影响广告质量评估？
AI.motivation: 探讨生成式AI在广告中的可区分性及感知效果，为AI辅助广告设计提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于广告感知理论，分析消费者对广告来源的识别能力及其对效果评价的影响。
AI.method: 使用定制图像生成流程和人类评估数据，结合神经网络预测和视觉特征分析（如GradCAM、对象检测）。
AI.findings: 消费者区分能力有限（64%准确率），感知为人类制作的广告评分更高；视觉特征（如文本、标志）是误判主因。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了广告感知中视觉特征比实际来源更关键的理论机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为生成式AI广告设计提供优化方向，强调视觉特征对消费者信任的影响。

title: Factors Influencing the Use of E-wallet as a Payment Method among Malaysian Young Adults
affiliations: International Islamic University of Malaysia (IIUM), International Islamic University of Malaysia (IIUM), International Islamic University Malaysia, International Islamic University of Malaysia (IIUM), Students and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Factors Influencing the Use of E-wallet as a Payment Method among Malaysian Young Adults
detail.abstract: In recent years, there is a noticeable increase of cashless transactions due to the development of financial technology. As a result of being expansion of fintech products such as e-wallet, consumers are shifting from cash-based to cashless. Young adult consumers in 21st century are regarded as tech-savvy as they were born in the era of smartphone technology. This study aims to examine the influencing factors for Malaysian young adults to use e-wallet as a payment method by applying extended technology acceptance model (TAM). Total of 330 data were collected from the users of e-wallet in the area of Klang Valley of Malaysia and analyzed by deploying partial least squares structural equation modeling (PLS-SEM). By applying two-step approach for instance, measurement model for indicator loadings, convergent validity, reliability and structural model for path analysis the findings from this study reveal that perceived usefulness, perceived ease of use and privacy and security have positive and significant relationship with behavioral intention to use e-wallet. This study helps the service providers of the digital marketplace further to have better understanding of the usefulness of using e-wallet for transaction purposes.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了马来西亚年轻成年人使用电子钱包的影响因素，基于扩展的技术接受模型（TAM），发现感知有用性、易用性及隐私安全对使用意愿有显著正向影响。
AI.research_question: 哪些因素影响马来西亚年轻成年人使用电子钱包作为支付方式？
AI.motivation: 随着金融科技的发展，无现金交易增加，年轻成年人作为技术熟练群体，其使用电子钱包的行为值得研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 扩展的技术接受模型（TAM）。
AI.method: 通过PLS-SEM分析330份来自马来西亚Klang Valley地区电子钱包用户的数据。
AI.findings: 感知有用性、易用性及隐私安全对使用电子钱包的行为意愿有显著正向影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了TAM模型在电子钱包领域的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为数字市场服务提供商提供了关于电子钱包使用价值的深入理解。

title: Building Resilient Workforces in Emerging Markets: A Strategic Framework for Sustainable Human Capital Development
affiliations: ACTAG

detail.title: Building Resilient Workforces in Emerging Markets: A Strategic Framework for Sustainable Human Capital Development
detail.abstract: The accelerating pace of global economic transformation has positioned workforce resilience as a critical determinant of organizational and national competitiveness, particularly within emerging market economies. This study presents a comprehensive framework for building resilient workforces in emerging markets through systematic analysis of human capital development strategies, technological integration, and adaptive organizational practices. Drawing from multi-country case studies and contemporary research spanning 2020-2024, this investigation identifies key determinants of workforce resilience including skills diversification, continuous learning ecosystems, and institutional support mechanisms. The research reveals that emerging markets face unique challenges in workforce development, including limited access to advanced training infrastructure, skills mismatches, and institutional capacity constraints. However, these markets also demonstrate remarkable adaptability and innovation in human capital development approaches. The proposed framework integrates four core dimensions: strategic skills planning, technological integration, institutional capacity building, and adaptive organizational culture. Findings indicate that organizations implementing comprehensive resilience strategies demonstrate 34% higher employee retention rates and 28%improved productivity metrics compared to traditional approaches. The study contributes to the growing literature on human capital development by providing evidence-based strategies specifically tailored to emerging market contexts, offering practical implications for policymakers, organizational leaders, and development practitioners seeking to enhance workforce resilience in dynamic economic environments.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个新兴市场中构建弹性劳动力的综合框架，通过分析人力资本发展战略、技术整合和适应性组织实践，揭示了技能多样化、持续学习生态系统和制度支持机制等关键因素。研究发现，实施全面弹性战略的组织在员工保留率和生产力方面表现更优。
AI.research_question: 如何在新兴市场中构建弹性劳动力？
AI.motivation: 全球经济转型加速，劳动力弹性成为组织和国家竞争力的关键因素，尤其是在新兴市场。
AI.theoretical_framework: 人力资本发展理论、技术整合理论、组织适应性理论。
AI.method: 多国案例研究和2020-2024年的当代研究分析。
AI.findings: 实施全面弹性战略的组织员工保留率提高34%，生产力指标提升28%。
AI.theory_contributions: 为新兴市场背景下的人力资本发展提供了理论框架和实证策略。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者、组织领导者和发展实践者提供了增强劳动力弹性的实用建议。

title: The Unorthodox Orthodox? Religion, Compromise, and Attitudes Toward Women in the Labor Market
affiliations: Faculty of Economics, Belgrade, EBS Universität für Wirtschaft und Recht - EBS Business School and University College London - School of Slavonic and East European Studies, Central European Labour Studies Institute (CELSI)

detail.title: The Unorthodox Orthodox? Religion, Compromise, and Attitudes Toward Women in the Labor Market

declarations.declarationOfInterest: N/A
declarations.ethicsApproval: N/A
declarations.funderStatement: N/A

detail.abstract: We study the effect of adherence to Eastern Orthodox Christianity on attitudes toward women's participation in the workforce. To do so, we first develop a novel theoretical framework that defines religion as a constraint on one's attitudes and actions. Next, building on research in social psychology, we argue that the four most numerous religious denominations (Catholicism, Protestantism, Eastern Orthodoxy, and Islam) differ in the extent to which religious believers consult external ideas and opinions to shape their own opinions. We show that those of Orthodox belief are most likely to seek and empathize with others' ideas and beliefs, implying that Orthodox followers will also have the most liberal attitudes toward women's work compared to the other three denominations. To test our hypotheses, we exploit the last five waves of the World Values Survey (1995-2022) and utilize four broad groups of questions as dependent variables: motivation for labor market participation, social constraints, family constraints, and incentives to join the labor market. The findings align with our theoretical prediction and indicate that Orthodox Christians have attitudes most supportive of women's work. Our findings are not driven by differences in religiosity, the prevalence of communism and differences in governmental institutions, or migration, and highlight the link between religion and attitudes toward women's work.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了东正教信仰对女性参与劳动力市场态度的影响，发现东正教徒对女性工作的态度最为支持。
AI.research_question: 东正教信仰如何影响人们对女性参与劳动力市场的态度？
AI.motivation: 探讨宗教（尤其是东正教）如何作为一种约束影响人们对女性工作的态度。
AI.theoretical_framework: 将宗教定义为对态度和行为的约束，并结合社会心理学理论分析不同宗教派别（天主教、新教、东正教和伊斯兰教）在外部意见采纳上的差异。
AI.method: 利用世界价值观调查（1995-2022）的五波数据，分析劳动力市场参与的动机、社会约束、家庭约束和激励等变量。
AI.findings: 东正教徒对女性工作的态度最为支持，且这一结果不受宗教虔诚度、共产主义历史或政府制度差异的影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出宗教作为态度约束的新理论框架，并验证东正教在外部意见采纳上的独特性。
AI.practical_contributions: 揭示了宗教与性别平等态度之间的联系，为政策制定者提供了关于宗教影响性别观念的实证依据。

title: The Role of Green Marketing in Minimizing Environmental Impact of Small E-Businesses
affiliations: Utkal university, New Horizon College of Engineering, Oxford International College, Indore, D Y Patil School Of Management, Vignan Institute of Technology and Science,  and Vel Tech Rangarajan dr. Sagunthala R & D Institute of Science and Technology

detail.title: The Role of Green Marketing in Minimizing Environmental Impact of Small E-Businesses
detail.abstract: In the digital age, small e-businesses are rapidly emerging as vital contributors to economic development. However, their operations, particularly in packaging, logistics, and product sourcing, pose significant environmental challenges. Green marketing has emerged as a strategic approach to align business objectives with environmental sustainability. This paper explores the role of green marketing in reducing the environmental impact of small e-businesses. By analyzing sustainable practices, consumer behavior trends, and business outcomes, the study identifies how adopting green marketing strategies-such as eco-friendly product packaging, carbon-neutral shipping, and transparent environmental communication-can help e-businesses minimize their ecological footprint. The research also highlights the barriers and enablers of green marketing adoption in the small e-business sector and provides recommendations for integrating sustainability into core business models.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨绿色营销在减少小型电商环境影响中的作用，分析可持续实践、消费者行为趋势及商业成果，提出绿色营销策略的障碍与推动因素，并为将可持续性融入商业模式提供建议。
AI.research_question: 绿色营销如何帮助小型电商减少环境影响？
AI.motivation: 小型电商在包装、物流和产品采购中带来显著环境挑战，绿色营销可作为战略手段平衡商业目标与环境可持续性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 绿色营销理论、可持续实践理论、消费者行为理论。
AI.method: 分析可持续实践、消费者行为趋势及商业成果。
AI.findings: 采用绿色营销策略（如环保包装、碳中和运输、透明环境沟通）可帮助小型电商减少生态足迹。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了绿色营销在小型电商领域的应用理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为小型电商提供绿色营销策略的具体建议，帮助其将可持续性融入商业模式。

title: Beyond Pay: AI Skills Reward More Job Benefits
affiliations: University of Oxford - Oxford Internet Institute, Oxford internet Institute and University of Oxford - Oxford Internet Institute

detail.title: Beyond Pay: AI Skills Reward More Job Benefits

declarations.ethicsApproval: This research has been approved June 3, 2024 by the OII DREC under the CUREC number OII_C1A_24_089.

detail.abstract: This study investigates the non-monetary rewards associated with artificial intelligence (AI) skills in the U.S. labour market. Using a dataset of approximately ten million online job vacancies from 2018 to 2024, we identify AI roles-positions requiring at least one AI-related skill-and examine the extent to which these roles offer non-monetary benefits such as tuition assistance, paid leave, health and well-being perks, parental leave, workplace culture enhancements, and remote work options. While previous research has documented substantial wage premiums for AI-related roles due to growing demand and limited talent supply, our study asks whether this demand also translates into enhanced non-monetary compensation. We find that AI roles are significantly more likely to offer such perks, even after controlling for education requirements, industry, and occupation type. It is twice as likely for an AI role to offer parental leave and almost three times more likely to provide remote working options. Moreover, the highest-paying AI roles tend to bundle these benefits, suggesting a compound premium where salary increases coincide with expanded non-monetary rewards. AI roles offering parental leave or health benefits show salaries that are, on average, 12% to 20% higher than AI roles without this benefit. This pattern is particularly pronounced in years and occupations experiencing the highest AI-related demand, pointing to a demand-driven dynamic. Our findings underscore the strong pull of AI talent in the labor market and challenge narratives of technological displacement, highlighting instead how employers compete for scarce talent through both financial and non-financial incentives.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了美国劳动力市场中与人工智能（AI）技能相关的非货币性奖励。通过分析2018年至2024年约1000万份在线职位空缺数据，发现AI相关职位更可能提供非货币性福利，如带薪休假、远程工作等，且高薪AI职位往往同时提供更多福利。
AI.research_question: AI相关职位是否比非AI职位更可能提供非货币性福利？
AI.motivation: 以往研究关注AI职位的工资溢价，但忽略了非货币性奖励。本研究填补了这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 劳动力市场供需理论，稀缺人才竞争理论。
AI.method: 使用2018-2024年约1000万份在线职位空缺数据，识别AI相关职位并分析其非货币性福利。
AI.findings: AI职位显著更可能提供非货币性福利，如带薪休假、远程工作等，且高薪AI职位往往同时提供更多福利。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了对AI职位奖励机制的理解，强调了非货币性福利在稀缺人才竞争中的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为雇主设计更具吸引力的AI职位提供了依据，同时挑战了技术替代劳动力的叙事。

title: The Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Global Business Services in Ghana & Rwanda
affiliations: University of Duisburg-Essen

detail.title: The Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Global Business Services in Ghana & Rwanda

declarations.funderStatement: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ)

detail.abstract: In Ghana and Rwanda, Global Business Services (GBS) have become a beacon of hope in recent years for formal employment in growing export economies. However, the rise of Artificial Intelligence (AI) now changes the way many sectors work, foreshadowing a wave of automation. Since services that can be offshored tend to be those that can also be automated, global business services are expected to undergo drastic changes in the face of AI rollouts. This study takes the global literature on AI disruption as the baseline and asks how potential GBS workers in Ghana and Rwanda can prepare to take advantage of the coming upheaval. Flanked by focus group discussions (n = 12) and key informant interviews (n = 23), we tested one particular method for AI preparedness: the day-long intensive workshop (Dell'Acqua et al., 2025). Conducting 14 AI workshops (six in Ghana, six in Rwanda, and two online) with a total of 279 GBS workers and trainees in February/March, we surveyed the participants three months later, in June 2025. The survey probed for the perceived impact of our AI workshops, and we found the results to be surprisingly positive: of the participants who responded (n = 168), 70% reported that the workshop changed their AI usage "significantly" or "completely;" 69% reported that this saved them at least 5 working hours per week. And over 80% felt they had since become "better" or "much better" (on 5-point Likert scales) at email writing, doing research, solving problems, creative work, and routine admin tasks. Only 22% had access to comparable AI trainings, and 90% advocated for a follow-up AI workshop. This study situates these findings within the relevant literature, qualifies the results with the appropriate caveats, and provides policy recommendations for similar interventions in Ghana and Rwanda.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了加纳和卢旺达的全球商业服务（GBS）工作者如何通过AI准备研讨会应对自动化浪潮，结果显示研讨会对参与者的AI使用和工作效率有显著积极影响。
AI.research_question: 加纳和卢旺达的GBS工作者如何为AI带来的变革做好准备？
AI.motivation: AI的快速发展可能对GBS行业造成颠覆性影响，研究旨在帮助工作者适应这一变化。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于全球AI颠覆性影响的文献，结合本地化研究。
AI.method: 通过14场AI研讨会（加纳6场、卢旺达6场、线上2场）和后续调查（n=168），评估研讨会效果。
AI.findings: 70%参与者表示AI使用显著改变，69%每周节省至少5小时，80%在多项技能上自我评价提升。
AI.theory_contributions: 为AI在发展中国家GBS行业的应用提供实证支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出政策建议，推动类似干预措施在加纳和卢旺达的实施。

title: Mastering Project Management: A Strategic Imperative for Global Impact
affiliations: Jahangirnagar University

detail.title: Mastering Project Management: A Strategic Imperative for Global Impact

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The author declares no personal or financial relationships with any other people or organizations that could be perceived to have influenced this study.
declarations.ethicsApproval: This paper is a comprehensive overview of project management principles and applications, drawing from existing frameworks and real-world examples. It does not involve human participants, patients, or case studies requiring ethics approval or written consent.
declarations.funderStatement: This research was conducted without any specific grant from funding agencies in the public, commercial, or not-for-profit sectors.

detail.abstract: In today's interconnected world, project management has evolved beyond a mere technical skill to become a crucial strategic necessity for organizations across all sectors. This paper delves into the foundational principles of project management, deconstructing its lifecycle from initiation to closure, and highlights how each phase synergistically contributes to overall success. It explores prominent methodologies such as PRINCE2, Agile/Scrum, Waterfall, Logical Framework Approach (LFA), and Results-Based Management (RBM), emphasizing their suitability for diverse project characteristics and organizational contexts. The discussion extends to essential tools and software, including advanced scheduling platforms, collaborative task management systems, and specialized monitoring & evaluation (M&E) tools, all of which augment efficiency and foster transparency. Furthermore, the paper identifies indispensable skills for exemplary project managers, such as strategic problem-solving, sophisticated communication, and visionary leadership. Pathways to cultivating expertise are outlined, encompassing formal education, practical experience, mentorship, and systematic knowledge sharing. The application of these principles is vividly illustrated through real-world examples from the UN and development sectors, showcasing their deployment in humanitarian aid, SDG implementation, peacebuilding, and climate change initiatives. The paper concludes by affirming that mastering project management is both a science and an art, demanding continuous growth, adaptation, and innovation to achieve lasting positive change in an era of intensifying global challenges.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了项目管理的基本原则、方法论、工具及技能，并通过实际案例展示了其在全球挑战中的应用。
AI.research_question: 项目管理如何从技术技能发展为战略必需品，并在不同领域中实现成功？
AI.motivation: 在全球化挑战加剧的背景下，项目管理成为组织成功的关键战略需求。
AI.theoretical_framework: PRINCE2、Agile/Scrum、Waterfall、LFA和RBM等项目管理方法论。
AI.method: 通过分析项目生命周期、方法论、工具及技能，结合UN和发展领域的实际案例。
AI.findings: 项目管理是科学与艺术的结合，需持续学习和创新以实现全球挑战中的积极变革。
AI.theory_contributions: 系统化梳理了项目管理的理论框架和方法论，强调了其战略价值。
AI.practical_contributions: 提供了实际案例和技能培养路径，帮助组织和个人提升项目管理能力。

title: Maritime Laws in Pakistan: Implementation, Litigation, and Reforms
affiliations: University of Karachi

detail.title: Maritime Laws in Pakistan: Implementation, Litigation, and Reforms

declarations.ethicsApproval: This Article aims to discuss maritime law and its implementation in Pakistan alongside international maritime law.

detail.abstract: Maritime law, also known as admiralty law, constitutes the corpus of legal rules, conventions, and treaties governing activities on navigable waters, encompassing shipping, trade, maritime offenses, insurance, port utilization, and environmental protection. Historically, admiralty jurisdiction was governed by the Act of 1891 1 , the Act of 1840 2 , and the Act of 1861 3 , all of which have since been repealed by The Admiralty Jurisdiction of High Courts Ordinance, 1980 4. This jurisdiction extends to both sea vessels and aircraft; however, this article focuses exclusively on sea vessels and their pertinent maritime laws. For a coastal nation like Pakistan, boasting a coastline extending over 1,046 kilometers and a strategic location along the Arabian Sea, the development, implementation, and rigorous enforcement of robust maritime laws are paramount for economic security, international trade, and national sovereignty. Maritime laws in Pakistan represent a critical yet underdeveloped facet of the nation's legal and economic infrastructure. Despite possessing a strategic coastline along the Arabian Sea and hosting vital ports such as Karachi, Karachi International Container Terminal (KICT), Pakistan International Container Terminal (PICT), South Asia Pakistan Terminals (SAPT) or China Port, Port Muhammad Qasim, and the newly developing Gwadar Port, Pakistan's maritime legal framework has historically lagged in both enforcement and modernization. This paper delves into the existing legislative regime governing maritime affairs, including the Pakistan Merchant Shipping Ordinance, 2001, and the relevant international conventions ratified by Pakistan. It scrutinizes the challenges inherent in its implementation, such as insufficient institutional capacity, limited maritime awareness, antiquated port governance, and jurisdictional ambiguities. Through an analysis of litigation trends within admiralty courts, particularly under the Admiralty Jurisdiction of the High Court Ordinance, 1980 5 , the study identifies procedural bottlenecks and underscores the imperative for judicial specialization. Conclusively, the paper proposes comprehensive reforms, including the harmonization of national laws with international maritime standards, the digitalization of port and customs procedures, capacitybuilding initiatives for maritime institutions, and the establishment of specialized maritime tribunals. Strengthening maritime laws and their enforcement is indispensable for safeguarding Pakistan's maritime interests, fostering trade, and ensuring compliance with global maritime obligations.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨巴基斯坦海事法律的现状、挑战及改革建议，强调其对国家经济安全和国际合规的重要性。
AI.research_question: 巴基斯坦现行海事法律体系的主要问题及如何通过改革提升其有效性和国际合规性？
AI.motivation: 巴基斯坦作为沿海国家，海事法律的不完善影响了其经济安全和国际地位，亟需研究并提出改革方案。

AI.findings: 巴基斯坦海事法律执行不力，存在机构能力不足、港口管理落后等问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了海事法律与国家经济安全的理论联系。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议法律改革、数字化港口程序、设立专门海事法庭等具体措施。

title: The Moleka Grid for African Cities : Designing Ontological Urban Futures
affiliations: African Research Network (ARN)

detail.title: The Moleka Grid for African Cities : Designing Ontological Urban Futures
detail.abstract: Contemporary African cities are shaped by inherited colonial logics, fragmented planning systems, and extractive global models that often ignore the ontological, cultural, and systemic specificities of African urban life. This paper introduces the Moleka Grid, a pioneering diagnostic framework that moves beyond surface-level symptoms to reveal the paradigmatic and ontological layers of urban transformation. Drawing on complexity science, indigenous cosmologies, and systems thinking, the Moleka Grid helps to unpack the often-invisible codes shaping African urban realities. It offers a powerful tool for reimagining cities not as failed copies of the West, but as emergent, fractal systems rooted in unique histories, epistemologies, and possibilities. Through the Grid, this paper articulates a new vision for ontological urbanisma design language that centres spatial justice, ecological coherence, and cultural regeneration in the future of African cities.

AI.tldr: 本文提出Moleka Grid框架，用于分析非洲城市转型的深层次范式与本体论问题，超越西方模式，强调本土文化与系统性特征。
AI.research_question: 如何通过Moleka Grid框架揭示非洲城市转型的范式与本体论特征？
AI.motivation: 非洲城市受殖民逻辑、碎片化规划及全球模式影响，忽视本土文化与系统性特征，需新工具重新想象城市发展。
AI.theoretical_framework: 复杂性科学、本土宇宙论与系统思维。
AI.method: 提出Moleka Grid诊断框架，分析城市转型的深层次结构与文化代码。
AI.findings: Moleka Grid揭示了非洲城市作为独特历史与认识论产物的涌现性、分形系统特征。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出本体论城市主义新视角，强调空间正义、生态一致性与文化再生。
AI.practical_contributions: 为非洲城市规划提供新工具，推动本土化设计与系统性转型。

title: State Legitimacy and Self-fulfilling Dynamics
affiliations: Universidad San Sebastián

detail.title: State Legitimacy and Self-fulfilling Dynamics
detail.abstract: Joseph Raz's service conception of authority holds that citizens are obligated to obey the state if doing so enables them to better comply with reason than they would by acting independently. This article highlights a difficulty facing Raz's theory and other accounts of legitimacy that include a service component. Citizens' self-governing ability to determine for themselves how to comply with reason is endogenous to state authority. The more citizens defer their decision-making to the state, the less competent they may be at making decisions themselves. This means the state could meet the requirements of a service theory via a self-fulfilling dynamic, whereby citizens need state authority to best comply with reason only because that very authority has undermined or inhibited their capacity to do so by themselves. I highlight the problem and suggest that service theories adopt a "diachronic" mode of evaluation in response.

AI.tldr: Raz的服务权威理论认为公民服从国家能更好地遵从理性，但该理论面临一个内生性问题：公民越依赖国家决策，其自主决策能力可能越弱。国家可能通过自我实现的动态满足服务理论要求，但实际削弱了公民的自主能力。建议采用“历时性”评估方法解决这一问题。
AI.research_question: Raz的服务权威理论是否因公民自主决策能力的内生性问题而面临挑战？
AI.motivation: 探讨服务权威理论中公民自主能力与国家权威之间的动态关系及其潜在问题。
AI.theoretical_framework: Joseph Raz的服务权威理论。
AI.method: 理论分析，指出服务理论的内生性问题。
AI.findings: 公民依赖国家权威可能导致其自主决策能力下降，形成自我实现的动态。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了服务权威理论的内生性问题，并提出历时性评估的解决方案。
AI.practical_contributions: 为改进服务权威理论提供了理论支持，可能影响国家权威与公民关系的实践。

title: Inconsistent platform governance and social contagion of misconduct in digital ecosystems: A complementors perspective
affiliations: University of Surrey and University of Surrey

detail.title: Inconsistent platform governance and social contagion of misconduct in digital ecosystems: A complementors perspective
detail.abstract: This study investigates how complementors' experiences of platform governance impact their compliance behaviour in digital ecosystems. In an inductive qualitative study of Amazon Marketplace, we find that Amazon sellers engage in behaviours ranging from full compliance to repeated infringement. Sellers also report experiencing sustained discrepancies between the platform's declared practices, which ostensibly support sellers' interests, and its undeclared practices, which appear not to. Additionally, we find evidence that the sellers' experience of this inconsistent platform governance can trigger social contagion of misconduct. We develop a process model that elucidates the mechanisms of this social contagion: when complementors observe the platform to be an unreliable enforcer of its own rules and notice that cheating complementors seem to go unpunished and prosper, it erodes their trust in the platform, which leads some of them to legitimize misconduct as a defense against unfair competition under what they perceive to be the indifferent eye of the platform authority. In our discussion, we develop three contributions: (1) We theorise the observed inconsistent platform governance and suggest that it may be an endemic feature of platform behaviour caused by tensions between the platform's conflicting objectives. (2) We enrich the platform strategy literature by expanding our understanding of how complementors experience platform power. (3) We clarify how the study validates and extends theories of social contagion. We conclude with a discussion of the study's limitations, avenues for future research, and policy implications.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了平台治理对互补者行为的影响，发现亚马逊卖家因平台治理不一致而表现出从完全合规到反复违规的行为，并揭示了社会传染机制。
AI.research_question: 互补者对平台治理的体验如何影响其合规行为？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在揭示平台治理不一致对互补者行为的影响及其社会传染机制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 平台治理理论、社会传染理论。
AI.method: 归纳性定性研究（亚马逊市场案例）。
AI.findings: 卖家因平台治理不一致而表现出不同行为，社会传染机制导致违规行为扩散。
AI.theory_contributions: 理论化平台治理不一致现象，扩展对互补者体验平台权力的理解，验证并扩展社会传染理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为平台治理和政策制定提供实践启示。

title: The Lasting Effects of Working while in School: A Long-Term Follow-Up
affiliations: Tilburg University - Department of Economics, Universidad de la República - Facultad de Ciencias Económicas y de Administración (FCEA), Bocconi university and World Bank

detail.title: The Lasting Effects of Working while in School: A Long-Term Follow-Up
detail.abstract: This paper provides the first experimental evidence on the long-term effects of work-study programs, leveraging a randomized lottery design from a national program in Uruguay. Participation leads to a persistent 11 percent increase in formal labor earnings, observable seven years after the program. Effects are stronger for youth who participate during pivotal educational transitions and are larger for vulnerable youth and men, while remaining positive for women and non-vulnerable youth. The program is highly cost-effective, with average impacts exceeding those of job training programs and comparable to early childhood investments.

AI.tldr: 本文通过乌拉圭国家项目的随机抽签设计，首次提供了工读项目长期影响的实验证据。参与项目导致正式劳动收入持续增加11%，效果在项目结束七年后仍显著。效果在关键教育过渡期参与的青少年、弱势群体和男性中更强，但对女性和非弱势群体仍为正向。项目成本效益高，平均影响超过职业培训项目，与早期儿童投资相当。
AI.research_question: 工读项目对参与者长期劳动收入的持续性影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 缺乏关于工读项目长期影响的实验证据，尤其是在发展中国家。
AI.theoretical_framework: 人力资本理论、劳动力市场干预效果理论。

title: Rejuvenating Economics: Subjective Age's Influence on Work-Life Balance
affiliations: CREMA, CREMA and CREMA

detail.title: Rejuvenating Economics: Subjective Age's Influence on Work-Life Balance

declarations.declarationOfInterest: We declare that this manuscript is original, has neither been published before, nor is it currently being considered for publication elsewhere. This research did not receive any specific grant from funding agencies in the public, commercial, or not-for-profit sectors. We wish to confirm that the authors declare no competing interests in either financial or non-financial form related to this work. The manuscript has been read and approved by all named authors.

detail.abstract: Chronological age is a key indicator in economics, determining policy decisions such as the retirement age and the minimum voting age. The concept of subjective age, extensively studied by gerontologists and psychologists, may be particularly relevant to economic decision-making. Using panel data from German adults aged 40–65 and individual fixed-effects estimations, we investigate the effect of subjective age on work and life satisfaction. Furthermore, we estimate the impact of subjective age on the allocation of time between paid work and leisure activities. We find that a younger subjective age induces a shift in the trade-off towards leisure. These results support our conceptualization of subjective age as an expansion in the individual’s opportunity set. It demonstrates that subjective age provides explanatory power beyond chronological age, thereby enabling a more nuanced understanding of heterogeneity within age cohorts. It appears to be a suitable signal worth incorporating into labor and behavioral economic models.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了主观年龄对工作和生活满意度的影响，以及其在时间和休闲活动分配中的作用。研究发现，主观年龄较年轻会导致休闲活动的增加，支持主观年龄作为个体机会集的扩展概念。
AI.research_question: 主观年龄如何影响工作和生活满意度，以及时间和休闲活动的分配？
AI.motivation: 年龄是经济学中的关键指标，但主观年龄可能对经济决策有更细致的影响，值得研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 主观年龄作为个体机会集的扩展概念。
AI.method: 使用德国40-65岁成年人的面板数据，采用个体固定效应估计方法。
AI.findings: 主观年龄较年轻会导致休闲活动增加，支持主观年龄对机会集的扩展作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 主观年龄提供了超越实际年龄的解释力，有助于理解年龄群体内的异质性。
AI.practical_contributions: 主观年龄可作为劳动和行为经济模型的有用信号。

title: Robust Base-Stock Policies under Demand Ambiguity for Lost-Sales Systems with Lead Times
affiliations: The University of Sydney, Jinan University, Suzhou University, NUS Business School - Department of Decision Sciences and University of Macau

detail.title: Robust Base-Stock Policies under Demand Ambiguity for Lost-Sales Systems with Lead Times
detail.abstract: Despite decades of research, no closed-form, moment-based policy has been shown to be optimal for lost-sales inventory systems with positive lead times-a gap widely acknowledged in the inventory management literature. We close this gap by analyzing a periodic-review, single-item lost-sales system under lead time and demand uncertainty (i.i.d. across time), where only the mean and variance of demand per period are known. We recast the problem as a zero-sum game between the firm and an adversarial Nature, and show that Nature's worst-case strategy always collapses to a simple two-point distribution per period-regardless of the lead time. Leveraging this extremal result, we derive a closed-form base-stock level that maximizes the worst-case long-run average profit across all demand distributions consistent with known moments. This robust policy is not only tractable and distribution-free, but also unifies several widely used heuristics: under Nature's worst-case demand, it is operationally equivalent to more complex policies such as capped base-stock, projected inventory, and fixed non-stockout-probability rules-delivering identical ordering behavior and performance despite their differing motivations and formulations. We further extend the policy to settings where demand evolves with a linear time trend, modeled via a factor structure with i.i.d. noise. Remarkably, the same two-point worst-case distribution persists, yielding a provably robust, time-scaled ordering rule that adapts seamlessly to time-varying demand. Extensive numerical experiments on both synthetic and real-world demands demonstrate that our policy outperforms distribution-dependent benchmarks under mis-specification, establishing a new theoretical and practical benchmark for robust inventory control under moment ambiguity.

AI.tldr: 本文填补了库存管理文献中关于正提前期缺货系统的最优闭式策略的空白，通过将问题转化为公司与对抗性自然之间的零和博弈，提出了一个分布无关的鲁棒策略。
AI.research_question: 在仅知道需求均值和方差的情况下，如何为具有正提前期的缺货库存系统设计最优的闭式策略？

AI.method: 通过分析周期性审查的单品缺货系统，推导出闭式基础库存水平，并扩展到线性时间趋势的需求场景。

AI.practical_contributions: 提出的鲁棒策略在实际应用中表现出色，特别是在需求分布不确定的情况下，为库存控制提供了新的实践基准。

title: Managing Consumer Attention to Diverse Information Sources in Product Diffusion
affiliations: University of British Columbia (UBC) - Sauder School of Business and University College London - UCL School of Management

detail.title: Managing Consumer Attention to Diverse Information Sources in Product Diffusion
detail.abstract: Consumers use both observational learning and direct information search before purchases, and choose among information sources with different leanings when searching for information. This paper develops a theoretical framework where consumers sequentially decide whether to search for information and which type of sources to search, while observing purchase decisions from previous consumers. We characterize how firms can use dynamic pricing to influence consumer attention amid observational learning. Firms may optimally direct consumer attention toward negative-leaning sources even when positive-leaning sources are available, and doing so mitigates inefficient herding and improves aggregate learning. Our results remain robust when neutral information sources exist. Our study of consumer attention allocation amid observational learning contributes insights into the strategic value of diverse information sources.

AI.tldr: 消费者在购买前通过观察学习和直接信息搜索获取信息，并选择不同倾向的信息源。本文构建了一个理论框架，研究消费者如何在观察他人购买决策的同时，动态决定是否搜索信息及选择哪种倾向的信息源。研究发现，企业可通过动态定价引导消费者关注负面倾向的信息源，从而减少无效从众行为并提升整体学习效果。
AI.research_question: 消费者在观察学习和信息搜索过程中如何动态分配注意力？企业如何通过动态定价影响消费者的信息源选择？
AI.motivation: 理解消费者在信息搜索和观察学习中的行为动态，以及企业如何利用这些行为优化市场策略。
AI.theoretical_framework: 消费者行为理论、动态定价理论、观察学习理论。
AI.method: 理论建模与分析，研究消费者信息搜索和观察学习的动态决策过程。
AI.findings: 企业可通过动态定价引导消费者关注负面倾向的信息源，减少无效从众行为并提升整体学习效果。
AI.theory_contributions: 为观察学习和信息搜索的动态交互提供了理论框架，揭示了信息源多样性的战略价值。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业提供了通过动态定价优化消费者注意力分配的策略建议。

title: Must Egalitarians rely on the State to attain Distributive Justice?
affiliations: Universidad San Sebastián

detail.title: Must Egalitarians rely on the State to attain Distributive Justice?
detail.abstract: It is widely accepted among egalitarian political philosophers that distributive justice should be promoted by the state. This paper challenges this presumption by making two key claims. First, the state is not the only possible mechanism for attaining distributive justice. We could rely alternatively on the voluntary efforts and interactions of individuals and associations in civil society. The question of which mechanism we should rely upon is a comparative and empirical one. What matters is which better promotes distributive justice. We cannot settle the question a priori in favor of the state. Second, several considerations suggest a presumption in favor of civil society.

AI.tldr: 本文挑战了国家是唯一实现分配正义机制的观点，提出公民社会的自愿努力和互动也是一种选择，并认为公民社会可能更优。
AI.research_question: 国家是否是实现分配正义的唯一或最佳机制？
AI.motivation: 挑战政治哲学中国家作为分配正义唯一机制的普遍假设。
AI.theoretical_framework: 平等主义政治哲学、分配正义理论。
AI.method: 理论分析与比较研究。
AI.findings: 公民社会的自愿机制可能比国家更有效地实现分配正义。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了分配正义的实现途径，强调公民社会的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了分配正义实现机制的新视角。

title: Exploring User Perceptions and Usability of Mobile Library Services: A Case Study of Kazi Nazrul University
affiliations: S.R. Fatepuria College

detail.title: Exploring User Perceptions and Usability of Mobile Library Services: A Case Study of Kazi Nazrul University
detail.abstract: This study explores user perceptions and the usability of mobile library services in an academic setting through a case study conducted at Kazi-Nazrul University, Asansol, Paschim Bardhhaman, West Bengal. With the increasing reliance on mobile technology for accessing information, libraries are developing mobile applications to enhance user engagement and service accessibility. Using a structured questionnaire, data were collected from 150 respondents, including students and faculty, and analysed through frequency distribution and descriptive statistics. The findings reveal that users primarily utilize the app for searching the library catalogue, accessing e-resources, and receiving updates. Usability aspects such as ease of navigation, responsiveness, and information accuracy received high ratings, while interface design and occasional technical issues were areas of concern. Challenges like poor internet connectivity and limited functionalities affected the user experience. Participants suggested improvements including real-time chat support, offline access, and better help features. The study concludes that while the mobile library app is a valuable resource, strategic enhancements are needed to maximize its usability and effectiveness. These findings offer valuable guidance for library administrators and developers seeking to enhance the effectiveness of mobile library service delivery.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过案例研究探讨了学术环境中移动图书馆服务的用户感知和可用性，发现用户主要使用该应用进行目录搜索、访问电子资源和接收更新，同时提出了改进建议。
