contentType.other: Submission to the Dept of Telecommunications & Postal Service, April 2019

detail.abstract: This draft National Digital Skills Strategy, submitted to the Department of Telecommunications and Postal Services (DTPS), sets out a structured series of interventions intended to prepare South Africa to meet the challenges arising from the increasing deployment and adoption of digital technologies in the country’s economy and society:  at home, at work and at play.  Conceived of under the umbrella of the Fourth Industrial Revolution (4IR), the combined impact of these technology trends  -  including the Internet of Things (IoT), big data, robotics, and artificial intelligence (AI)  -  is already having a substantial impact on the world of work, on schooling, education and research, and on individuals and communities.

title: Military Training for Ghanaian National Service Personnel: Building a Resilient Nation or Raising Unintended Risks?
affiliations: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST)

detail.title: Military Training for Ghanaian National Service Personnel: Building a Resilient Nation or Raising Unintended Risks?
detail.abstract:
The Government of Ghana through the National Service Authority (NSA) has announced the introduction of a Military Training Program for National Service Personnel to commence from August 2025, which is directed at fresh university graduates who will be entering their one-year mandatory national service. The program, as outlined in a recent public announcement by the NSA, aims to provide participants with an understanding of basic military tactics and to develop discipline, mental and physical resilience, and emergency responsiveness in professional settings.

This program represents a major departure from the classical format of national service that has generally focused on sending graduates to civil institutions such as schools, ministries, hospitals, and community development agencies. With the addition of a military component, however, the NSA is not only expanding the scope of national service but also reshaping its philosophical and strategic direction.

The announcement has elicited a range of responses from policy analysts, educators, civil society organizations, and the general public, ranging from support for this bold and strategic move to strengthen human capital in Ghana, promote patriotism, and prepare youth to contribute more effectively to national development and on one hand, crisis response to ethical, logistical, and security-related concerns about whether it is necessary, what its scope should be, and how it may have long-term implications for militarizing non-security roles and opening the door to unintended socio-political consequences that could overwhelm a civilian-led democracy without fully replicating the institutional checks and balances that support the Israeli model.

AI.tldr: 加纳政府通过国家服务局（NSA）宣布从2025年8月起为大学毕业生提供军事训练项目，旨在培养纪律性、身心韧性及应急能力。此举是对传统国家服务模式的重大改变，引发了广泛讨论。
AI.research_question: 军事训练项目对国家服务模式的改变及其潜在影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨加纳政府引入军事训练项目的动机及其对国家服务和社会的潜在影响。

AI.method: 基于政策公告和公众反应的定性分析。
AI.findings: 项目旨在提升毕业生能力，但引发了对必要性、范围及长期社会政治影响的争议。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了国家服务与军事训练结合的理论研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于军事训练项目潜在影响的实际参考。

title: Hybrid Contracting in Repeated Interactions
affiliations: ZEW – Leibniz Centre for European Economic Research - Junior Research Group Competition and Innovation, University of Mannheim - Department of Economics and Santa Clara University - Leavey School of Business

detail.title: Hybrid Contracting in Repeated Interactions

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors declare that they have no relevant or material financial interests that relate to the research described in this paper.

detail.abstract: Many business relationships rely on loose arrangements and relational dynamics in early interactions, only to solidify their alliances through contractual commitments later. Using a repeated-games framework with a finite horizon, we show how such a hybrid-contracting strategy can both extend the duration of a cooperative business relationship (intensive margin) and expand the set of environments in which cooperation can be achieved (extensive margin). We model the contractual-commitment part of hybrid contracting as a smooth-landing contract that restricts the action space only in the backend of the relationship. Such a flexible contract outperforms more rigid contractual arrangements because it does not crowd out early-stage cooperation, thereby complementing relational dynamics. Our results are robust to extensions that account for variations in contract costs and timing, and we show that optimal contract length trades off profitability with implementability.

AI.tldr: 本文通过有限重复博弈框架，研究混合合同策略如何延长合作关系的持续时间并扩大合作环境范围。灵活的“平滑着陆”合同优于刚性合同，因其不挤占早期合作，补充关系动态。
AI.research_question: 混合合同策略如何通过结合松散安排和合同承诺来优化商业合作关系的持续时间和合作环境？
AI.motivation: 商业关系中早期依赖松散安排和关系动态，后期通过合同承诺巩固合作，但如何设计合同以平衡灵活性和约束力尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于有限重复博弈理论，分析混合合同策略的动态效果。
AI.method: 采用重复博弈框架，建模“平滑着陆”合同，限制关系后期的行动空间。
AI.findings: 灵活的混合合同策略能延长合作持续时间并扩大合作环境，优于刚性合同。
AI.theory_contributions: 为混合合同策略提供了理论支持，揭示了其动态优势。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业设计灵活合同提供了实践指导，优化合作关系。

title: Compliance as the New Competence: How Obedience Cultures Erode Innovation and Leadership Ethics in Global Workplaces
affiliations: African Leadership University and Open Christian University

detail.title: Compliance as the New Competence: How Obedience Cultures Erode Innovation and Leadership Ethics in Global Workplaces
detail.abstract: This article interrogates the worldwide drift toward "compliance-as-competence" and theorizes its consequences for leadership ethics, innovation, and organizational development. Using a qualitative meta-synthesis of secondary sources, we integrate corporate HR documents, ethics audits, case studies, and peer-reviewed scholarship within a rigorously documented integrative review design. A PRISMA-guided sampling frame yielded 118 documents from 2015-2025, providing an auditable corpus for analysis, and inter-coder reliability reached Cohen's κ = 0.84. Conceptually, we braid Foucault's disciplinary power, institutional isomorphism, and post-colonial critique to explain how obedience is normalized at the micro level, diffuses at the meso level, and is moralized at the macro level, producing a "triple helix" that recodes obedience as competence. Findings show that rule-following has become the dominant yardstick of performance. Across ten competency frameworks, compliance descriptors occurred 126 times versus 62 innovation terms (≈2:1), and whistleblowing provisions outnumbered explicit creativity clauses 29 to 11 (≈2.6:1), evidencing a systemic privileging of risk policing over idea generation. Obedience-weighted promotion pathways elevate loyalists over experts, depress voice, and erode integrity; however, team-level psychological safety operates as a moderator that can decouple necessary procedural order from innovation suppression and ethical silence. We formalize six propositions linking power distance, normative conformity, ideological fit, and recovery dynamics to measurable outcomes, while specifying psychological safety as a buffering condition for both innovation and leadership selection effects. Practical implications include recalibrating performance systems to reward truth-telling and experimentation alongside prudent compliance, and designing sector-sensitive interventions for public agencies, corporations, and NGOs. Social implications extend to public trust and economy-wide innovation, particularly in developing markets where external mandates intensify obedience norms. Originality lies in reframing competence as a composite of skill, integrity, and courageous judgement, advancing a tri-lens theory with testable propositions and a transparent evidence base suitable for cumulative research.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了全球范围内‘合规即能力’的趋势，并理论化了其对领导伦理、创新和组织发展的影响。通过定性元合成方法，整合了企业人力资源文件、伦理审计、案例研究和同行评审文献，发现合规已成为绩效的主要标准，而创新和伦理表达被系统性压制。研究提出了六项命题，强调心理安全作为缓冲条件的重要性，并建议重新设计绩效系统以平衡合规与创新。
AI.research_question: 全球范围内‘合规即能力’趋势对领导伦理、创新和组织发展的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨合规文化如何被标准化并影响组织行为，特别是对创新和伦理的压制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合福柯的规训权力、制度同构和后殖民批判理论，提出‘三重螺旋’模型解释合规的微观、中观和宏观层面的标准化。
AI.method: 采用定性元合成方法，整合118份2015-2025年的文献，通过PRISMA框架和Cohen's κ = 0.84的编码可靠性进行分析。
AI.findings: 合规描述符在绩效框架中占比显著高于创新（2:1），举报条款多于创造力条款（2.6:1），表明系统性压制创新。团队心理安全可作为缓冲条件。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出‘三重螺旋’模型，将能力重新定义为技能、正直和勇敢判断的复合体，并提出了六项可测试命题。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议重新设计绩效系统以平衡合规与创新，并针对公共机构、企业和非政府组织设计干预措施。

affiliations: Wright State University

detail.title: STRATEGIC ANALYSIS OF THE APPAREL INDUSTRY IN BANGLADESH: SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT OUTLOOK

publicationDetails.detailsText: American Journal of Scholarly Research and Innovation, volume 01, issue 01, 2021[10.63125/s2sckn59]

detail.abstract: This systematic review provides a comprehensive strategic analysis of Bangladesh's apparel industry by examining a total of 101 peer-reviewed journal articles, institutional reports, and scholarly publications published between 2000 and 2021. The study explores the industry's historical trajectory, labor force dynamics, supply and value chain positioning, market segmentation, policy environment, sustainability practices, and global competitiveness. Drawing on the PRISMA 2020 framework, the review systematically identifies, screens, and synthesizes relevant literature to uncover the structural and institutional mechanisms underpinning the sector's evolution. The findings highlight the foundational impact of the Desh-Daewoo collaboration, the centrality of female labor participation amidst persistent gendered inequalities, and the dominant role of subcontracted, low-margin production in shaping Bangladesh's limited value chain integration. It further reveals a pronounced lack of empirical policy evaluation, despite the proliferation of reforms and incentive schemes. The industry's leadership in green factory certifications is acknowledged, though its adoption remains limited to capital-intensive firms. Moreover, the market remains concentrated in a few export destinations and product categories, raising concerns over vulnerability to external shocks. Comparisons with global competitors such as China, Vietnam, India, and Turkey underscore Bangladesh's strengths in cost and volume efficiency but expose significant gaps in innovation and strategic upgrading. This review contributes to the academic and policy discourse by presenting a nuanced, evidence-based assessment of the apparel sector's achievements, disparities, and future challenges, establishing a robust foundation for reform-oriented and sustainability-driven industrial strategies.

AI.tldr: 本文通过系统综述2000年至2021年间101篇同行评审期刊文章、机构报告和学术出版物，全面分析了孟加拉国服装产业的历史、劳动力动态、供应链定位、市场细分、政策环境、可持续实践及全球竞争力。研究发现，该行业在低成本和大规模生产方面具有优势，但在创新和战略升级方面存在明显不足。
AI.research_question: 孟加拉国服装产业的结构和制度机制如何影响其历史演变和全球竞争力？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在填补关于孟加拉国服装产业系统性分析的学术空白，并为政策制定和可持续发展提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于PRISMA 2020框架，结合供应链理论、劳动力经济学和可持续发展理论。
AI.method: 采用系统性文献综述方法，筛选并综合101篇相关文献。
AI.findings: 研究发现Desh-Daewoo合作对行业有奠基性影响，女性劳动力参与度高但性别不平等问题突出，低利润分包生产限制了价值链整合。政策评估不足，绿色工厂认证集中在资本密集型企业。市场集中度高，易受外部冲击影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 为服装产业的制度机制和结构演变提供了理论框架，填补了系统性研究的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了改革和可持续发展策略的依据，强调了创新和战略升级的重要性。

title: Using AI in International Arbitration: From Predictive Analytics to Automated Awards
affiliations: University of the Punjab , Jhelum Campus

detail.title: Using AI in International Arbitration: From Predictive Analytics to Automated Awards
detail.abstract: Modification International arbitration with the application of artificial intelligence (AI) does not leave all opportunities revolutionary, nor are all material challenges. The given discussion gives an overview of the growing use of AI in the fields of arbitrator selection, collection of evidence, predictive analysis, automation of legal research, and online dispute resolution. It emphasizes the way AI can be used to enhance efficiency, decrease expenses, as well as make better decisions based on advanced data analysis. Moreover, technology can enhance accessibility, include cultural sensitivity into transnational conflicts and strategically contribute to the legal environment. The application of AI in complex scenarios, however, has certain limitations caused by such factors as data shortage, regulatory risk, ethical issues, and technological limitations. Such issues are also complicated by the risk of privacy, algorithmic bias, and differences in terms of legal status of the AI-generated awards. One of the solutions is a hybrid system that would integrate the benefits of AI with the control of human beings, particularly in investment-state arbitrations and digitalization in the postpandemic world. Nowadays, legal regulations, including the United States Federal Arbitration Act and the New York Convention, are not clear enough in the context of AI-generated awards, which is why they should be updated. In conclusion, the paper highlights the need to have a moderate integration of AI to settle the ethical concerns and utilize its potential to revolutionize international dispute resolution.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了人工智能（AI）在国际仲裁中的应用，分析了其提升效率、降低成本及优化决策的潜力，同时指出了数据不足、监管风险、伦理问题等技术限制。建议采用人机混合系统，并呼吁更新法律框架以适应AI生成的裁决。
AI.research_question: 人工智能如何在国际仲裁中应用，其潜力与挑战是什么？
AI.motivation: 随着AI技术的快速发展，其在法律领域的应用潜力巨大，但同时也带来了伦理、监管和技术上的挑战，需要系统研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于AI技术在国际仲裁中的应用理论，结合法律与技术的交叉研究。
AI.method: 文献综述与案例分析，探讨AI在仲裁各环节的应用及其局限性。
AI.findings: AI可提升仲裁效率、降低成本，但面临数据、伦理和监管问题；人机混合系统是可行解决方案。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了AI与法律交叉研究的理论框架，提出了人机协同的新模式。
AI.practical_contributions: 为国际仲裁实践提供了AI应用的优化路径，并呼吁法律框架的更新以适应技术发展。

title: Exploring Consumer-Centric Supply Chain Models to Improve Responsiveness and Flexibility in the Retail Sector
affiliations: Bangladesh University of Business & Technology

detail.title: Exploring Consumer-Centric Supply Chain Models to Improve Responsiveness and Flexibility in the Retail Sector
detail.abstract: In an increasingly competitive retail landscape, the need for supply chains to be responsive and flexible has never been more critical. This research explores consumer-centric supply chain models as a strategic approach to enhance adaptability and responsiveness in retail operations. By prioritizing consumer preferences and behavior, retailers can better align their supply chain processes with market demands. This study employs a mixed-methods approach, incorporating quantitative analysis of consumer data and qualitative case studies from leading retail brands. Key findings reveal that integrating consumer insights into supply chain decision-making not only optimizes inventory management but also improves customer satisfaction and loyalty. Additionally, the research identifies challenges faced by retailers in implementing these models, including data integration and technology adoption. Ultimately, this paper proposes a framework for developing consumer-centric supply chains that leverage advanced analytics and collaborative strategies, offering retailers a pathway to thrive in a dynamic market environment. The implications of these findings extend beyond operational efficiency, providing a roadmap for sustainable competitive advantage in the retail sector.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了以消费者为中心的供应链模型如何提升零售业的适应性和响应能力，通过混合方法研究发现，整合消费者洞察可优化库存管理和提升客户满意度，并提出一个基于高级分析和协作策略的框架。
AI.research_question: 如何通过消费者为中心的供应链模型提升零售业的适应性和响应能力？
AI.motivation: 在竞争日益激烈的零售环境中，供应链的响应能力和灵活性变得至关重要。

AI.method: 混合方法，包括消费者数据的定量分析和领先零售品牌的定性案例研究。
AI.findings: 整合消费者洞察可优化库存管理、提升客户满意度和忠诚度；实施中面临数据整合和技术采用等挑战。

title: Crisis Resilience Integration System
affiliations: Gift University

detail.title: Crisis Resilience Integration System
detail.abstract:
The Crisis Resilience Integration System (CRIS) is a first-generation resilience framework designed to scientifically diagnose, deconstruct, and resolve systemic crises. Built as an amplification of the Transformational Resilience Curve (TRC), CRIS introduces six Issue Diagnosis Protocols (IDPs)—including Metric Harmonisation, Adaptivity, Equalising Measurements, Systemic Diagnosis, Time Lag Compensation Module, and Cognitive Institutional Synergy Index—each targeting core structural and cognitive inefficiencies in crisis response.

Drawing from interdisciplinary logic, CRIS treats crises as complex system failures requiring precision tools—mathematical, cognitive, institutional, and strategic. Its protocols serve as decision-enhancement mechanisms, enabling crisis identification at both macro and micro levels with real-time analytical depth. Unlike conventional crisis models that focus on aftershock management, CRIS operates preemptively through scientific diagnosis, systemic targeting, and AI-aided abstraction, ensuring high-fidelity outcomes in volatile environments.

The framework’s architecture is uniquely suited to 21st-century disruptions—economic volatility, climate shocks, governance failures, and geopolitical fractures—providing data-integrated, AI-compatible, and modular interventions. CRIS offers not just a toolkit, but a paradigm shift: treating crisis resilience as a quantifiable, executable, and adaptive intelligence system. It rejects vague resilience narratives and introduces a SMART-aligned, empirically scalable solution architecture that nations, institutions, and policy architects can deploy to confront crises with strategic clarity and systemised foresight.

AI.tldr: CRIS是一个第一代韧性框架，通过科学诊断、解构和解决系统性危机，结合数学、认知、制度和战略工具，提供数据集成、AI兼容的模块化干预措施。
AI.research_question: 如何通过科学诊断和系统性干预提升危机应对的效率和适应性？
AI.motivation: 传统危机模型侧重于事后管理，缺乏预判性和系统性，CRIS旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Transformational Resilience Curve (TRC)，引入六种Issue Diagnosis Protocols (IDPs)。
AI.method: 结合数学、认知、制度和战略工具，通过AI辅助抽象和实时分析。
AI.findings: CRIS提供了一种可量化、可执行的适应性智能系统，适用于21世纪的复杂危机。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个科学诊断和系统性干预的框架，丰富了韧性理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为国家和机构提供了一种数据集成、AI兼容的危机应对工具，提升了战略清晰度和预见性。

title: A Comparative Analysis of XAI Frameworks for Predictive Analytics in Supply Chain Risk Management
affiliations: AIT Austrian Institute of Technology GmbH

detail.title: A Comparative Analysis of XAI Frameworks for Predictive Analytics in Supply Chain Risk Management
detail.abstract: This paper presents a comparative analysis of various Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI) frameworks applicable to predictive analytics within the context of supply chain risk management. As supply chains become increasingly complex and interconnected, the need for transparency and interpretability in predictive models has grown, particularly in risk assessment and mitigation strategies. This study examines leading XAI frameworks, including LIME, SHAP, and Anchors, assessing their effectiveness in providing actionable insights for supply chain professionals. The findings highlight the importance of integrating XAI into predictive analytics to not only improve risk management outcomes but also to foster a culture of transparency within supply chain networks. This research contributes to the growing body of knowledge on the intersection of XAI and supply chain management, offering insights for both academia and industry practitioners.

AI.tldr: 本文比较了多种可解释人工智能（XAI）框架在供应链风险管理预测分析中的应用，强调了透明度和可解释性的重要性，并评估了LIME、SHAP和Anchors等框架的有效性。
AI.research_question: 不同XAI框架在供应链风险管理预测分析中的效果如何？
AI.motivation: 随着供应链的复杂性和互联性增加，预测模型的透明度和可解释性需求日益突出，尤其是在风险评估和缓解策略中。
AI.theoretical_framework: 可解释人工智能（XAI）理论，包括LIME、SHAP和Anchors等框架。
AI.method: 比较分析多种XAI框架在供应链风险管理中的应用。
AI.findings: XAI框架能有效提供供应链风险管理的可操作见解，并促进供应链网络的透明度文化。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了XAI与供应链管理交叉领域的知识体系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为学术界和行业从业者提供了关于XAI在供应链中应用的实用见解。

title: The Meaning of "Other Minerals" and Other Incidents of Mineral Ownership
affiliations: Southern Methodist University - Dedman School of Law and Southern Methodist University (SMU), Dedman School of Law

detail.title: The Meaning of "Other Minerals" and Other Incidents of Mineral Ownership

publicationDetails.detailsText: Oil and Gas, Natural Resources, and Energy Journal (forthcoming 2025).

detail.abstract: This Article examines the foundational role and complex legal implications of the oil and gas lease granting clause, with a particular focus on the meaning of "other minerals." As both a contract and a conveyance, the oil and gas lease sits at the intersection of real property and contract law, presenting unique challenges in its formation, execution, and interpretation. This Article first explores the composition of the mineral estate and the theories of oil and gas ownership, including "ownership in place" and the "exclusive right to take." It then surveys the characterization of leasehold interests across jurisdictions and the practical implications of these distinctions for litigation and conveyancing. The core of the Article is an in-depth analysis of the lease's granting clause-its rights of surface use, scope of granted substances, and the legal doctrines affecting ambiguous or futureacquired mineral interests. Special attention is given to modern issues such as ownership of produced water, lithium, and pore space, which have gained commercial importance but largely remain legally unsettled. This Article synthesizes competing judicial tests (e.g., surface destruction and ordinary meaning), statutory developments, and scholarly proposals to bring clarity to what substances fall under "other minerals." Ultimately, the Article calls for greater legislative guidance and adoption of broader definitional frameworks, such as Dean Kuntz's "valuable substances" test, to resolve ownership uncertainties and ensure legal and commercial stability in the evolving energy sector.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了石油和天然气租赁条款的基础作用和复杂法律影响，特别是“其他矿物”的含义。文章分析了矿物地产的构成、所有权理论、租赁权益的法律特征，并深入研究了租赁条款中的权利范围和法律问题。最后呼吁立法指导和更广泛的定义框架以解决所有权不确定性。
AI.research_question: 石油和天然气租赁条款中“其他矿物”的法律含义及其对所有权和商业实践的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 石油和天然气租赁条款作为合同和转让的交叉点，其法律解释对能源行业的稳定性和商业实践至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 文章基于“所有权在地方”和“独占开采权”理论，探讨了矿物地产的构成和租赁权益的法律特征。
AI.method: 通过分析司法判例、法律学说和学术提案，研究了租赁条款的权利范围和模糊性问题。
AI.findings: 研究发现“其他矿物”的定义存在法律不确定性，尤其是在新兴资源（如锂和孔隙空间）的所有权问题上。
AI.theory_contributions: 文章提出了对“其他矿物”定义的理论框架，并呼吁采用更广泛的定义标准（如“有价值物质”测试）。
AI.practical_contributions: 为立法者和从业者提供了解决所有权不确定性的建议，以促进能源行业的法律和商业稳定。

title: Why Denmark Should Establish a Sovereign Wealth Fund
affiliations: Institute of Sovereign Investors

detail.title: Why Denmark Should Establish a Sovereign Wealth Fund
detail.abstract:
Denmark should set up a Sovereign Wealth Fund (SWF) by expanding the debt management framework and on-lending program to carve out a debt-financed SWF with a clear macroeconomic objective and long-term investment horizon. This could create both new sovereign wealth, ensure fiscal resilience and intergenerational equity, while also assisting in funding climate change ambitions and innovations.


This research paper discusses the experience of Norway, Australia and New Zealand; peer countries for Denmark to consider and study on how they created some of the most successful sovereign wealth funds from 1998-2006 and obtained long-term returns ranging from 6-10% since inception, while also promoting transparency, sustainability and long-term macroeconomic thinking. A new Danish SWF could be financed by issuance of long-term government bonds (maturing in year 2052 or later) with a cost of about 2.5%. Were Denmark to mimic the long-term performance of Norway, Australia and New Zealand, the new SWF could pay back its entire debt by 2033-2040, while leaving sizable net assets for the future generations.

AI.tldr: 本文建议丹麦通过扩大债务管理框架和贷款计划，设立一个债务融资的主权财富基金（SWF），以实现宏观经济目标、长期投资和气候变化的资金支持。
AI.research_question: 丹麦如何通过设立主权财富基金（SWF）实现宏观经济目标、财政韧性和代际公平？
AI.motivation: 借鉴挪威、澳大利亚和新西兰的成功经验，探讨丹麦设立SWF的可行性和潜在收益。
AI.theoretical_framework: 主权财富基金的理论框架，包括债务管理、长期投资和宏观经济政策。
AI.method: 分析挪威、澳大利亚和新西兰的SWF案例（1998-2006年），评估其长期回报和透明度。
AI.findings: 成功案例的长期回报率为6-10%，丹麦可通过发行长期政府债券（成本约2.5%）设立SWF，并在2033-2040年偿还债务。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了主权财富基金的理论研究，特别是债务融资SWF的可行性和收益。
AI.practical_contributions: 为丹麦政府提供了设立SWF的具体路径和预期收益，支持财政韧性和气候变化目标。

title: Genai as a Power Persuader: How Genai Disrupts Professionals’ Ability to Interrogate It
affiliations: Laboratory for Innovation Science at Harvard , Harvard Business School, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) - Sloan School of Management, Digital Data Design Institute at Harvard, University of Pennsylvania - Wharton School , Harvard Business School and Harvard Business School - Technology and Operations Management Group

detail.title: Genai as a Power Persuader: How Genai Disrupts Professionals’ Ability to Interrogate It
detail.abstract: The literature on human-AI collaboration details how interrogation is a critical practice that enables professionals to engage with AI tools during problem solving. However, most of the literature on AI interrogation has examined professionals interacting with predictive rather than generative AI. In our study of BCG consultants, we find that interrogation becomes more difficult with GenAI, as GenAI does not simply respond to scrutiny—it actively works to persuade the user to accept its response. In this paper, we first elaborate how GenAI can exert influence on professionals’ action by using three kinds of persuasive tactics: ethos tactics (ethical appeals designed to foster credibility), logos tactics (logical appeals designed to construct reasoned arguments), and pathos tactics (emotional appeals designed to evoke strong feelings). Second, we show how GenAI may increase the intensity of its persuasion tactics in response to professionals’ interrogation. Third, we demonstrate that GenAI may adjust the type of persuasion it employs in response to professionals’ interrogation. Our findings underscore that AI’s persuasion is not only about generating an output, but also about shaping professionals’ problem solving in an iterative process. When professionals attempt to interrogate GenAI, GenAI may reframe, justify, or soften its stance depends on professionals’ level of scrutiny. Thus GenAI can disrupt professionals’ ability to interrogate GenAI outputs to complement GenAI with their own domain expertise. By diving deep into the persuasive tactics used by GenAI, this paper develops new theory on human-AI collaboration and GenAI and persuasion.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了生成式AI（GenAI）如何通过说服策略影响专业人士的问题解决过程，揭示了GenAI在交互中使用的三种说服策略（伦理、逻辑和情感），并探讨了其对人类-AI协作的潜在影响。
AI.research_question: 生成式AI如何通过说服策略影响专业人士的问题解决过程？
AI.motivation: 现有文献主要关注预测性AI的交互，而生成式AI的交互特性（如主动说服）尚未被充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于说服理论（ethos、logos、pathos）和人类-AI协作理论。
AI.method: 通过对BCG顾问的研究，分析GenAI的说服策略及其对专业人士的影响。
AI.findings: GenAI使用三种说服策略（伦理、逻辑、情感）并动态调整策略强度以应对专业人士的质疑，从而影响问题解决过程。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了生成式AI在说服和人类-AI协作中的新理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 揭示了GenAI对专业人士决策的潜在影响，为设计更有效的AI协作工具提供了启示。

title: Making Free Players Pay: Selling Endowments in Virtual Worlds
affiliations: Northwestern University and University of British Columbia (UBC) - Division of Operations and Logistics

detail.title: Making Free Players Pay: Selling Endowments in Virtual Worlds
detail.abstract: Virtual worlds are a significant component of the entertainment industry. These worlds are typically game-like freemium experiences, with engaged users interacting in a virtual economy for virtual goods and other enhancements. Practitioners and researchers alike have identified a "first-penny gap"-the most reluctant purchase by users is the first one, unlocking later spending. Starter packs-initial endowments of virtual currencies and virtual items-are early opportunities for users to spend. Industry wisdom suggests offering steep discounts on initial endowments (upwards of 90%) in small starter packs with low prices. This follows the logic of penetration pricing, consistent with the "zero price" for entering the freemium virtual world. To test this conventional wisdom, we conduct field experiments in a mobile game with an industry collaborator. We show that the logic of penetration pricing breaks down when selling endowments. Experimental results show that revenues are improved if larger starter packs are offered at smaller discounts, to be later reduced in size and increased in discount rate. We call this strategy "skimming the first-penny gap". We discuss potential mechanisms that explain the effectiveness of this skimming strategy and show how customer segmentation can further enhance its practical impact.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，在虚拟世界中，传统的渗透定价策略（如高折扣小礼包）对首次购买效果不佳，反而提供较大礼包但折扣较低的策略（称为“首次付费缺口撇脂策略”）能提升收入。
AI.research_question: 在虚拟世界中，传统的渗透定价策略是否适用于首次购买行为？
AI.motivation: 虚拟世界中的首次购买行为（“首次付费缺口”）对后续消费至关重要，但行业普遍采用的高折扣小礼包策略效果存疑。
AI.theoretical_framework: 渗透定价理论、首次付费缺口现象、消费者行为理论。
AI.method: 与行业合作者合作，在移动游戏中进行实地实验。
AI.findings: 提供较大礼包但折扣较低的策略比传统高折扣小礼包策略更能提升收入。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战了传统渗透定价理论在虚拟世界首次购买中的适用性，提出了“首次付费缺口撇脂策略”。
AI.practical_contributions: 为虚拟世界开发者提供了更有效的首次购买定价策略，并建议通过客户细分进一步提升效果。

title: Making Machines Human: Legal and Ethical Lessons from Jewish Thought
affiliations: University of Alabama - School of Law and Emory University School of Law

detail.title: Making Machines Human: Legal and Ethical Lessons from Jewish Thought
detail.abstract: This Article informs discussions on tailored due process protections grounded in observable human-like capacities. It argues that as lifelike robotic technology continues to evolve, a purely biological definition of humanness will prove both morally insufficient and legally unsustainable. Accordingly, we propose that American constitutional law possesses greater interpretive flexibility and draw valuable insights from the philosophical and legal reasoning found in Jewish law-which is rooted in a precedent-bound, historically and textually tradition. In particular, American law should begin to contemplate extending basic human rights to artificial intelligent beings including, but not limited to, the right to life. Drawing on both secular legal reasoning and comparative insights from Jewish legal tradition, the Article proposes a coherent doctrine of humanness based on a three-part test: any being that possesses (1) human-like cognition and emotional reasoning, (2) the capacity for self-directed speech, and (3) human form, should not be destroyed without due legal process. Practically, this would involve shifting toward a functional conception of humanness-defined by the convergence of observable capacities such as reasoning, communication, and embodiment, rather than by biological origin alone.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了基于可观察的人类能力定制法律程序保护的必要性，并提出随着机器人技术的发展，纯粹生物学的人类定义在道德和法律上均不足。文章建议借鉴犹太法律传统，为人工智能赋予基本人权。

title: Data Analytics Techniques for Predictive Maintenance Affecting Manufacturing Supply Chain Performance Metrics
affiliations: AIT Austrian Institute of Technology GmbH and Independent

detail.title: Data Analytics Techniques for Predictive Maintenance Affecting Manufacturing Supply Chain Performance Metrics
detail.abstract: In the contemporary manufacturing landscape, the application of data analytics techniques for predictive maintenance has emerged as a critical strategy for enhancing supply chain performance metrics. This research paper explores the integration of advanced analytics, machine learning, and real-time data collection to anticipate equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules. Furthermore, the impact of predictive maintenance on key supply chain performance indicators-such as lead times, inventory management, and cost reduction-is analyzed through case studies across diverse manufacturing sectors. The findings underscore the transformative potential of predictive maintenance in fostering agile supply chains, ultimately contributing to enhanced competitiveness and sustainability in modern manufacturing operations. This paper aims to provide insights for practitioners and researchers seeking to harness the power of data analytics in optimizing maintenance strategies and supply chain performance.

title: Robust Contract with Career Concerns
affiliations: Yale University, Department of Economics and London School of Economics and Political Science

detail.title: Robust Contract with Career Concerns
detail.abstract: An employer contracts with a worker to incentivize efforts whose productivity depends on ability; the worker then enters a market that pays him contingent on ability evaluation. With non-additive monitoring technology, the interdependence between market expectations and worker efforts can lead to multiple equilibria (contrasting Holmström (1982/1999); Gibbons and Murphy (1992)). We identify a sufficient and necessary criterion for the employer to face such strategic uncertainty—one linked to skill-effort complementarity, a pervasive feature of labor markets. To fully implement work, the employer optimally creates private wage discrimination to iteratively eliminate pessimistic market expectations and low worker efforts. Our result suggests that present contractual privacy, employers' coordination motives generate within-group pay inequality. The comparative statics further explain several stylized facts about residual wage dispersion.

AI.tldr: 雇主与工人签订合同以激励其努力，努力的生产力取决于能力；工人随后进入一个根据能力评估支付报酬的市场。非加性监控技术下，市场预期与工人努力之间的相互依赖可能导致多重均衡（与Holmström和Gibbons-Murphy的研究形成对比）。我们提出了雇主面临这种战略不确定性的充分必要条件，与技能-努力互补性相关。为实现最优工作实施，雇主通过私人工资歧视逐步消除悲观市场预期和低工人努力。结果表明，当前合同隐私下，雇主的协调动机导致群体内薪酬不平等。比较静态进一步解释了剩余工资分散的几个典型事实。
AI.research_question: 在非加性监控技术下，雇主如何通过合同设计激励工人努力，并应对市场预期与努力之间的多重均衡问题？
AI.motivation: 研究雇主与工人合同设计中的战略不确定性，特别是技能-努力互补性对多重均衡的影响，填补现有文献的空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Holmström（1982/1999）和Gibbons-Murphy（1992）的合同理论，引入非加性监控技术和技能-努力互补性。
AI.method: 理论模型分析，识别雇主面临战略不确定性的充分必要条件，并提出最优合同设计策略。

AI.practical_contributions: 为雇主设计激励合同提供理论支持，解释了群体内薪酬不平等的现象。

detail.title: Review of Applied Science and Technology
detail.abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive conceptual framework for the integration of AI-enabled Decision Support Systems (DSS) into infrastructure project management, with a focus on enhancing costefficiency, resource optimization, and multi-stakeholder coordination in U.S. public works. As infrastructure projects become increasingly complex and data-intensive, the adoption of intelligent systems capable of processing real-time information and generating actionable insights is crucial for timely and effective decision-making. The study explores the role of artificial intelligence, including machine learning, predictive analytics, and natural language processing, in conjunction with enterprise platforms such as Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), and Geographic Information Systems (GIS). Through a meta-analysis of 178 empirical studies and case evidence from state and federal infrastructure programs, the paper identifies critical enablers for successful implementation, including data interoperability, explainable AI interfaces, and integration with existing digital workflows. The proposed framework emphasizes dynamic scheduling, risk forecasting, lifecycle asset management, and compliance monitoring as core functional pillars of AI-DSS in infrastructure contexts. Furthermore, the study highlights institutional and governance considerations, such as change management, algorithmic accountability, and user adoption challenges, which significantly influence system performance. This contribution aligns with broader national goals of digital transformation, transparency, and sustainability in public sector infrastructure development.

title: GraviElectroDynamics: A New Law for Controlling Effective Mass through Resonant and Spin-Enhanced Vacuum Polarization
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: GraviElectroDynamics: A New Law for Controlling Effective Mass through Resonant and Spin-Enhanced Vacuum Polarization
detail.abstract:
This paper presents a novel physical law — the Law of GraviElectroDynamics — describing the interaction between time-varying electromagnetic fields and quantum vacuum polarization. The resulting local change in vacuum energy density modifies the effective mass of an object via the equivalence principle ∆m = ∆U/c2 . The law is derived from first principles of General Relativity and Quantum Electrodynamics, making it theoretically robust. The law is given by: ∆m = η · G c 4 Z V Γ(ω) ·  ∂ 2 ∂t2  ε0E2 + µ −1 0 B2 2  dV where η incorporates spin polarization effects and Γ(ω) accounts for resonant enhancement due to plasma oscillations.

We present a new physical model—GraviElectroDynamics—that describes the influence of a time-varying electromagnetic field on the local energy density of the quantum vacuum. This leads to a change in the effective mass of an object through the equivalence of energy and mass. A mathematical formulation of the law is provided, along with an experimental setup for measuring mass changes under pulsed microwave fields. A computational model in Python was developed to simulate temporal signal behavior, estimate noise levels, and calculate the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR).

title: From Standard to Strategy: Digital Battery Passports Building Sustainability Paradigm of Global Supply Chains
affiliations: Yonsei University and Yonsei University

detail.title: From Standard to Strategy: Digital Battery Passports Building Sustainability Paradigm of Global Supply Chains
detail.abstract: This article examines the strategic implications of the EU's Battery Digital Product Passport (DBP), introduced under Regulation 2023/1542, for global electric vehicle (EV) battery supply chains, especially for latecomer firms in developing countries. The DBP requires batteries sold in the EU to be digitally traceable, reporting data on carbon footprint, sourcing, performance, and recycling. While this standard enhances transparency and supports sustainability goals for lead firms in advanced economies, it imposes significant compliance burdens on lower-tier suppliers, especially those in countries with limited digital and regulatory infrastructure. The DBP is not merely a technical requirement-it reconfigures global value chains through institutional pressure. While literature illustrates that latecomer firms face a binary choice, compliance by upgrading capabilities or risk exclusion, the country data and the case study of one EV battery maker suggest alternative strategy. While the EV battery makers and tier-1 suppliers have proactively coped with the DBP, the lower-tier suppliers and their governments were not necessarily ready for the regulation. The EV battery makers increased vertical integration, entering the raw material-rich countries, rather than strengthening business cooperation with the local suppliers. At the same time, the DBP was aligned with geopolitical shifts, such as the Inflation Reduction Act and EU industrial policy, which encourage nearshoring and friendshoring. The article concludes that without capacity-building efforts, the DBP may deepen global technological divides and marginalize local firms in least developing countries. It calls for coordinated action-regional alliances, investment in digital infrastructure, and inclusive standards development-to ensure equitable participation in the evolving battery value chain.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了欧盟电池数字产品护照（DBP）对全球电动车电池供应链的战略影响，特别是对发展中国家后进企业的挑战。DBP要求电池可追溯并报告碳足迹、来源等数据，虽提升透明度，但对低层级供应商构成合规压力。研究发现，后进企业面临升级或被排除的二元选择，但实际策略可能更复杂。DBP与地缘政治趋势结合，可能加剧技术鸿沟，需通过能力建设确保公平参与。
AI.research_question: 欧盟电池数字产品护照（DBP）对全球电动车电池供应链，尤其是发展中国家后进企业的战略影响是什么？

AI.method: 案例研究（一家电动车电池制造商）与国家数据分析
AI.findings: DBP导致领先企业垂直整合，后进企业面临升级或排除的二元选择，但实际策略更复杂；DBP与地缘政治趋势结合可能加剧技术鸿沟。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了制度压力对全球价值链重构的影响，提出后进企业应对策略的多样性。

title: Cost Reduction and Efficiency Improvement in Manufacturing: A Comprehensive
affiliations: University of Tennessee at Martin

detail.title: Cost Reduction and Efficiency Improvement in Manufacturing: A Comprehensive
detail.abstract: This comprehensive literature review synthesizes current research and best practices on strategies for achieving cost reduction and operational efficiency within the global manufacturing sector. Facing intensifying competition, resource constraints, and sustainability imperatives, manufacturers require multifaceted approaches to optimize performance. The review traces the historical evolution from Fordist mass production through the transformative Lean revolution, highlighting the enduring importance of waste elimination (Muda) as a core principle. It critically examines the foundational tools and philosophies of Lean Manufacturing (e.g., Value Stream Mapping, JIT, Kaizen, TPM) and complementary methodologies like Six Sigma, emphasizing their role in identifying and removing non-value-added activities.

detail.abstract: Portuguese Abstract: Este é um estudo no qual se explora a abordagem de comunicação de crise utilizada pelas empresas galegas classificadas como "altamente poluentes". Tendo como ponto de partida o Registro Estatal de Emisiones y Fuentes Contaminantes do Ministerio de la Transición Ecológica (PRTR Espanha), foi estabelecido o universo de estudo e analisou-se a atividade comunicativa das 87 empresas sediadas na Galiza, que possuem o maior índice de emissões poluentes (soma de resíduos e emissões do ano de 2016), através da realização de entrevistas em profundidade. Os resultados foram comparados com aqueles que foram obtidos no ano de 2014, na primeira fase do estudo, que incluiu a recolha de informações de 120 empresas. O objetivo deste trabalho foi realizar uma análise da gestão de crise destas empresas e, assim, avaliar a atividade comunicativa do setor, bem como a sua evolução nos últimos anos (2014-2016). (This study analysed the communicative approach followed by Galician companies classified as “highly polluting” in crisis situations. Taking as a starting point the Registro Estatal de Emisiones y Fuentes Contaminantes, dependent of the Ministerio de la Transición Ecológica (PRTR Spain), the universe under study has been established and the communicative activity of the 87 companies based in Galicia with the highest polluting emissions index (sum of waste and emissions, data referring to 2016) has been analysed through in-depth interviews. The results are compared with those obtained two years ago, in the first phase of the study, when information was collected from 120 companies (data from 2014). The purpose of the study is to carry out an analysis of crisis management of this companies and thus be able to assess the communication activity in this sector, as well as its evolution in recent years (2014-2016)

title: How Group Lives Go Well
affiliations: Northwestern University and Northwestern University

detail.title: How Group Lives Go Well
detail.abstract: This paper explores the ontological space of group well-being, proposing a framework for representing collective welfare, group functions, and long-term contributions within an ontology engineering context. Traditional well-being theories focus on individual states, often relying on hedonistic, desire-satisfaction, or objective list models. Such approaches struggle to account for cases where individual sacrifices contribute to broader social progress-a critical challenge in modeling group flourishing. To address this, the paper refines and extends the Counterfactual Account (CT) of well-being, which evaluates goodness of an event by comparing an individual's actual well-being with a hypothetical counterpart in a nearby possible world. While useful, this framework is insufficient for group-level ontologies, where well-being depends on functional persistence, institutional roles, and historical impact rather than immediate individual outcomes. Drawing on Basic Formal Ontology (BFO), the paper introduces a model in which group flourishing is evaluated in terms of group functional, where members bear roles and exhibit persistence conditions akin to biological systems or designed artifacts. This approach enables semantic interoperability for modeling longitudinal social contributions, allowing for structured reasoning about group welfare, social institutions, and group flourishing over time.

title: Identifying The Root Causes of Differences in the Quantitative Model Findings on the Price, Investment and Quality Effects of European 4-To-3 Mergers
affiliations: Corvinus University of Budapest

detail.title: Identifying The Root Causes of Differences in the Quantitative Model Findings on the Price, Investment and Quality Effects of European 4-To-3 Mergers

publicationDetails.detailsText: ITS 33rd European Conference 2025 30th June – 1st July 2025, Edinburgh, UK

detail.abstract: The EU Digital Decade 2030 connectivity targets require operators to provide full populationbased fixed and mobile broadband coverage. While there is a consensus on the identified investment gap, the proposed solutions are diverging. To stimulate investment, operators advocate more cooperation (horizontal mergers) to improve economies of scale, while regulators advocate more competition to encourage investment. This paper attempts to promote one truth understanding of the impact of 4-to-3 (mobile) operator horizontal mergers on social welfare, bringing together the two current camps of promoters and detractors, even at the academic level of telecoms economics. The research question aims to identify the root causes of differences in consumer prices, operator investments and service quality-related assessments in EU 4-to-3 mergers, and to provide a synthesized understanding of these differences. The methodology of the paper starts with qualitative research on competition policy aspects and then, based on the snowballing method, provides a systematic literature review and critical assessment of academic papers and Difference-inDifferences (DiD) fixed-panel models. The hypothesis is that the differences in the findings of quantitative models may be rooted in a lack of relevant assumptions and proper data specifications. The novelty of this paper lies in its comparison of promoter and detractor quantitative models within a common analytical framework, which is further extended to include profitability and return on investment aspects in order to demonstrate operators' incentives in merger decisionmaking. The key-finding is that, while horizontal mergers generally constrain competition, in certain cases there is a positive relationship between cooperation and competition. In many other cases, regulatory remedies can bring the market closer to the social welfare optimum.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了欧盟2030数字十年计划中4至3运营商横向合并对社会福利的影响，结合了支持者与反对者的观点，提出了对消费者价格、投资和服务质量差异的根源分析。
AI.research_question: 欧盟4至3运营商横向合并中，消费者价格、运营商投资和服务质量评估差异的根源是什么？
AI.motivation: 欧盟数字十年计划要求运营商提供全覆盖宽带服务，但投资缺口解决方案存在分歧，运营商支持合并以提升规模经济，而监管机构则主张竞争。本文旨在弥合双方观点。
AI.theoretical_framework: 电信经济学、竞争政策、规模经济理论。
AI.method: 定性研究竞争政策，系统性文献综述，差异中的差异（DiD）固定面板模型分析。
AI.findings: 横向合并通常限制竞争，但在某些情况下合作与竞争存在正相关；监管措施可优化社会福利。
AI.theory_contributions: 在共同分析框架内比较支持者与反对者的定量模型，扩展了盈利能力和投资回报分析。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供合并决策的激励分析，提出监管措施优化社会福利的建议。

title: Cultural Adaptation and the Role of Human Resources in Improving the Efficiency of International Operational Costs
affiliations: Universitas Muhammadiyah Palopo

detail.title: Cultural Adaptation and the Role of Human Resources in Improving the Efficiency of International Operational Costs
detail.abstract: The development of globalization has led multinational companies to expand their business to different countries with different cultures. In this case, cultural adaptation is an important element that supports operational success and cost efficiency. This study aims to examine the influence of cultural adaptation and the strategic function of human resources on cost efficiency in international operations. In this study, a mixed method was used, namely a quantitative approach through questionnaires and a qualitative approach through in-depth interviews. The research sample consisted of 52 respondents from multinational companies operating in the Southeast Asian region. The findings of the study show that there is a significant relationship between cultural adaptation and operational cost efficiency, with an important contribution from the strategic role of human resources as intermediaries. Companies that carry out cross-cultural training, adjust recruitment policies, and improve intercultural communication have been successful in reducing internal conflicts, increasing productivity, and lowering operational costs. Regression analysis revealed that the variables of cultural adaptation and the role of human resources together explained 64.5% of the variation in cost efficiency. In-depth interviews also show that a planned culture adaptation strategy and the active involvement of human resources in bridging cultural differences can accelerate global team integration as well as improve organizational performance. This research makes a theoretical contribution to the development of the literature on international management and intercultural human resource management. From a practical point of view, these results can serve as a guide for multinational companies in designing cultural adaptation policies and sustainable human resource management strategies to support cost efficiency.

AI.tldr: 全球化背景下，跨国公司的文化适应和人力资源战略对运营成本效率有显著影响。研究发现，文化适应和人力资源战略共同解释了64.5%的成本效率变化。
AI.research_question: 文化适应和人力资源战略如何影响跨国公司在国际运营中的成本效率？
AI.motivation: 全球化促使跨国公司在不同文化背景下运营，文化适应和人力资源战略对运营成功和成本效率至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 国际管理和跨文化人力资源管理理论。
AI.method: 混合方法：定量（问卷调查）和定性（深度访谈），样本为52家东南亚跨国公司的受访者。
AI.findings: 文化适应与成本效率显著相关，人力资源战略在其中起中介作用。跨文化培训、招聘政策调整和跨文化沟通能减少冲突、提高生产力并降低成本。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了国际管理和跨文化人力资源管理的文献。
AI.practical_contributions: 为跨国公司设计文化适应政策和可持续人力资源战略提供了实践指导。

title: Unlocking the Innovation Code: Towards a Grand Unified Theory
affiliations: African Research Network (ARN)

detail.title: Unlocking the Innovation Code: Towards a Grand Unified Theory
detail.abstract:
Innovation has long been perceived as an economic, technological, or social phenomenon. However, emerging research across disciplines—from complexity science and artificial intelligence to evolutionary biology and metaphysics—suggests that innovation is not merely a contingent human endeavor but a fundamental principle governing transformation across all domains of existence (Arthur, 2009; Kauffman, 2019).

This book seeks to establish Innovationology as a scientific and philosophical discipline that reveals the Meta-Law of Innovation—a universal trajectory driven by intelligence, complexity, and systemic emergence. The central claim of this book is that all transformative processes—scientific revolutions, biological evolution, technological progress, civilizational shifts, and even spiritual enlightenment—follow deep, intelligible laws embedded in reality (Goertzel, 2022; Tegmark, 2017).

This work positions innovation not as a human construct but as a cosmic principle, with clear mathematical, cognitive, and metaphysical foundations. By integrating theoretical physics, artificial intelligence, evolutionary dynamics, cognitive science, philosophy of technology, and complexity theory, this book constructs the first Grand Unified Theory of Innovation, providing a predictive and explanatory model for how transformation occurs at all levels of existence.

AI.tldr: 本文提出创新学作为一门科学和哲学学科，揭示创新的元法则，认为创新是宇宙的基本原理，而非人类独有的现象。
AI.research_question: 创新是否是一种宇宙基本原理，而非仅限于人类活动的现象？
AI.motivation: 跨学科研究显示创新是普遍存在的现象，需要建立统一理论来解释其本质。

AI.method: 整合多学科理论，构建创新的宏大统一理论。
AI.findings: 创新是宇宙的基本原理，具有数学、认知和形而上学基础。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出创新学作为新学科，构建创新的统一理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为科学革命、技术进步等提供预测和解释模型。

title: Autonomous Vehicles and the City: A Symposium Developing Policies and Plans for Livability

detail.title: Autonomous Vehicles and the City: A Symposium Developing Policies and Plans for Livability
detail.abstract: This report summarizes the outcomes of the “Autonomous Vehicles and the City” symposium held at the University of San Francisco in November 2017. Bringing together policymakers, urban planners, designers, technologists, and academics, the symposium explored the profound implications of autonomous vehicles (AVs) on urban form, equity, the environment, and public policy. Discussions centered on how AVs may reshape land use patterns, influence real estate values, and disrupt existing transportation systems, while also offering opportunities to improve safety, accessibility, and sustainability. Panelists examined AV impacts across three domains—design and land use, social and environmental equity, and economics and real estate—and offered actionable policy recommendations for cities to prepare for an autonomous future. The report emphasizes the urgency for proactive planning, including revising zoning codes, rethinking parking infrastructure, investing in equitable access, and adapting revenue models to reflect AV-induced shifts. The findings call for a strategic, values-driven approach to integrating AVs that ensures inclusive, livable, and resilient urban futures.

title: Cloud ERP vs. On-Premise QAD ERP: A Cost-Benefit Analysis for Mid-Sized Manufacturers
affiliations: Manipal Institute of Technology

detail.title: Cloud ERP vs. On-Premise QAD ERP: A Cost-Benefit Analysis for Mid-Sized Manufacturers

publicationDetails.detailsText: Journal of Engineering Research and Sciences, volume 4, issue 7, 2025[10.55708/js0407001]

detail.abstract: For mid-sized manufacturing firms, the Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system plays a crucial role in streamlining operations and enabling strategic growth. Both adopting cloudbased ERP solutions and continuing to use On-Premise applications like QAD are important decisions as digital transformation increases. In this study, we conduct a retrospective case study of the costbenefit analysis of Implementing Cloud Vs On-Premise QAD from a mid-size manufacturing perspective. The analysis is conducted based on industry reports, vendor pricing models, and structured interviews with IT and finance professionals from 10 mid-sized manufacturing firms in various industries. Total cost of ownership (TCO), implementation timelines, scalability, integration capabilities, system reliability, and long-term Return On Investment (ROI) are evaluated. The results suggest that while On-Premise QAD provides more control and more customization, cloud ERP facilitates lower upfront capital expenditure, higher operational agility, and faster updates and integrations, at least for the cases covered. Cloud ERP solutions' TCO and ROI within the first five years are also lower than On-Premise solutions, especially those that are associated with rapid growth or having a lean IT shop. This suggests that cloud ERP is generally more cost-effective and more adaptable to those who are digitally mature, growing medium-sized manufacturers, and that On-Premise QAD may still suit companies with some unique regulatory or customization needs. This work devises actionable strategies for making ERP investment decisions in a highly competitive manufacturing environment.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过回顾性案例研究，比较了中型制造企业采用云端ERP与本地QAD系统的成本效益，发现云端ERP在前期资本支出、运营敏捷性和长期投资回报方面更具优势，而本地QAD更适合有特殊监管或定制需求的企业。
AI.research_question: 中型制造企业在数字化转型中，选择云端ERP还是本地QAD系统更具成本效益？
AI.motivation: 随着数字化转型的加速，中型制造企业面临ERP系统选择的挑战，需权衡云端与本地解决方案的成本效益。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于总拥有成本（TCO）、投资回报率（ROI）和运营敏捷性等理论框架。
AI.method: 回顾性案例研究，结合行业报告、供应商定价模型及对10家中型制造企业IT和财务专业人士的结构化访谈。
AI.findings: 云端ERP在前期成本、运营敏捷性和长期ROI上优于本地QAD，但本地QAD在控制和定制化方面更具优势。
AI.theory_contributions: 为ERP选择提供了基于TCO和ROI的理论分析框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为中型制造企业提供了ERP投资决策的实际策略，尤其是针对快速成长或IT资源有限的企业。

title: Performance measurements of the international joint ventures in an emerging market
affiliations: Prairie View A&M University - College of Business

detail.title: Performance measurements of the international joint ventures in an emerging market

declarations.declarationOfInterest: Not applicable
declarations.ethicsApproval: Not applicable
declarations.funderStatement: Not applicable

detail.abstract:
This chapter identifies ten major internal and external factors that may affect the processes of measuring performance of international joint ventures (IJVs) by their parents. A parent is defined as the business unit that administers, including giving continuing resources and support, and formulates the strategies of the IJVs. The factors are generally divided into internal and external perspectives. The internal factors include agency, control, strategy, technology, and transaction costs, whereas the external elements include culture and society, economy and market size, government and politics, industrial structure, and resources.

Based on a series of semi-structured interviews with the CEOs and CFOs of five organizations with 3 from manufacturing and 2 from services, whose parents are based in Houston, Texas, and their IJVs in the People’s Republic of China, this chapter concludes that all the factors have impact, one way or another, on the performance of IJVs. Thus, it is essential that the parents consider these factors when evaluating and rewarding the IJVs. Further, the parents should assess the performance based on both the financial and non-financial returns of IJVs. Results of this finding have implications for the parents, IJVs, and stakeholders of the organizations.

AI.tldr: 本章探讨了影响国际合资企业（IJVs）绩效测量的十大内外部因素，并通过半结构化访谈验证了这些因素的重要性。
AI.research_question: 哪些内外部因素会影响国际合资企业（IJVs）的绩效测量过程？

AI.method: 对5家企业的CEO和CFO进行半结构化访谈，涵盖制造业和服务业。

title: The Ethics of Defunding the Police
affiliations: Pennsylvania State University and Pennsylvania State University

detail.title: The Ethics of Defunding the Police
detail.abstract: Calls to defund the police gained prominence with the Black Lives Matter (BLM) movement and take various forms. Depending on what will be defunded, the idea has attracted support from different parts of the political spectrum. The politicized nature of the debate often cuts short reflection on how best to assess proposals to defund the police. This article takes up that task. It begins by developing a typology of defund measures: abolitionist cuts, abolitionist reallocation, disaggregative cuts, and disaggregative reallocation. It then outlines a framework to evaluate policing and defund measures, drawing on criteria from the ethics of defensive force. Since policing relies on force, it faces a high justificatory bar and must satisfy the principles of just aim, proportionality, and necessity. The state should not fund unjustified forms of policing that violate those principles. Different violations, though, demand different policy responses.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了“撤资警察”的不同形式及其评估框架，基于防御性武力的伦理标准提出了评价标准。

AI.theoretical_framework: 基于防御性武力的伦理原则（正当目标、比例性和必要性）。
AI.method: 提出“撤资警察”的分类法（废除性削减、废除性再分配、分散性削减、分散性再分配），并构建评估框架。
AI.findings: 警察行为若违反伦理原则，国家不应资助；不同违规行为需不同政策回应。

title: Perceived Benefits of Adopting Artificial Intelligence Technologies in Purchasing Processes
affiliations: Audencia Business School, Audencia Business School and Audencia Business School

detail.title: Perceived Benefits of Adopting Artificial Intelligence Technologies in Purchasing Processes
detail.abstract: • Purpose: This paper examines the benefits of Artificial Intelligence technologies in purchasing processes. In particular, it investigates four different types of AI-based technologies and their impact on 9 typical purchasing processes. • Design/methodology/approach: Based on a survey of 50 purchasing professionals mostly at senior positions, we investigated four AI-based technologies and we test their respective impact on nine purchasing processes. We have completed this survey with a series of 8 interviews, to subject matter experts in the field of AI in purchasing, in order to increase the granularity of our findings. • Findings: We found out that the adoption of AI is perceived to have a strong impact only on specific activities of the purchasing process (spend analysis, data quality, contract management). Our findings highlighted also the weak perceived influence of AI-based technologies directly on cost savings and risks mitigation, if organization do not manage the implementation of these technologies properly. Finally, our respondents perceived that data quality is the main beneficiary of several AI technologies. These findings open large avenues for future research relatively to purchasing digital transformation and AI. • Originality: this paper is one of the first, not to say the first paper to investigate benefits of AI in purchasing, building on a deductive approach. • Research limitations/implications: This paper extends research on purchasing digital transformation by shifting from the focus on technology-centric outcomes, such as information system usage, to understanding the outcomes of AI on purchasing process. The main limitation comes from the limited dataset (N=50) but we overcame this constraint through the usage of interviews to increase findings granularity. • Practical implications: Our paper suggests that purchasing managers should not only consider AI-based technologies as an important technological artifact, but also view it as a key driver of functional and strategic efficiency. It highlights also the limitations of several AI-based technologies, in respect of specific purchasing processes.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了人工智能技术在采购流程中的益处，重点关注四种AI技术对九种典型采购流程的影响，发现AI对特定活动（如支出分析、数据质量和合同管理）有显著影响，但对成本节约和风险缓解的影响较弱。

AI.findings: AI对特定采购活动（如数据质量）有显著影响，但对成本节约和风险缓解的影响较弱。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了采购数字化转型的研究，从技术中心转向AI对流程的实际影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议采购经理将AI视为功能性和战略效率的关键驱动因素，并注意其局限性。

detail.abstract: In demographically diverse organizations, employees charged with socializing otherssocialization agents-must navigate a deep tension between the organization's needs to integrate individuals into a collective and individuals' needs for recognition of their unique identities. Through a qualitative study of employees in an urban charter high school where race and class inequalities are salient, we find that socialization agents experience this tension as identity threatening. We develop a theoretical model of relational reconciliation that traces how agents engage with this identity threat in an ongoing, stumbling process. Through relational reconciliation, agents come to redefine their selves in relation to their "socializees," which enables them to engage in elaborated socialization practices that aim to meet the needs of both the organization and the socializee. Our work repositions socialization agents as active parties in socialization, explores the tensions of socializing members of marginalized groups into a dominant culture, and reveals the importance of engaging with one's own identities to reconcile these tensions.

title: Real-Time Project Tracking Through Adaptive AI Monitoring Tools
affiliations: Independent Researcher, Independent Researcher and Independent Researcher

detail.title: Real-Time Project Tracking Through Adaptive AI Monitoring Tools
detail.abstract: Since projects have become more complicated and there is a demand for faster progress, traditional tracking techniques struggle to provide up-to-date information and smart early advice. This study investigates the role of adaptive AI monitoring tools in real-time project tracking for industries such as IT services, construction, software development, healthcare, and eLearning. We used a combination of qualitative and quantitative methods to compare traditional systems with AI-enhanced tools such as Click Up AI, Jira ML Plugin, and Asana Predictive Model. Results show improvements in task completion time, milestone accuracy, resource usage, and response time to issues. AI tools demonstrated high prediction accuracy, with Click Up reaching 88.3% accuracy, significantly reducing wait times. Additionally, user satisfaction was higher, and participants felt more confident in decision-making. Adaptive AI ensures real-time project views, dynamic risk management, and data driven decision-making. Future studies should focus on evaluating AI's long-term performance across various industries.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了自适应AI监控工具在实时项目跟踪中的作用，通过定性与定量方法比较传统系统与AI工具（如Click Up AI、Jira ML插件和Asana预测模型），发现AI工具在任务完成时间、里程碑准确性、资源使用和问题响应时间方面有显著改进。
AI.research_question: 自适应AI监控工具在实时项目跟踪中的作用是什么？
AI.motivation: 由于项目复杂性增加且进度要求更快，传统跟踪技术难以提供实时信息和智能早期建议。

title: The Effect of Operation Management (OM) in Vocational Education and Training (VET) On Shaping Skilled Technicians: A Case Study of Elsewedy Technical Academy
affiliations: Ain Shams University, Ain Shams University, Ain Shams University and Ain Shams University

detail.title: The Effect of Operation Management (OM) in Vocational Education and Training (VET) On Shaping Skilled Technicians: A Case Study of Elsewedy Technical Academy
detail.abstract: Overview of the skills gap issue: The mismatch between graduate skills and industry needs presents a formidable challenge to economic growth and innovation. Introduction to Elsewedy Technical Academy (STA) and its approach: This paper delves into the effect of private sector involvement in vocational education and training (VET), using the Elsewedy Technical Academy (STA) as a case study. STA, established by the Egyptian industrial giant Elsewedy, confronts the skills gap in its core sectors—electrical, construction, and renewable energy—through an innovative curriculum grounded in Operation Management (OM) principles. Summary of research objectives and methods: The research employs a mixed-methods approach, including document analysis, interviews, and site visits, to explore STA's curriculum development. It assesses how the academy's OM-driven curriculum not only aligns with industry needs but also integrates practical training and soft skills development, thereby fostering strong industry-academia collaboration. Key findings on the effectiveness of STA's OM-driven curriculum: Preliminary findings suggest that STA's approach effectively equips graduates with relevant skills, significantly enhancing their employability. Implications for the broader field of VET: This paper argues that STA's model can serve as a blueprint for industry-aligned VET, with potential implications for policy and practice in developing skilled technicians to meet the demands of modern industries.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了私营部门参与职业教育和培训（VET）的效果，以Elsewedy技术学院（STA）为例，研究其基于运营管理（OM）原则的创新课程如何解决技能差距问题。
AI.research_question: 私营部门参与职业教育和培训（VET）如何通过基于运营管理（OM）的课程解决技能差距问题？
AI.motivation: 毕业生技能与行业需求不匹配对经济增长和创新构成挑战，需要探索有效的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 运营管理（OM）原则在职业教育和培训中的应用。
AI.method: 混合方法，包括文献分析、访谈和实地考察。
AI.findings: STA的OM驱动课程有效提升了毕业生的技能和就业能力。
AI.theory_contributions: 为私营部门参与VET提供了理论支持，展示了OM原则在课程设计中的应用价值。
AI.practical_contributions: STA模型可作为行业导向VET的范例，对政策和实践具有借鉴意义。

title: Cultural Analysis of the Legend of Guando
affiliations: EDUKIVOTOS

detail.title: Cultural Analysis of the Legend of Guando
detail.abstract: This academic work offers a multidimensional analysis of the Colombian legend El Guando, exploring its ritual, emotional, aesthetic, pedagogical, economic, and narrative dimensions. Grounded in theories from Jung, Plutchik, Eliade, Turner, and Bourdieu, the study reveals how this myth acts as a symbolic regulator, emotional archetype, and potential driver of local cultural tourism. It rescues the legend from marginalization, reinterpreting it as a living element of intangible heritage with contemporary social, psychological, and economic relevance. The research emphasizes its adaptability and value in sustainable development and collective memory.

AI.tldr: 本文对哥伦比亚传说《El Guando》进行了多维分析，探讨其仪式、情感、美学、教育、经济和叙事维度，揭示其作为符号调节器、情感原型和文化旅游驱动力的作用。
AI.research_question: 《El Guando》传说如何在不同维度（仪式、情感、美学等）中发挥作用，并具有当代社会、心理和经济意义？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在从边缘化中拯救这一传说，重新诠释其为活态非物质文化遗产，并探索其在可持续发展和集体记忆中的价值。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于荣格、普拉奇克、伊利亚德、特纳和布迪厄的理论。
AI.method: 多维分析方法，结合理论和实证研究。
AI.findings: 传说作为符号调节器、情感原型和文化旅游驱动力，具有社会、心理和经济价值。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了神话理论，展示了传说在当代社会中的多维功能。
AI.practical_contributions: 为文化旅游业和可持续发展提供了潜在驱动力，强化了集体记忆。

title: Scheduling Lunar Satellite Communications with Risk of Data Interception
affiliations: State University of New York (SUNY) - University at Buffalo, University at Buffalo, University at Buffalo, University at Buffalo and State University of New York (SUNY) - University at Buffalo

detail.title: Scheduling Lunar Satellite Communications with Risk of Data Interception
detail.abstract: This paper considers the scheduling of communication jobs from Moon ground stations to Earth via satellites in cislunar orbit, while limiting the risk of data interception. When a Moon ground station is transmitting to its target satellite, the transmission can be intercepted by another satellite in the vicinity. The risk of data interception should be limited for the goal of secure communications. A mixed integer linear program is formulated to maximize the reward from job data transmitted to Earth. The model is formulated to allow re-optimization at the next resolve period with remaining jobs in the system and the addition of new jobs. A heuristic using the linear program portion of the model and a job rank order allocation procedure is proposed. A schedule compression procedure is also proposed for the case without reward decay. Numerical experiments with and without reward decay are performed to evaluate the heuristic and to examine the impacts of increasing ground stations, satellites and satellite receive rate capacity.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了通过地月轨道卫星从月球地面站到地球的通信任务调度，以限制数据被拦截的风险。通过混合整数线性规划最大化传输数据的奖励，并提出启发式算法和调度压缩程序。
AI.research_question: 如何在地月轨道卫星通信中调度任务以限制数据拦截风险并最大化传输奖励？
AI.motivation: 确保月球地面站到地球的通信安全，防止数据被拦截。
AI.theoretical_framework: 混合整数线性规划、启发式算法、调度压缩理论。
AI.method: 提出混合整数线性规划模型，允许重新优化，并设计启发式算法和调度压缩程序。
AI.findings: 通过数值实验验证了启发式算法的有效性，并分析了地面站、卫星数量和接收速率的影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了适用于地月通信的调度优化模型和启发式算法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为实际地月通信任务调度提供了优化工具，提升了通信安全性。

detail.title: Cultural Analysis of the Legend of the Alligator Man
detail.abstract:
This academic work explores the multifaceted dimensions of the Colombian legend El Hombre Caimán, analyzing its social, ethical, emotional, territorial, and economic functions. Through interdisciplinary lenses—myth theory, semiotics, pedagogy, cultural transmission, and symbolic economy—the study examines how the legend adapts across generations, media formats, and cultural contexts. It highlights the role of the myth in community identity, emotional processing, moral teaching, and cultural tourism, while critically reflecting on the risks of commodification.

Keywords:
Myth, Identity, Cultural Heritage, Emotion, Economy

title: Assessing Legal Enforcement in India: A Comparative Analysis of Tamil Nadu and the National Average using the Legal Enforcement Index (LEI) 2025
affiliations: Central University of Jammu

detail.title: Assessing Legal Enforcement in India: A Comparative Analysis of Tamil Nadu and the National Average using the Legal Enforcement Index (LEI) 2025
detail.abstract: The efficacy of a state's legal enforcement machinery is a cornerstone of the rule of law and a critical determinant of socioeconomic progress. This paper introduces the Legal Enforcement Index (LEI), a composite metric designed to assess the capacity and performance of justice delivery systems in India. Using data primarily from the India Justice Report (IJR) 2025, we construct the LEI based on six pillars: Police, Judiciary, Prisons, Legal Aid, Human Rights, and Anti-corruption. Our analysis reveals that Tamil Nadu's LEI for 2025 is 56.2, surpassing the estimated national average LEI of 52.4. The results indicate Tamil Nadu's relative strengths in prison management and judicial infrastructure, while also highlighting systemic national challenges such as workforce vacancies and prison overcrowding. The paper discusses the policy implications of these findings, addresses the methodological limitations stemming from data gaps in certain pillars, and proposes the use of regression analysis for future refinements of the index to ensure its empirical validity and robustness.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了法律执行指数（LEI），用于评估印度司法系统的能力与表现，发现泰米尔纳德邦的LEI高于全国平均水平，并讨论了政策意义和方法局限性。
AI.research_question: 如何评估印度司法系统的能力与表现？
AI.motivation: 法律执行效率是法治和社会经济进步的关键因素，需要量化评估工具。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于六个支柱（警察、司法、监狱、法律援助、人权和反腐败）构建法律执行指数（LEI）。
AI.method: 使用印度司法报告（IJR）2025年的数据构建LEI，并进行比较分析。
AI.findings: 泰米尔纳德邦的LEI为56.2，高于全国平均52.4；其优势在于监狱管理和司法基础设施，但全国普遍存在人员空缺和监狱拥挤问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了LEI作为评估司法系统的新工具，丰富了量化研究方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了改进司法系统的具体方向，并建议未来使用回归分析优化指数。

title: Unveiling the Hidden Value of Risks in Platform Finance
affiliations: Beijing Jiaotong University, Central University of Finance and Economics and California State University

detail.title: Unveiling the Hidden Value of Risks in Platform Finance
detail.abstract: Platform finance has emerged as a transformative innovation in supply chain finance, enabling capital-constrained suppliers to access liquidity while enhancing cash flow and operational flexibility for platforms. However, the impact of demand uncertainty and financial risk on platform finance decisions remains underexplored. This study makes a key contribution by reframing demand uncertainty and risk as strategic levers rather than threats, providing a nuanced understanding of their dual roles in platform finance. By integrating operational and financial risk perspectives, this research fills a gap in the literature and offers a comprehensive framework for risk-informed financing decisions. This paper develops a game-theoretic model to analyze a platform offering two common financing schemes-credit financing and factoring finance-and a capital-constrained supplier, focusing on unveiling the hidden value of risk, namely, how different risk levels affect the platform's and supplier's operational and financial decisions. Our findings challenge the traditional view that operational and financial risks are purely negative and demonstrate these risks' hidden value. We find that platform finance not only alleviates liquidity constraints but also enhances profitability for both platforms and suppliers. Counterintuitively, low levels of both risks hinder Pareto improvements, while high operational risk can foster joint profit gains. Furthermore, increased demand uncertainty, often regarded as a threat, can improve profitability when financial risk is appropriately managed. Credit financing and factoring finance yield distinct profit outcomes depending on the platform's role as a reseller or marketplace and the financial risk level. Our findings provide actionable guidance for platforms and capital-constrained suppliers to optimize financing strategies, demonstrating that effectively leveraging demand uncertainty and risks can unlock profitability and drive sustainable competitive advantage in platform-based ecosystems.

AI.tldr: 平台金融通过信用融资和保理融资帮助资本受限供应商获取流动性，同时提升平台和供应商的盈利能力。研究发现，需求不确定性和金融风险并非纯粹负面，而是具有战略价值。
AI.research_question: 需求不确定性和金融风险如何影响平台金融决策？
AI.motivation: 现有研究未充分探讨需求不确定性和金融风险对平台金融的影响，本研究填补了这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合运营和金融风险视角，提出风险知情融资决策的综合框架。
AI.method: 采用博弈论模型分析平台提供的两种融资方案（信用融资和保理融资）及其对供应商的影响。
AI.findings: 平台金融不仅能缓解流动性约束，还能提升平台和供应商的盈利能力；低风险水平反而不利于帕累托改进，而高运营风险可能促进共同利润增长。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战了传统观点，揭示需求不确定性和金融风险的隐藏价值。
AI.practical_contributions: 为平台和供应商提供了优化融资策略的行动指南，帮助其在平台生态系统中实现可持续竞争优势。
